name: Dusty Scouts of Camp Campy Camp
description:
Camp Campy Camp aims to create the CAMPIEST experience at Burning Man. Imagine a summer camp created where RuPaul with Josephine Baker and Alexander McQueen as the head Camp Counselors. A summer camp where you can explore the realities of Burning Man by asking: how do we collectively construct our reality here?

At Camp Campy Camp, we celebrate everyone in their finest form. We pay homage to the LGBTQ+ BIPOC originators of drag and ballroom. Our goal is to create a space akin to what ball culture has done – a space where anyone can be themselves, a space to fully celebrate each person for who they are. 

Our offerings will include traditional camp activities with a twist (merit badges, friendship bracelets, knitting, ropes course). Stop by any afternoon Tu-Fri to see what we have on deck!
landmark: 14' tall wooden tower with LEDs lights

name: Camp 3907
description:
Welcome to Camp 3907! The beauty of Black Rock City is that we're all on equal ground--in fact, we're 3,907 feet above sea level and so are you! We are Elevators, here to Elevate your experience. Elevate yourself with our 12' tall Mood Swing! Come to explore the city on our 10', 3d topographic map with camps and art pieces supplied by
you! We will gladly supply you with (mis) information while you have a drink at the bar, then browse our clothing boutique with all the latest fashions. Be sure to join in our classes including make your own Rope Man, followed by a dive into our expanded pit of 1000 rubber chickens!
landmark: look for the 12' tall, 2-person Mood Swing

name: Intergalactic Confederation
description: We invite all intergalactic beings to come share some Brazilian BBQ and enjoy some outer space techno music with the ORBEAT crew, Tuesday and Thursday from 3pm to 12am.
landmark: Dome with the alien pirate flag on top.

name: Museum of One
description: The Museum of One (MOO) showcases art, one piece a day. It's an antidote to the experience typical of most museums, where you can't possibly see everything. There is no FOMO at the MOO.
landmark: Large "Museum of One" sign, lit at night

name: Black Rock City Municipal Pool
description:
Looking for a place to cool down and relax? The Black Rock City Municipal Pool might be the place for you! There's something for everyone: come by for a refreshment at one of our Open Swim sessions, bike in after sunset for one of our movie nights, or put your dancing boots to good use at our Spring Break party! Access to our Spa is only available for members, so stop by our Membership Office and fill out your application. 

Want to book the pool for your next event? Reach out with a request and let's make a splash together!
landmark: BRC municipal pool membership office structure

name: Tiger Man Camp
description: Does Your Butt Hurt
landmark: 3 ft tall tiger man with uplifted arms tiger head

name: Fire Camp
description: Fire Camp is a home for fire spinners and performers of all kinds. Come by for a fire jam or to play on the aerial rigs & poles, or just enjoy the music and entertainment! Try to find out who the swag keeper is and get your stickers or patch!
landmark: 30' x 30' canvas canopy w/ flame effects out front

name: FUR
description: FUR is a theme camp of furries, who come together to collaborate in the shared theme of Anthropomorphic Art, Costuming, and Culture.
landmark: Giant LED paw sign on the 23' tower. Camp FUR sign

name: Camp FUA
description: Camp FUA is a small camp of veteran Burners, part of the Outer Road neighbor for over 15 years.  Home of the PAMS mutant vehicle.
landmark: Camp FUA Burn Barrel, white shade structure

name: GDI - Gawd Damn Independents
description: We're the GDI's (Gawd Damn Independents), and we're working for the Man - maybe you are too..? Most of us are Reno-ites, plus one Canuck -  all with "Playa MacGyver" skill sets. Drop in late afternoon or early morning, as you might catch us enjoying a hot coffee or cold one...after work. Pull up; dust off a chair and share your best "There was this one time at Burning Man" story. We might trade a trinket, a laugh, gift emoji, or one of our stories for your effort. We have Burned forever, and we long the days of Cacophonic efforts and attitudes; if speed past our camp on a 'lectric bike - that'll be us - yelling at you -  "slow the f*** down...". Dusty hugs and squinty eyed smiles back at yah; "In Dust (and mud) we Trust".  Peace, Love & Hugs - the GDI's. (insert smiley emoji here).
landmark: #There was this one time at Burning Man "sign".

name: Magic Paradise
description: Dive into an oasis of wonder, where community and enchantment come together! Enjoy captivating magic shows, intimate speakeasy encounters, and daily afternoon treats. Let our skilled team repair your gear, and make your bike stand out with our dazzling decorations.
landmark: Large Magic Paradise Sign and Flags

name: Soul Forge
description: Take a deep dive into personal growth and learning - Hammer out your spirit at Soul Forge!
landmark: Large Soul Forge Sign

name: Airstreameri and What Not
description: Home to Playa's Best Postcards! Come craft unique art cards to gift back to the default world. Experience our giant mind-melting kaleidoscope, the VIXToscope! Photo booth, Yard games, Live 80s music & libations!
landmark: Large silver PEACE sign + Airstream Trailers

name: Camp Canadianderthal
description: Zeppelin anyone? LIVE CLASSIC ROCK Thursday (1:00pm). Smack down your northern neighbors on our Whack-Ca-Nuck game, grab a new outfit from our Cariboutique or a hat from our Chapeaupourri. Play some tunes in our piano bar. Spreading Canadian love, missing our Phish Phans!
landmark: Whack-Ca-Nuck w/Canadian Flag, Cariboutique, piano

name: A Transformation Station
description:
Explore, Engage, Evolve: Transformation Amidst the Magic of Burning Man.

Discover a world where transformative experiences and interactive art merge to create a sanctuary of healing, reflection, and communal celebration. Dive into classes or workshops during the day and co-create collective narratives that envision a future of interconnectedness and environmental consciousness. Join us to embrace a journey of self-discovery, connection, and personal growth, set against a backdrop of music, meditation, and the magic of shared experiences!
landmark: LED strip along frontage perimeter, ATS sign

name: Dusty Speakeasy and Sanctuary
landmark: lit up sign on top of a secret gold frame door

name: I Miss My Dog Cafe
description:
I Miss My Dog Cafe is a community cafe uniting people over our love of all animals.

A colorful dog installation welcomes our guests, who are invited to relax in the intimate ambiance of dog-themed decor. Our on-duty dog-tor (human therapy dog) will enthusiastically greet you and dexterously serve whatever drool-worthy refreshments the house is cooking that day. Sit and stay for dog-themed events.

Staying true to our food-gifting roots, we host hot dog parties and grilled cheese lunches, serving traditional and vegan options. Our day starts bright and early with a sunrise coffee, tea, and kibble cereal bar. Stop by to send your pup (or kitty) a postcard from playa.
landmark: Colorful Dog Head

name: Camp Pull My Finger
description: Come join us for Biscuits and Gravy Tuesday and Thursday morning. "Best Thing You Will Put In Your Mouth all week" (Maybe second). Themed afternoon bars all week
landmark: silver shade structure LED "Camp Pull My Finger"

name: Bitchin' Braid Camp
description: Come for the braids, stay for the bar parties. Please grab a partner or find one in the braiding lounge to make a plan for a style that will last the week. Braiders on hand with all the supplies and skills to get you taken care of, including mirrors to check out your sweet self on the way out. No hair? NO PROBLEM. From 10am to sunset we have have hosted bar parties, new faces, new specialty drinks, new outfits and new music every two hours. Want to be apart of our camp's 10 year tradition, head over right before sunset to grab a bevy and enjoy a special treat as the sun starts kissing those mountains. Miss you already, so swing by.
landmark: Red K or Blue Bitchin Braid Sign alongfrontage

name: Future Turtles
description: The Future Turtles offer a friendly and welcoming 24/7 destination where you can come hang out, play with our LED tower, climb up and view the playa from our observation decks, and meet the Turtles: happy mutants: nerds, engineers, programmers, gaymers, creators and artists, scientists and philosophers.
landmark: 44 FOOT LED TOWER

name: BRC Raccoons
description: Well, as the loveliest trash pandas, we firmly believe that sustainability, alternative energy sources, as well as the 4Rs (Reuse, Reduce, Rethink, Recycle) are crucial in our daily human (and raccoon) lives. A raccoon can be crafty and resourceful, responsible and playful, but above all – curious and friendly.
landmark: Raccoons nest in the front

name: The Love Beets
description: The Love Beets are here to serve Black Rock City.  As an art support camp we don't have an official program.  But, if you need a rest, or a helping hand feel free to stop by for some shade and conversation.
landmark: Red beet shaped dome.

name: Emerge-N-See ICU
landmark: Big canopy tent and couches

name: A-PLAYA-MASK
description: Breathe easy with the Maskman's quality N-95 Dusk Masks with the non toxic psychedelic Burning Man logo. And don't forget our Breathe Easy nose plugs, BM Stickers, and Pins.
landmark: The large A-PLAYA-MASK sign

name: Clevian Circularity
description: Clevian Circularity dates back to 30,000 BC and channels a mystic lost civilization.
landmark: 11 foot diameter glowing sequencing snowflake

name: OHM HOME
description: OHM Home: We are a mutant vehicle support camp. Home of Ohm Kar, Manta and Vibe Apple. Come n boogie. Take the ride.
landmark: Wicker barriers on the front camp corners for ambiance.

name: Howzit
description: Double, double toil and trouble: Fire Burn and cauldron bubble. By the pricking of my thumbs, something wicked this way comes... to fill their cups with delightful teas from Howzit's cauldron! Chase away those dry throats. Alcohol free for all ages and sobriety levels. Made with magic and love by the witchy denizens of Howzit.
landmark: Tripod Aerial rig and matching Cauldron

name: Mansonian Institute 4 Urban Study
description: Visit us to learn Burningman History from its very beginning to now from experts. Attend BM Art talks Tues Wed Thurs @ 1-2:30PM. Come hear ManKrewe talk about how the Man Base is built Thurs @ 3-4:30 PM. Bring a shirt & make it a BM t-shirt Tues + Wed 10-Noon, Swag Swag Swag + visit our fabulous day bar for BM themed games & drinks. See Tubatron "the Flaming Tuba guy" do his thing!
landmark: Large Colorful Poster & Banners with BM Themes

name: Just Roll With It
description: Our life-sized board game returns to the playa! Join us as a live pawn and enjoy drinks, music, and prizes! All ages welcome.
landmark: Fuzzy dice and string lights across the front

name: Gypsy Nebula Carnival
description:
Gypsy Nebula Carnival welcomes you!
Eat some Gourmet cotton candy, adopt a mutant monkey, play games, and win prizes. You can ride the biggest cock on the playa or go for a rowdy romp on the Bucking Beaver. The Gypsy Nebula Carnival lounge is shady during the day and black-lighted at night and always welcomes the weary traveler to rest and enjoy our ambiance and snark.
landmark: 20' tall Madam Zelda with her welcoming embrace.

name: Camp Shit Ain't Right
description:
Wyoming-based with international flair - campmates from Wyoming, Canada, New Zealand, Russia, Australia, Germany, Netherlands... aaaand I'm definitely missing some.
Come visit for public lounge, food, misting, clothing boutique, large-scale painting, shitty punch and more!
landmark: Large "Camp Shit Ain't Right" sign & fairy lights

name: GalixAxia
description: A Dive Camp of Synthwave, Retro-Future Wave, CyberPunk Wave, Interstellar and Space Travel. Synthwave Music, Neon Colors Lights and Lazers. Apocalyptic Retro Future, Neo-Noir Atmosphere.
landmark: Big-ass 14ft blue LED sign that says "GalixAxia"

name: Synapse Conduit
description:
Mini Golf 24 x 7 The Hole Point 
Bring your dusty hole over to play with our putters. Serving Arnold Palmers. Tournament on Thursday at 1:00pm
landmark: Mini Golf Course

name: Rascal
description: A sassy camp full of rascals who want to provide you with beats, art, quesadillas, cheap drinks, and mischief.  Come hungry. Leave begging for more.
landmark: 2 Giant Wooden Multicolored Foxes

name: FUN-DO BAR
description: Looking to get melty while having a booty shaking good time?! Look no further than Fun-Do Bar! Our delicious Swiss cheese and chocolate fondue paired with ice cold wine is sure to make your taste buds dance! Join us for our dance party happy hour (430-7p or until we run out!). Our servers will be scantily clad wearing nothing but aprons, so come on down and melt with happiness while shaking your booty to the beats!
landmark: Yellow/Blue Serving Bar labeled with FUN-DO BAR

name: Black Rock City Aquarium
description: Choose whether to be a visitor or an exhibit! Props provided. Regular feedings. Exit through the gift shop.
landmark: 10' dark blue Aquarium banner on carports

name: Friendlandia
description:
We have many customs and traditions for celebrating and recognizing romantic relationships. However, friendships are often longer lasting and as strong as many marriages, and yet we often don't spend the time to celebrate and honor those relationships.
Friendlandia is a place to celebrate new and long-time Friendships in ceremony by sharing vows, exchanging Friendship Bracelets, and expressing dedication and love for the friends in your life. Come have a ceremony at our Temple of Friendgagement, exchange vows and Friendship Bracelets, and become BFFs--Burner Friends Forever.
landmark: Neon color flags and bunting

name: Pollination Station
description: Pollination Station is a classroom camp with one goal: providing detailed information regarding the proper care, proliferation, and value of native pollinators including bees, butterflies, moths, birds, and bats...aided by the liberal application of honey-flavoured booze and sweet confectioneries. Join us and support the 10 Principles through education and skill development!
landmark: large white & red moth art piece with red lights.

name: Rabbit Hole
description: It's whatever you want it to be!
landmark: Rabbit in Top Hat Sign Behind Bar

name: Mighty Misfits
description: A Mighty Misfit is a person whose behavior or attitude sets them apart from others in a conspicuous way, yet somehow makes it okay. A fish out of water, square peg in a round hole, round peg in a square hole. If you've ever felt you don't fit in in the default worked, come and play with the Mighty Misfits. We are a welcoming, dusty respite with a misfit list of activities. Feed your body and soul with us!
landmark: a very large 40' dome

name: Kosmik Dust
description: Please stop by and play Fire Skee Ball! with your friends and campmates!  Check out our other technological interactivities such as our High Striker and Theramyd.
landmark: Illuminated orange Kosmik Dust rotating star sign

name: Happy Hour
description: Hard day on the playa? Unwind at Happy Hour, where you'll be greeted by one of a kind refreshing spirits served with smiles! Enjoy our lounge, bar, and dance floor! Start your day with Happy Hour!
landmark: Bright Round Happy Hour Sign & Ethiopian Flag

name: Pussy Day Spa
description: If there is one "must do" at Burning Man, it's a visit to the Pussy Day Spa. We offer a choice of refreshing body wash, pubic hair trim, and pussy massage including happy ending. What's not to like? Pleasure and bliss awaits as we pamper and delight you. Your boundaries will be respected, your feedback / adjustments encouraged, and your wishes fulfilled. We guarantee it will be the best experience you will ever have at Burning Man, or anywhere else. Open daily from 1 to 5 pm, we take reservations (recommended) as well as walk-ins.
landmark: Pussy Day Spa sign

name: Chair Camp
description: The Dusty, cozy-as-can-be living room with room for all of our Chair, automan, and TV people. Chair Camp is proud to be on playa for the third year, with 6 mutant vehicles and a 24/7 lounge-pad for when we're done stomping around deep playa + giving lifts to our burner neighbors and off adventuring. Cold beverages and warm, cozy hangs? Purrr.
landmark: Chair Camp Sign, string lights, MVs out front

name: Goodbye Horses
description: Goodbye Horses is a union of global and domestic Burners who have met and connected through Burning Man, regional Burns and local events. We are filmmakers, inventors, circus performers, designers, musicians and more. Best known for Kernel's World Famous PopCart, home of the best popcorn on the Playa, the one and only original, no bullshit authentic desert C~O~R~N for your grit. NO WOO-WOO LA TURNKEY CORN HERE FOLKS.
landmark: Painted wooden horses over our corral gate.

name: noMADart
description: come create some Playa Art with us, learn ASL, tell camp fire stories or just enjoy ours. Family friendly activities everyday or just come and enjoy a cup of Joe and ponder the days adventure. Find us near Point 3 for some Sunrise Pancakes to celebrate our 6 Year Burner Wedding Anniversary!
landmark: Dusty Fish and noMADart banner

name: Camp Orange Heart
description: We are a third year theme camp - Camp Orange Heart. Our camp is founded on the principles of unconditional love, mutual respect, honesty, trust, and transparency. Our goal is to provide a deeper intimacy among all human beings with respect to the eight types of intimacy. No drama type of camp - only love, respect, and radical acceptance!
landmark: White perimeter flags w/ orange Camp Orange Heart

name: Miki Beach
description:
Miki Beach is inspired from an array of beach lounges in Miami and the Caribbean, and mimicking these beach lounge vibes, we are striving to create an open, breezy, colorful environment to relax and have fun.  
Miki Beach is your desert oasis so come celebrate with us at one of our playful parties, sip on one of our delectable libations, visit us for our Brazilian BBQ on Saturday or participate and become a winner on one of our silly activities such as the Miki Beach State Fair.
landmark: Miki Beach sign attached to truss & fake palm tree

name: Elemental Studios
description:
At Elemental Studios, you don't need a Multi Pass to join in our camp's love of the movie Fifth Element. We invite all visitors (humanoid, alien or non) to participate in our unique and 'Super Green' workshops. Each day is dedicated to an element; Earth (Mon), Wind (Tue), Water (Wed), Fire (Thur) and Love (Fri). Come relax under our shaded structure and light up humanity with your amazing creations. Instructions may be in the Divine Language. All materials provided while supplies last. Non-alcoholic, highly caffeinated bevvies available, and kids are always welcome. Come for the creative expression, stay for the community! 

Heart Leeloo & Korben Dallas
landmark: Elemental Studios banner

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Barbie Death Village is a delight to the eyes and the mind. Our camp features the Infamous Barbie Art - 1500 Barbies marching into a giant EZ-Bake Oven (Time set at 4:20, Temp on hi. Getting baked!). Barbie's street fronts are full of a range of interactivity! Swim up to our Barbie Swim Up Bar for a drink, enjoy our artistic Barbie-based silliness, stay for one of our many events which range from Pewter Casting, Bob Ross Painting, Liquid Light Show, Midnight Toast, Pancake Pork-out, and so much more. Keep an eye out for and take a ride on our beloved Mutant Vehicle: The Barbie Whorehouse (It is not just a Whorehouse, it is a Whore Home.)
landmark: 7 Foot Tall Neon Barbie on a scythe stripper poll

name: GLAMCOCKS
description: GlamCocks is a global family that was started at Burning Man, and is dedicated to creating extraordinary experiences that celebrate and encourage burner principles, GlamCockery, bringing people together to find inspiration and creativity, and to express their fabulous, authentic selves. We believe that creativity, authenticity, and love for yourself and others are critical to having meaningful connections that make life fulfilling.
landmark: Huge Rooster Head Tower w/ Neon ribbon ceiling

name: Orgy Bus Camp
description: Orgy Bus Camp provides a safe and clean space for poly play parties on the playa. All of our parties have an opening ceremony where we practice consent and boundaries, as well as a fun opportunity to meet other guests. Our parties are at 3 PM and 11 PM daily.
landmark: Kissing Booth and Purple RV

name: Glow Job
description: Glow Job comes alive at night on playa. Home of psychedelic neon art, sculpture and personal beauty services. Visit our glowing blacklight art and beauty salon after sunset while you get ready for late night playa adventures. Blow your mind while you get your nails done. Get your face painted then melt it off. We are LGBTQ+.
landmark: Black lit animal sculptures out front

name: Paper Cranes
description: Come find refuge from the elements of the Playa. Have an ice-cold michelada or a homemade pickleback at our bar, "The Fold". Or enjoy a hot tea while you listen to some funky beats. Share a wish and write it in an origami crane, and we'll deliver it safely to the temple before the Sunday burn.
landmark: Large LED Paper Cranes Sign and a large star tent

name: Eurotrash Sangria Bar
description: Serving the best sangria and playing music from around the Latin world every afternoon, 3 pm to 7 pm!
landmark: Blue banner saying 'Eurotrash Sangria Bar'

name: Field of Dreams
description: A place to recreate 50 dreams in honor of the past year and the future to come.
landmark: Southern Discomfort bar in our Camp hub next to us

name: Space Jellies
description:
—First Contact will not be televised—
Hello Earthlings. We love you, and we're here to help. We come in peace. We are ready for the big reveal. Come by and say hi during this historical event:

Earth's Official Alien First Contact, probe-free!
(optional probing after waiver signature)

Art Support Camp for The King
landmark: 'Space Jellies' sign and 2 copper pyramids lit up

name: Mary E's Lavender Hand Wash
landmark: Lavender hand in the sky

name: qt pies
description:
The qt pies are an eclectic collective of souls inviting you to explore quixotic transcendence. We're on a mission to understand the temporal nature of identity and imagine new versions of self, community, and world. Spend time with us and embrace your pie-in-the-sky ideas. Our doors are open to the most curious.

Our camp is a cozy, intimate home base for all of our adventures. We curate a wide spectrum of experiences from serene and sensual to hypnotic and party-popping. With us, the boundaries between dream and reality dissolve. Come find the magic in boundless possibility.
landmark: marquee sign that says "QT PIES"

name: Bad Burners Crew
description: Doin it wwwrongg so youse dont hafta!  Come see our moop museum and sip on some hot soup before your night of extravaganza.  Learn how to rescue Lady Environment and her playa people from the evils of Dr. Moop and the Hydrocarbons.
landmark: Moop Museum Sign and humorous billboards

name: Camp Manatee
description:
Lounging Area offering:  Imported Beers, Sodas, Iced Tea, Cold Water, Shade, Day Bed, Couch, Solar 'Fire Pit',  Salty Snacks, Candy, Toys, 
Board Games. Fun! Relaxation! Bike Repair tools available. 'Tall Tales' about Manatees.
landmark: 2 - 10' x 10' Stripped tents, Red/Yellow & White

name: Phasmantis
description: Phasmantis brings snow cones, pop tarts, and dank beats to the playa. Stop by on a hot day and grab a drink and some saucy snow cones to cool off.  Or climb up on our roof deck for views of the playa.
landmark: Look for the seesaw out front.

name: Nobo House
description: Nobo House is an international, quirky Holistic Wellness & Recovery camp that is a place of refuge for playa adventurers, artists, & builders. Our gift is a chill playa spa, that includes a steam room, cold room, gym, hair washing/braiding, massages and smoothies.
landmark: Giant Diamond in the sky.

name: Discotique Pancake Boutique
description: The most sizzling spot on the Playa, serving up a symphony of pancakes from 10AM-1PM daily, we've got all the toppings that could win a Michelin star in the land of dust and dreams. Groove to House beats with a plateful of pancake with maple syrup that flows like liquid gold and butter that slides smoother than our DJ's transitions. Choose from a lineup of toppings like Bananas & Nutella that's nuttier than our tracklist. Whip it good with Whipping Cream or dive into the savory side with Bacon & Eggs that'll make you question if you're at a gourmet brunch or a desert rave. Experience live musical performances between 11PM-1PM that'll make you flip more than just pancakes. Get lost in group classes from 1PM-4PM. Bring your plate and dancing shoes and let's get this pancake party flipping!
landmark: Large White Tent with a Laser Pointing Up

name: Parliament Art Crew
description: We're the Support Art Camp that has brought in the past these art installations for the delight of our community. ATABEY's Treasure, MÚCARO and Got Framed.
landmark: Camp Contraptionist's Dome and Puerto Rico's flag

name: witness relocation camp
description: Bring us your white T-Shirt and we will print the best print on the playa
landmark: Big White Tent with a tie dyed flag on top

name: Society for Temporal Preservation
description:
The Society for Temporal Preservation consists of time travelers tasked with preserving the fabric of spacetime. Space time is a lot like a cat though, it takes care of itself. This is good, because now we can misuse our technology to visit historical Black Rock City. In this role we serve as ambassadors of the temporally free, working to introduce Black Rock City to the magic (science) of time travel.
Our goals include:
- Exposing burners to the wonders (AND HORRORS!) of time travel
- Instilling a sense of hope and responsibility in regards to an individual's place in time
- Getting the anti-matter out of the carpet. That stuff is STICKY
landmark: Blue flags and blue signage, light up bar at night

name: Awesome!(ville)
description: Awesome!(ville) is the home of daily classes, fun spaces, live music, plenty of shenanigans and organized chaos. We'll teach you a new skill, find your hidden artsy talent, move and grove your body, and pour you a tasty cocktail. Kick back and enjoy artwork, new friends, and lots of laughs. We're here to celebrate just how AWESOME you can be!
landmark: Large dome covered in red/green/blue shade sails

name: Horny Camp
description: Horny Camp is an arts & crafts camp with a cheeky, sexy twist. Our crafts can be appropriate for everybody, from children to the childish (but pervy) at heart. Our main craft is horn making; we teach our guests to mold polymer clay to create little horns to wear on their heads. We also offer spicy vodka tasting, dirty pornogami, & creating little crotch critters to wear around your waist. Visit the camp at hornycamp.com for activities list and photos of prior year's activities.
landmark: huge fabric horns & light up Horny Camp sign

name: LIMINAL LABS
description: For a quarter century, we have worked to bring love, truth and beauty to the playa. Our offerings this year include DREAMSCAPE CINEMA, two-at-a-time movies all night long. Our INTER-DIMENSIONAL WEDDING CHAPEL welcomes bridal parties of any mix or ilk AS WELL as spontaneous funerals and quickie divorces. Join us on Wednesday for our COUCH CHAT featuring Cory Doctorow and other underground luminaries sharing the latest in cyber security and sci fi stories. Drop by anytime. Our portals are always open.
landmark: giant steel moon gate

name: Burning Band Camp
description: Burning Band Camp! This is the home of the itinerant Burning Band, here to provide you with an earful of music. Well, two earfuls, really...
landmark: Large snowflakes, and the Burning Band flags

name: Lunokhod
landmark: Black Lunokhod Flag

name: XOXO
description: We are your lovely oasis in the heat of the Playa! Relax on our loungers in the shade, enjoy icy-cold drinks, munch on coconut pancakes as you learn at our expert lectures, and feel the love when you make new, unexpected connections in our space. XOXO soothes the weary desert traveler with cool beats, chill vibes, and lots of love all around!
landmark: giant XOXO letter sign (usually on scaffolding)

name: Brasa: Brazilian Bodega
description: Experience a Brazilian bodega ("boteco"). Here you will find delicious veggie BBQ, "caipirinhas" (cocktails), great music and joyful people. We welcome you to sit, take it slow and enjoy the "boteco life".
landmark: Look for the flag that says "Brasa"

name: crime.wav
description: Welcome to crime.wav, where the bass is high and the vibes are low key, just the way we like it! Prepare to have your senses tickled and your eardrums massaged as you catch some WAVs and groove to the beat. We're not just about music; we're about embracing the idiosyncratic side of life. So, whether you're busting out moves like a pro or just awkwardly swaying to the WAV you move, you're in for a freaking good time. And hey, in case you're wondering, the 'WAV' in crime.wav isn't a typo – it's a nod to the audio gods, paying homage to the Waveform Audio File format because, why the hell not? Our camp is a melting pot of misfits, with DJs, shit talkers, and artists coming together to unleash their madness on playa.
landmark: crime.wav flags atop FOH shade & scaffolding

name: Après Ski Injury
description:
Après Ski Injury is an interactive camp offering an Après-Ski Bar, a Morning Coffee Bar as well as a thrill ride: A ski ramp in the middle of the desert! Our bar is open every afternoon till late night and offers not only drinks, but entertainment, fun games and fire.
You can also ski!

We will have also two major events:

1. The Cryogenic Cocktail Experience, get vodka and gin ice cubes into mixer, frozen at −196 °C (−321 °F; 77 K) with liquid nitrogen live. 6 pm Tuesday. Literally the coolest event on Burning Man!

2. Zam Zam Zam! The biggest Austrian Style Cheers Worldwide. Come and be part of this new world record! 6 pm Thursday.
landmark: Ski Ramp and the Apres Ski Injury neon letters

name: Mindwerk
description: Come to Mindwerk and relax in our shady dome, and enjoy a Pomerosegasm, the most delicious and refreshing cocktail in Black Rock City! You can also control music with your brainwaves!! Then climb up to our viewing platform where you can behold a 360 degree view of our beautiful City. Once you're done ooh-ing and aah-ing, take an exhilarating trip down our slide. It's been called "just the right amount of sketchy" by satisfied customers. And its polymer surface won't toast your tush!
landmark: Big dome and slide

name: Walkin' Taco Cafe
description: Portable, salty, cheesy, crunchy... are walkin' tacos the perfect Playa food? We sure think so. Join us for lunch and we'll custom build your perfect taco: gluten-free, vegan, omnivore, mild, or infernally spicy... we've got you covered!
landmark: 7' tall hanging lantern tree, lit up at night.

name: Misfits Menagerie
landmark: Sail from a tarp building with a front slack line

name: Clamp Camp
description: The Clamp Camp mission is to help you hold it together…temporarily. Please stop by to consult with our Clamp Counselors who will help you with your clamping needs, or stay a while for our creative clamptivities.
landmark: Clamp Camp sign on a 20x30 white tent

name: Kaleidoscope Collective
landmark: Lots of plants, and big kaleidoscope flags

name: Uli Baba & the Horny Thieves
description: Welcome, Weary Traveler, to the most Glorious Flesh Market in Black Rock City! Uli Baba and the Horny Thieves, also known as Uli Baba's, is a Burning Man theme camp. In addition to the Ten Principles, our guiding inspiration is hospitality. We are always honored to serve our guests, even while subjecting them to cruel humiliation, voluntary servitude, and wanton drunkenness. Our gorgeous Moroccan tents are lushly furnished with wall-to-wall rugs, benches, and more pillows than you can count. They play host to events throughout the week. Check the What Where When guide for our Auctions and Bizarre Bazaar full of arts and crafts, personal growth workshops, dancing, and more. Ours is a hard-working group of camp mates who come together to create a Moroccan oasis in Black Rock City.
landmark: Large Moroccan tent about 45x30 light cream&black

name: Wrongtown
description:
Wrongtown is an international family reunion gathering year round at events around the globe including Burning Man which is the main event! We have members on almost every Continent and from all walks of life.

Our goal is to create a community space for our friends and family to experience the playa to its fullest. The camp works together to provide everything needed to survive on the playa including an amazing chill space, equipped kitchen, covered tent city and camp showers. While Wrongtown provides the infrastructure, everyone is expected and counted on to work, to build, strike and keep things running during the event including internal camp operations as well as running interactivity.

Providing everything to survive allows our campmates to focus on amazing projects and epic performances
landmark: Wrongtown Metal sign, vertical flags around border

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a salon on the Enlightenment model—a forum for the exchange of creative ideas. We seek inspiration in sunlight by burning bright and clean. The one trace we leave is good karma. We invite the BRC community to visit our plush and welcoming Do-Me Domes, audition for silent-movie stardom, be transformed by our life-changing Healing Faire, engage in interactive workshops, try on a new look at our atelier, or feast with us on vulvular waffles or sacramental cheese. We offer a safe space to decompress, meet new humans, and reconnect with yourself. We also welcome power-hungry devices and depleted batteries that can be filled at our solar charging station!
landmark: red-topped Domes and bright yellow container

name: BuddhaCamp @ the Lotus Dome
description: Our mission is to share the principles of radically inclusive Buddhism and mindfulness with the playa - along with meditation, self-awareness, love and compassion for self and others. We also serve delicious coffee in our cheerful cafe to fuel your adventures.
landmark: Buddha truck & Lotus Dome

name: Camp Shenanigans&Agains&Agains
landmark: Rubber Chickens & Disco Balls

name: Suburbia
description:
Here at Suburbia, we are putting our efforts into bringing that same tacky suburban culture to Black Rock City. New and old burners will be able to see one of the most disgusting/ugly parts of society in the urban sprawl of the 'default world' displayed in a beautiful and enjoyable way. From the moment someone spots Suburbia, they will see a typical suburban neighborhood, but the with Burning Man principles close to heart. We hope that through this subverted lens, participants will appreciate Black Rock City for more than an escapism from their daily lives, but also an opportunity to encompass the Burning Man principles into their everyday lives when they return to the 'default world'

Hometown: Portland Oregon
landmark: SUBURBIA cul de sac with 8 tiny houses

name: Gnometopia
description:
Stop by any afternoon to partake in some Gnometivities:
Sing some Gnome songs
Hear a Gnome talk
Get a Gnome massage while listening to Gnome harp
Trade Gnome outfits
Complete a Gnome Quest

Join us for Gnome Night on Thursday night as we explore the playa together as a flock of Gnomes.

There's Gnome telling what will happen at Gnometopia!
landmark: Gnometopia flag and white dome

name: Brain Freeze Camp
description: We will be back again in 2023 serving the coldest frozen margaritas on the Playa. Our amusement center will certainly entertain you and Power to the People will be available to help keep your electrical devices charged.
landmark: Tall Neon Margarita Glass and Flame Effects

name: Deoxidized
description: Deoxidized is a global oasis on playa that hosts intentional gathering space, a soul series, and endless opportunities for diverse connections with people from around the world.
landmark: Tall green tent and colorful sparkling light pole.

name: NØRSE CODE
landmark: Black and white Saga flag

name: Mos Eisley Village
description:
Mos Eisley... 
You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy. 

We must be cautious.
landmark: Flagging+large banners (8x10') that say Mos Eisley

name: DustyDelight
description: Come cool off with fresh ice cream and frozen facials while dancing to our incredible melodic techno DJs spinning atop our sexy art car Double-D! Join the festivities Tuesday-Saturday 1-5pm.
landmark: Large ice cream cone atop the box truck

name: BeeYond!
description:
BeeYond: We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more, indeed moving BeeYond: Bees! 

We rely on serious energy, creativity, love, and silly shenanigans to keep our love flowing.

We seek to inspire, proselytize, and lead by spreading our love and care for our fair Black Rock City. This shows in our efforts to be a clean green camp, in the way we BUZZ people (imagine a buzzing vibrating swarm!) in the way we welcome all passersby into our NectarSector to escape the sun or onto our Mutant Vehicle the Red Hot Beverly and most of all how we love each other and all we meet!
landmark: 15 foot tall sign metal lit sign saying BeeYond!

name: Battle Born Burners
description: Vintage Nevada Themed Bar and Casino -  Come Play, Drink and lounge with us.  The Bar with Nevadatude!  BRC's only Casino! High-end Cocktails, Entertainment, Gambling and other sillyness! The Loosest Sluts on the playa.  BRC's most liberal blackjack table!
landmark: Battle Born Burner Banner and Marquee

name: Nipple Crime
description: Nipple crime is a Reno based theme camp dedicated to memorable experiences. Come have a drink at our extensive home-brewed bar while you decorate your Nipples. Friday's Sensual Hotdog eating contest is our biggest event and won't disappoint. We are mostly a day camp but often have small parties well into the morning.
landmark: 2000 square foot shade structure that is made up of checkered red and white squares

name: LEGENDARY Playground of the Gods
description: The Legendary Playground of the Gods is a place for learning, authentic connection, and celebrating life. This is a place to remember that we are all Divine, Infinite & Immortal beings simply wearing the disguise of being human. Come and find an oasis from the desert, find rest in the shade, get frozen treats and feast on a week of inspired offerings in workshops, classes, music, and entertainment designed to feed your soul. Welcome Home.
landmark: Giant colorful dome filled with joyful people.

name: Camp Fingerbang
description: Fingerbang is a rowdy crew of cheerleaders, athletes, and coaches who love to play, dance, and cheer for YOU!  Come grab a megaphone and heckle from the top of our Bleachers.  Join us for Hoppy Homecoming, naughty cheers, riotous games of Burner Family Feud and Porn Spelling Bee, cold drinks and dancing your face off at the Go Fuck Yourself Saloon, and our Cheer Gear and Couture Jockstrap Boutique.  Don't miss our truly epic Wednesday Pep Rally, complete with pom-poms, whistles, cheering, dancing & general mayhem.
landmark: Wooden sign in Varsity Font "Team Fingerbang"

name: Hakuna Matata
landmark: Wooden entry gate with two colorful cubes around

name: Second Rodeo
description:
Howdy, y'all!
Second Rodeo welcomes any and all participants to enjoy cheeky and fun rodeo-themed activities, offerings, and wild hoedowns!  If it ain't a party you seek, we also specialize in providing self care amenities to those seeking respite. 
Let us prove to you that this isn't our first rodeo!  Come as you are, every one of y'all!
Yeeeeehaw!
landmark: Lit Hexagonal Shade Structure, "Second Rodeo" neon

name: The Last Mercantile
description:
Where should you go before you hit the Esplande and disappear for hours never actually getting to where you intended to go?? Come on in and kick off your boots for a minute or hour at The Last Mercantile. We have a friendly, or not so friendly, barkeep who will be happy to serve you a refreshing specialty cocktail.
For those looking to rest and recharge, hop on over to our Spaaah and relax with a spritz of essential oils, nature sounds and put on a face mask and forget where you were actually going.

On our shelves of all things mystery, you can take essential items easily forgotten.

And as always, watch out for our pop-up events and resident sheriff...
landmark: 2 story scaffold with white sails and parachute

name: Free Photography Zone
description: Free Photography Zone, for 26 consecutive years has photographed and given actual prints to all who wish to be photographed.  Please join us in continuing this long standing BM tradition and participating in this long standing tradition.
landmark: Well lit red walls displaying large B/W photos.

name: Firelight Film & Lemonade Retreat
description: Firelight Film and Lemonade Retreat: Come escape to our inclusive oasis for cold lemonade and warm interaction. Our retreat is designed for you to pause, reflect, and converse. Join us for funny and entertaining movie shorts and the Ring of Chill Fire. Escape, recharge and commune.
landmark: yellow lemonade stand with 16ft banner and flags

name: Catmandu
description: Catmandu is a group of diverse friends who love dumplings, music, and cats. Join us on playa for activities throughout the week like prom, pickles & tatts, and a cat creation station.
landmark: Large dome and Cat LED sign

name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
description: Hungry! Hung over? You've been hankerin' for something warm in your belly? Swing on by Camp Delicioso and Crêperie, where you'll find an International collective of foodies who'll entertain and serve you the best damn OG French crêpe in Black Rock City.  EST 2007 We've got sweet and savory flavors that'll satisfy even the most discerning Playa palate.  And while the crêpes are cooking, and the coffee is grinding, we'll serve up a saucy dance music set too! 9ish to 1ish Tue, Wed and Thu If you miss us giving you crêpe, come on over anyway.  We have various events happening in our new Lampshade Lounge throughout the week Tue - Fri.
landmark: Giant RED Lampshade that towers over 15ft

name: Dusty Bottoms
landmark: Red & tan shade structure & yellow lace pants flag

name: Mission Country Club
description: We bring a taste of San Francisco's Mission District to Black Rock City! Mission Country Club is an organically-grown camp, consisting of folks from all over - San Francisco, Reno, Los Angeles, Washington DC, Boston, New York, Seattle, Portland, Ireland, Germany, Belgium and beyond. We've been kicking it on playa since 2004 and over the years we've been home to Flannagan's Pub, Flannagan's Tacos + Whiskey, the Magic Kurry Cart, the Sangria Soundclash, the BRC Hip-Hop Playa Ball, the Brian Brunch and Bugaboo the art car. Don't forget to check the book for our 2024 shenanigans! We can't wait to be home with all of you!
landmark: Big orange and red "Mission Country Club" banner

name: Birth-Day Camp
description:
Come celebrate your Birth-Day with us. We are throwing a Birth-Day party with the '70s, '80s, '90s hits for you to practice your Radical Self-Expression. Dance your way up to our bar for your Birth-Day Vodka shot and receive a gift. And if you came in your Birth-Day suit, you've earned a double shot or 2 gifts. We will also be hosting a game of Naughty Pornhole and Pin the Tail on Whatever or Whoever while you listen to the music on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday. 

Join us on Friday night for a Neon lights Birth-Day party. We will be hosting the best dressed Curiouser and Curiouser Theme and gifting a prize.
landmark: Two 4ft birthday cake inflatables.

name: Camp Tidy
description: Welcome to Camp Tidy! Enjoy a proper cuppa tea and peruse our extensive collection of literature in the Tea and Porn lounge. Relax in the Playa Cloud. Recharge yourself and your devices with our solar powered charging station.
landmark: "Tea & Porn" shade structure + 16'x16' dance floor

name: Dusty Frogz
description:
At Dusty Frogz, we believe burning man is a dream in which we get for a week the opportunity to be completely free, to let our imagination go wild, to try new things and make new friends. After 10 years in BRC, we are evolving into a sex-positive camp that will provide a safe space for people to get out of their comfort zone and embrace liberation and celebration of the body, the mind, the emotions, and the soul, as part of a growth journey.
We offer morning workshops and evening kinky parties during the week. We are also a European camp, with our burners coming primarily from France, Sweden, Germany and Spain. We are very easy to find, just look out for our 28ft tall Eiffel Tower, et voila!
landmark: 12 metter (28ft) Eiffel Tower illuminated at night

name: Roadside Distraction
description: Roll up for a hub of spectacular sidetracks and ridiculous world record breaking stations! Give it your all to set a record for "Most Clothespins Pinned to the Face in One Minute", "Speed Kissing", or "Most Animal Sounds Identified". With renowned attractions in our Chamber of Wonders, including the soul-searching experience of Burning Man's Darkest Room, the mesmerizing optical illusions and sensory delights within the Hall of Oddities, and a whimsical Give-One-Take-One Gift Shop, there's something for everyone at Roadside Distraction.
landmark: public structure made of multiple trampolines

name: Dragons Nest
description: Dragons Nest is a home to mythical creatures from all cultural timelines. We are benevolent beings of power, boundless and infinite. We aspire to inspire ourselves and others to push beyond our self imposed limitations through a container of love, support, creativity, radical expression, radical self honesty, and compassion. Shifting from alone to all one, nowhere to now here, we surrender to love and common-unity. Melting hearts into gooey puddles of joy.
landmark: A lotus event tent, teepee, teahouse, a big dragon

name: Awkward & Tawdry Lounge
description: Part bar. Part lounge. Part sing. Part dance. Part chill. Part Shoot Your Balls Off. 100% Awkward & Tawdry.
landmark: Shoot Your Balls Off sign with flame effects.

name: Astral Outpost
description:
Astral Outpost is a place where the ethereal meets the earthly. We invite you to transcend the ordinary and explore the depths of the cosmos. At Astral Outpost, you may encounter a diverse array of beings - stargazers, scientists, engineers, activists, spiritual seekers and cosmic voyagers. 

Engage in thought-provoking dialogues during our Salon Talks or simply bask in the company of like-minded souls as you enjoy a curious ice cream crafted to awaken your senses and ignite your imagination.

Whether you're delving into astral projection or simply seeking a refuge on your journey, Astral Outpost offers a sanctuary where the boundaries between the physical and metaphysical blur, and the journey of self-discovery knows no bounds. Join us as we embark on a voyage through the cosmos.
landmark: We will have a camp sign, Astral Outpost

name: The Lavender Lounge
description: Welcome to The Lavender Lounge! Come in out of the sun and receive a relaxing scalp massage while we mist you with lavender scented water. Lie back on an air mattress and take a few moments to slow down and enjoy yourself. You will leave feeling fresh, alive, and with just a bit more pep in your step! Open 11am-2pm Mon-Fri
landmark: Large silver tent with purple flags out front

name: Lovin' Oven
description:
In the middle of the desert: hot, dry and dusty, we bake bread. Every morning. Just for you!
Let us feed, host and entertain you. Enjoy our freshly baked bread, delight in our fresh mint tea and revel in all kinds of eclectic mid-morning entertainment. Nourish your body, soothe the soul, and awaken to the day with joy.

Since 2011 we've been serving hungry, dusty, lovely Burners hot Tuscan Flatbread served with any array of tasty toppings, including some vegan loaves everyday and freshly brewed mint tea.
landmark: 22 foot tripod and Neon Lovin Oven 'toast' sign

name: The Astral Social Club
description: A home on the playa for experimental, ambient, acoustic, classical and celestial music. Indulge in our house made elixirs and tinctures at our non-alcoholic bar; let your consciousness slip through our transdimensional portal. Elevate and expand.
landmark: the 25ft tall pyramidal aerial rig covered in LEDs

name: Servants of the Secret Fire
description: Servants of the Secret Fire have been bringing dazzling LED and fire art to playa while hosting fire spinning jams and flow workshops since 2015. Come check out our library, dance to our DJ sets, or cuddle puddles beneath a glowing canopy of >14000 LEDs - look for the burgundy/red/orange/yellow dome!
landmark: "Secret Fire" sign, purple-red-orange-yellow dome

name: Creation Nation BRC
description: Creation Nation BRC is a radical survival camp where all of our campers provide for their own needs. As a camp, we provide interactivity with Black Rock City citizens through giving many hands-on art projects as well as informational talks. We also provide a few 24/7 interactivity items on the frontage which gets us involved in discussions and socializing with our fellow burners for photos and the like.
landmark: Large banner - 2 feather-flags - lit sign board.

name: Side Boob
description: The "side boob" has long been disparaged as trashy. But why? Come join us at Side Boob and let your side boob out on the dance floor or cuddle up with one of our camp members and share a bit of your inner "side boob" – a part of you that you don't always feel like you can share. We promise, no matter how trashy you think it is, we appreciate all parts of you. We are an eclectic, non-judgmental, life-loving, arms-and-hearts-wide-open group of sometimes trashy people who want to know you better, side boob and all.
landmark: Large "Side Boob" sign

name: Hobo Camp
description: We are a collective that celebrates all things old timey and especially hobo culture, and bring them into the present.  Our campmates have a natural affinity for music, art, and culture from various time periods, in an alternate vision of the past.
landmark: clotheslines with union suits

name: Fix Yr Burn
landmark: Fix Yr Burn sign

name: Camp Orange
description: In 2024, Camp Orange will return to Black Rock City, and our 16-foot tall banana stand will once again tower erect over the Playa — a shining, lighted beacon for all citizens of BRC in search of a place to rest their weary, dusty bananas! Join us for chocolate covered frozen bananas, fruity frozen drinks, silly dance parties, fun and educational sessions inside our cozy dome, or just to hang out and have a good time.
landmark: 16-foot yellow banana stand

name: Furniture Car Rally Camp
description: Furniture Car Rally Camp is a welcoming place for all Furniture Car Owners, Operators and Enthusiasts.
landmark: FCRC marquee sign & 15' tall checkered rally flags

name: Grilled Cheese Incident
description: To the weary wanderers of the playa. May your ventures draw you in with the sounds of String Cheese Incident bellowing down the dusty road. It is there you will be barked into line to grasp your fingers around the cheesiest sandwich beyond the veil of a white out. Don't pass us by,  because we operate incidentally. When the mood moves us, we spark up the griddle. Either way, this will be the best Grilled Cheese of your burn. But remember, it was always better next year.
landmark: Cheesy Orange Lights framing our Camp Frontage

name: Crossroads
description:
Crossroads has worked for a decade to provide entertainment and hospitality in the form of LIVE music, a fully functional bar (with popsicles), a cool (literally) chill space, DJs and amazing late night and daytime parties. Crossroads' unique energy and next-level musical talent draws humongous crowds who come with a serious hunger to sing and dance and drink! 

Meanwhile Mt. Olympus will set you up to romp like the Gods with a queer themed speed dating, queer parody plays, gifting faeries and "impromptu wellness events with a theatrical ancient woo-woo twist"
landmark: Giant lit stage with the skulls & Crossroads sign

name: Frozen Oasis
description: Home of the Dust City Symphony. Shelter from the storm and relax under the misters with a yummy frozen slushy drink and a live classical music performance.
landmark: 50' x 100' x 15' tall trussed shade structure

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: We serve cold alcohol Tiki Punch, for those age 21 and over (ID is required), starting at 11:00am daily. We serve all day and into the night. Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. Stop in and have a seat in shade or where you can get some sun. You are bound to meet someone new and the environment here encourages having conversations. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get "leid";. Come party with us for our 14th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly. Remember nude is not lewd.
landmark: Party Naked Tiki Bar or Welcome to Sin City sign

name: Hot Stuff
description: Drinks served from dawn onward for the thirsty traveler crossing the desert sands. All manner of chilli hot and ice cool refreshments will be on offer accompanied by music from storied DJs from across the savage sands.
landmark: Neon Sign saying "Hot Stuff" nex to stretch tent

name: DUSTFISH
description: DUSTFISH, serving Pho all week, featuring the three planets, playing our own special music. Home of the Church of Drum and Bass.
landmark: The three large Planets.

name: Camp ZaZen
description: Welcome to ZaZen!  Come by and relax in our shade, play our yard games, leave your sins behind in our Cosmic Confessional and grab a cup of Elvis Espresso every morning.  We are a open and welcoming camp excited to meet new and old burners and share the magic of Black Rock together!
landmark: ZaZen Gate + Red Light Cosmic Confessional booth

name: Illuminaughty
description: Illuminate your naughty side! Come visit our naughty carnival Monday-Thursday 4PM-8PM! Challenge yourself to feats of great debauchery! Tuesday and Wednesday, the carnival becomes a riotous party through midnight - just follow the bright lights of our Ball of Light, high in the sky. Come see the Aperiodic Wall, the entrancing optical illusion generator!
landmark: 40 foot tower "Eye of Providence", illuminated

name: You Light Up My Ride
description: Disappointed by a poorly lit bike last night on the playa? Never fear! You Light Up My Bike is here to help and inspire you to fabulously light up your rig! Come visit us to get you bike better lit up and stay for a while and share a deep laugh or two.
landmark: A Glowing "You Light Up My Ride" sign

name: Camp Obelix
description: Your new favorite hole-in-the-wall! Camp Obelix is a motley crüe of fuckos, gentle jerks and geriatric juveniles from the US, Canada, and other places we weren't taught about in school. Come spend an afternoon at the Turbo Bar and enjoy an ice-cold-adjacent glass of Turbo Juice. We're not sure what's in it but we know it's got the goods to make you go, 'what? why would someone enjoy this?' Test your mettle in the inaugural Black Rock City Hobby Horse Championship and Non-Fetishization Event - a daring obstacle course that challenges the bond between beast and man. Or stop by in the evening to catch a show (or join one) at Crickets! Comedy Stage, our open mic ripped right out of an 80s cliché.  And remember, if you're not 100% satisfied, we hate you.
landmark: Stage and brick-wall printed vinyl backdrop

name: Shuttlecocks
description: Welcome to Shuttlecocks, where we're bringing Badminton back. Our playa court is open by noon into the evening from  Monday to Saturday for pick up play. Come on by, grab a racquet and have a go! Don't miss our Tuesday BADminton cheeky happy hour and Friday afternoon tournament where you can challenge your fellow burners. Whether you're showing off your killer smash, whacking a few birdies, or relaxing with a refreshing Pimms cup and a cool misting, there's something for everyone.
landmark: Lit up shuttlecock sculpture and badminton court

name: Retire-Bees
description: Our camp will be offering a rooftop deck atop the Bombus Regius Steampunk Airship Art Car ( docked for the summer ) stationed Esplanade within The Hive Village. Our upper deck event space will host a variety of events such as Karaoke, Dark and Stormy Story telling events, Tabletop and RPG daytime. The lower deck features a Tiki Bar plus some Fancy Festive and Fun pedal powered Rickshaws that will ferry guests from camp to the playa for adventures and Tiki Light Totems.
landmark: Giant Light Up Steampunky Pirate Tiki Boat !

name: Skrambles**!*
description: Born from chaos and tempered by confusion, now a respectable bar and lounge! Home of the best Bloody Mary on playa (accepting all challengers) and the shrine to Elijah Wood.
landmark: 10 ft palm trees

name: Burning My Crêpe
description: Lighting up the Playa since 2018 with the best flamed crêpes you'll ever eat. Made from scratch by people from Brittany (crêpe's original birthplace), you'll be mesmerized by our pole dancers while enjoying our crêpes in our cozy living room!
landmark: huge black and white flags similar to the US flag

name: BigAssWaffles
description: Serving up BigAssWaffles and drinks for breakfast and lunch
landmark: BigAssWaffle Statue on the curb

name: Desert Power
description: We are "Dune" fans, nuts, and aficionados. Come gush, discuss, or passionately argue about "Dune" with us. Bless the Maker and His water!
landmark: 'Desert Power' sign

name: Hōme
description: Home is an oasis on the playa where we invite your inner child to come dance barefoot and connect with new and old friends through taking care of one another.
landmark: Home pastel sign, white mailbox & astro turf lawn

name: Cingulata Camp
description: Cingulata Camp, home of Cingulata MV and the playa's best gourmet grilled cheese sandwiches.
landmark: 2 bamboo poles with streamers

name: Soon to be Infamous
description: Your burn is Soon to Be Infamous!  Stop by and decorate a flag with your playa name and address during our Don't Fucking Leave Your Fucking Bike on the Fucking Playa! Bicycle Flag Creation Station Events and help us end bikicide, the careless abandonment of an innocent bike to wither and die on the playa.
landmark: red flag and illuminated red dildo on top

name: camp do nothing
description: Camp Do Nothing - the camp that's actually doing the opposite of its name! Come take in a 360 view of the playa on our swing (yep, you'll be hanging 35 feet upside down!), climb on and into the foam dome, or come have a seat and some conversation with burners from all over.
landmark: The giant 360 swing and Camp Do Nothing sign

name: Wanderlust
description: Welcome to our Moroccan Themed Oasis in the Desert.  Come join us for our fun activities.  We look forward to seeing you on the Playa!!!
landmark: Neon lit Wanderlust sign next to Sultry Lodge HUB

name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
description:
Black Rock Disc Golf Club has a mushroom-themed disc golf course which embraces fun, games, friendly competition, collaboration, and creativity. We provide a place where folks can join together and throw one of the custom stamped discs loaned out at the camp. You can win one at one of our tournaments or events! The course is accessible 24/7, and discs glow in the dark so don't hesitate to swing by late night/early morning for a round. 


We also have some mushroom hazards on the course! We have tall ones, small ones, ones that glow, and ones that show you what disc golf is all about. It's definitely a psychedelic experience to walk through, even if you aren't in the mood to play a round. Just make sure to listen for the call of, "FORE!"
landmark: Disc golf baskets, mushroom sculptures, blacklight

name: Mo's Mini Martini + Erotica Camp
description: Mohammeds serves the coldest martinis and the hottest erotica on the playa. Come and join us for an ice cold martini in a REAL martini glass and,if the spirit moves you,write down your own true erotic tale in our 400 year old book filled with the derring do's of other Black Rock Citizens. We are open after lunch until the camels go to bed(around midnight).
landmark: bedouin tent ,giant lit martini glass in the sky

name: ClusterF*ck United
description: Dust, Sun, Booze, Bikes, Night, and Noise–it's a ClusterF*ck out there and that's exactly what you'll find here: a ClusterF*ck of activity where chaos meets collaboration in the heart of the playa! Our camp is a vibrant and diverse community of Burners from around the globe, coming together to celebrate the spirit of Burning Man in our own unique and unconventional ways. Look for our brightly-lit ✽ marquee!
landmark: Giant silver asterisk marquee and our camp banner

name: Healing Foot Wash Life Truth Love
description: Life, Truth, Love: Come sit under our cooling shade canopy and get your feet washed, dried and moisturized in a tranquil and calming environment. After you have received this gift, you are invited to participate as well. We are actively building world peace and community.
landmark: Healing Foot Wash banner, camp flag w/ footprints

name: Dragon's Wonderland
landmark: Dragon's Wonderland flag

name: NuTz Camp
description: Here comes the sun. Beautiful beats and positive vibrations overflow the Playa at NuTz Sunrise Parties. C'mon!
landmark: Multicolor triangle shade structure and NuTz sign

name: Apotheosis
hometown: Monkey Hut w/ peeps handing out coffee and fruits
description: 4' x 8' APOTHEOSIS SIGN IN FRONT OF A 25' WIDE BY 12' TALL ARCHED TENT OPEN ON BOTH ENDS.
landmark: LARGE TAN ARCHED TENT OPEN ON BOTH ENDS

name: Deco Fish
description: The Deco Fish Twins Art Cars were built in 2016 in West Oakland, California. These nautical wonders were designed and fabricated by a dedicated team of artists and craftsfolk that continue to maintain and improve upon them each year.  Owners Andy Tannehill & Kimberly Medici worked with the founder of their former collaborative Burning Man Camp, Star Star Roadhouse, to creatively direct how the Deco Fish would best allow groups of people with bikes to enjoying amazing sound you can feel in your heart while still being able to chat and dance freely on a gorgeous platform with bright psychedelic kaleidoscopic lighting.
landmark: 4ft x 4ft "Deco Fish Art Car" Sign

name: Major Tom's Flying Circus
description: Want to take a flight over the Playa? Come see us at Major Tom's to participate in fun games and try for your chance to win a golden bracelet - your ticket to the front of the line at the airport. Think Twister Shots, Jenga Jaunt, Musical Chairs, Dildo Olympics and Paper Airplane races! We also host fun happy hours with a bar, music, and snacks.
landmark: Banner, mini circus tents, fixed microlight wing

name: Champagne Lounge
description: Welcome to the Champagne Lounge! Amidst Black Rock City's hustle, our oasis offers luxurious relaxation. Step into our elegantly adorned shade, sip champagne poured by less than knowledgeable bartenders, and recline on plush playa-tech or mingle with fellow Burners. As the sun sets, enjoy twinkling lights and ambient music for a magical atmosphere. Cheers to the extraordinary!
landmark: blue and white shade cloth

name: Camp P3
description: Join us as we spiral ever outward in unending discovery of where the highway of radial participation intersects with the great canal of radical inclusion. Camp P3 is  'be your best self' boutique clothing gifters, Gin and tonic  aficionados, and Nitro Coffee moguls hell bent on emblazoning your brain.  We are also simply the hosts of the world's largest white Wedding Dress Wednesday procession complete with a mass wedding ceremony? Don't ask us, we don't even know what our camp name means… Perhaps it means something different to each of us.  Come visit us and find out what P3 means to you.
landmark: Priscilla: A coffee-scented, artful motorhome

name: Arctic Squeeze
description: Come on by for Cornhole and Treats!
landmark: Cornhole and Costco Carports

name: Bad Idea
description: Welcome to the Bad Idea, where we proudly present the Thumberdome! Picture a tiny cage filled with contestants in equally tiny costumes, ready for the ultimate test of strength – thumb wrestling! Join scheduled tournaments, craft miniature costumes, or attend thumb wrestling workshops. Stay alert for spontaneous challenges and special appearances by renowned thumb wrestlers. Embrace the absurdity, laughter, and warmth of our camp – whether you're a participant or spectator, there's never a dull moment at Bad Idea!
landmark: 10ft tall happy cyclops + light pole, 16ft geodome

name: Street Life Hip Hop on the Playa
description: When Hip Hop hit Sesame Street, sunny days'd have beats on repeat. Where clouds sweep away on dance floor, old-school sounds make hearts soar. Follow the groove, vibes shining bright. Welcome to Street Life, day or night.
landmark: Big White Shade Tent with Cookie Monster in front

name: Fairy Shrimpy Camp
description: When the rains fall on the playa there is no time to waste; the fairy shrimp must get it on and procreate post haste! Pulling on an ovisac will pop an egg into your hands where your very own new fairy shrimp awaits creative plans.    Come to "Fairy Shrimpy Camp" Monday through Thursday afternoons (1-4pm) to personalize a fairy shrimp of your own and maybe learn something new about these critters and their friends!
landmark: Polka Dotted Fairy Shrimp

name: Peanut Butter Jellyfish
landmark: Under the sea geodesic dome with giant disco ball

name: 1001 Nights
description: 1001 Nights is a desert sanctuary where anyone who enters our dome is immediately welcomed, acknowledge and heard. We offer Makateeb where you can enjoy an Arabic coffee/tea while writing out your story for our treasure chest.  Once done, you can reach in and read a story left behind. In our main dome we will have DJs, musical acts, spoken word nights, movies under the stars, etc. The dome is decked out with foam flooring, mattresses, cushions, pillows, blankets and low top tables.  So one minute it can be our dancefloor and the next minute our lounge. Whatever the offering, we want people to feel like 1001 nights gives rest to weary souls desperate to recharge.  It should feel like you would want to stay with us for at least 1001 actual nights.
landmark: Big Dome with geometric fabric pattern

name: StarFist
description:
StarFist's infamous international tea service. Mon-Sat 2-5pm – serving a delightful selection of hot and cold infusions from around the world as we pamper and delight our guests. Offering a refuge from heat and dust, unparalleled hospitality and secret surprises for the lucky few. 

Morning meditation/yoga sessions every day at 11:11am and our fascinating evening StarFist Lecture Series, exploring a range of thought-provoking topics and stirring debate in our sumptuous StarFist Lounge.
landmark: 2 containers and pink/orange flags lining the road

name: At the Oasis
description: A large 30' x 20' wide Moroccan-style tent with keyhole openings that houses a chill space, 24/7 cold water and lemonade and jewelry making.
landmark: Moroccan-style open to front w/ keyhole openings

name: Caffeine Oasis
description: Rise up, travelers, it's time to shine! Caffeine Oasis embraces the warmth and spirit of the Sun. We welcome you to gather with friends in our cozy space and enjoy freshly made sun tea and cold brew coffee every morning from 8 to 10. You can also use the heat of your body to transform magical thermochromic fabric into beautiful artwork that is both immediate and fleeting.
landmark: Orange + yellow flags + "Caffeine Oasis" banner.

name: METAL MIMI
description: Metal Sculpture and Flame Garden
landmark: Metal Lighted Sign that reads METAL MIMI

name: Short Bus Coffee Camp
landmark: Yellow Short Bus, white tent with purple curtains

name: Joyism
description:
We've been a presence at Burning man for 20 years, as Joyism and as a part of Silicon Village, with many people coming up to the art car recognizing it from the past, and coming by our area later to explore as they search for coffee and interaction.
Our coffee kitchen regularly generates lines of people from every corner of the Playa for hours every morning, with hundreds served. We take our coffee seriously!
This year, hundreds of people will interact with our "One Pill makes you Smaller, and One Pill makes you Tall" exhibit, and our "Joyism Cares" tent hands out sunscreen, condoms, pain relievers, hydration and advice.  We may have wifi available for those in dire need.  Come say Hi!!!
landmark: 20 feet pyramid tower and Joyism Flag

name: Wetspot
description: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy our infamous Skip and Go Naked cocktail, our super spicy tequila or a cold draft beer. Our beverages are served on tap from our refrigerated trailer. Always fresh and super cold! Wetspot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: consuming libations.
landmark: Large Saloon Doors and Wetspot Flag

name: Knotty By Nature
description:
Knotty by Nature will help you survive and thrive on playa and beyond! 
Our knot-tying workshops will teach you a variety of ways to get yourself into or out of a literal bind. 
Our sober hangouts offer calm, peaceful opportunities for you to regroup, recenter, and re-caffeinate so you can be your absolute best Burning version of yourself. 
Our camp and activities are accessible to Burners of all ages and can accommodate a wide range of ability levels. 
Come to Knotty by Nature if you are ready to laugh, learn and connect!
landmark: Giant arch and Knotty by Nature sign

name: Jive Joint
description: The Jive Joint is a full improvised, unrehearsed, and interactive music and comedy experience you dont want to miss! Come to the Center Camp Plaza for "Genius Hour"  starring Super Tall Paul, Rossome, and Sethward!
landmark: vintage Scamp camper trailer - very small camp.

name: SLOW
description: SLOW is an art support camp for the installation with the same name on playa. When you feel the need to slow down and do some handmade embroidery, come by! We will have one of the flags always ready to be filled with your creativity!
landmark: white flag with a stitched lettering: "SLOW"

name: Camp Codename
description: Join Camp Codename for delicious savory AND sweet Pizza, joy, and connection at What Brings You Joy
landmark: Camp Codename Sign and Pizza Cart

name: Project Awake
description:
"Awake" emerges from the collective imagination of a group of inspired individuals, bound by creativity and a shared vision. 
Our mission? To awaken hearts to the power of love and elevate consciousness. It represents the bridge between our human existence and our transcendent realm, showing that love is the ultimate answer and urging a collective transcendence beyond ego. In a world craving for healing, "Awake" stands as a symbol of hope, offering a pathway towards enlightenment and unity.
This installation is more than art; it's a catalyst for change.
We invite everyone to let down the ego, open your heart and join this journey. Stand with us in spreading love and light. Together, we can forge a new path for our world, one filled with love, peace and collective well-being. We are AWAKE!
landmark: PROJECT AWAKE sign

name: Anonymous Village
landmark: Anonymous Village Marquee Sign

name: The Pleasure Dairy
description: Finally, what you've been waiting for! A Burning Man Camp that reimagines the little-known historic phenomenon of pleasure dairies! Think Marie Antoinette but in the Wild West. A place where you can never have too many cows or cow puns. At high noon be udderly refreshed by dairy-alternative craft cocktails at our bar, The Tits,  and spend some time in the shade nourishing your connections at our message-in-a-bottle service. And after sundown, explore our LED cactus garden and let our art events titillate and amoos you. Moo-la-la!
landmark: western fences and 'The Pleasure Dairy' sign

name: Blank Slate
description: Camp Blank Slate will repair your bike day or night, provide sounds to get you to move your feet, drinks to wet your whistle, and insults that'll remind you of when Burning Man was cool again. Come on by for a history lesson into Burning Man, and learn about our founder, Larry David!
landmark: dome with shade sails, tent with bar in the center

name: Risa
description: Risa is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, clothing optional beaches and friendly atmosphere. In the afternoon you can enjoy one of our snow cones and lounge in our enclosed kooled area. In the evening come eat, drink, sing, dance, play your instrument and be merry around the fire and enjoy our art.
landmark: 2 20' Yurts side by side with a RISA sign

name: Playa Art Park Support
description: A camp to support the Playa Art Park, a place to enjoy smaller art in a cozy setting.
landmark: The Playa Art Park lamp out front

name: EBB & Glow Village
description:
Come get your glow on at EBB & Glow Village! 

Come into the BRC Piano Bar to quench your thirst, enjoy live music or get on stage yourself for karaoke or a jam. Learn how to ride a OneWheel at Keeping it Wheel. Enjoy morning yoga or evening cocktails and DJs on the SkyDeck. Get your gorgeous playa portrait shot by pros at Just Shoot Me in the Dust. Broken bike? Come to Cranky and Sons Bike Repair. Hop a ride on the Peter Panda mutant vehicle.  Or just hang out at our beautiful boutique Dream Inn. All this and more!
landmark: EBB+GLOW neon block letters

name: FOMO Camp
description:
FOMO victims, are you looking for the best experience at BRC and want to be sure you don't miss anything?
Are you looking for a way to get rid of that fear of missing out?
Come discover and contribute to the wall of the best BM activities.
Better than that: come and meet our team who will perhaps reveal to you the secret to never having FOMO again !
landmark: the sign and the flag "FOMO Camp" on our frontage

name: LAF Lazy-Ass Fuckers
landmark: LAF banner, Playa Artifacts Museum

name: Things That Swing
description: We're Things That Swing, out of Montreal. That's right, we've got hammocks, pendulums, even a swinging sofa. Mosey on over to our colorful domes during the day for comfort, care and good conversation… Oui, nous parlons français aussi! Join us for consensual touch and movement beneath our shaded workshop dome. Or drop by for Octomassage to give and receive an eight-handed massage. Ooh lala!
landmark: Swing outlined w/rope lights; 2 colorful domes

name: Lituanica Birds
description:
We are Lituanica Birds Camp, a community that travels across the ocean to Black Rock City, bringing with us a cascade of ideas, energy, and love. Inspired by the freedom and grace of birds, our camp is a home to the endless journey of exploration. At our core, we believe in the beauty of connection with nature, others, and with oneself. 
Our camp offers welcoming spaces where every visitor is invited to embark on a personal voyage of discovery. Through a variety of activities and experiences designed to inspire and engage, we encourage everyone to celebrate the natural world and delve deeper into their own inner landscapes.
Stop by Lituanica Birds Camp to find a community where warmth meets wonder. Here you'll find a sanctuary for reflection, connection, and the shared joy of exploration.
landmark: Illuminated Bird atop High Pole & a lot of Flag

name: Pablos Crusty Creatives
description: Inclusive art support camp. Always looking for wayward, collaborative arts
landmark: colored mannequins on the street in front of camp

name: In Queso Emergency
landmark: White In Queso Emergency LED Sign

name: Giants Workshop
description: We could be anything…
landmark: Giants Workshop sign and scaffolding

name: RNV Camps
description:
We are a Village of several long time camps from many nations and nationalities based in the Pacific Northwest. 

We are a diverse village that provides a wide number of interactive events. We will have DJ's playing diverse genres, host massage workshops and seminars, teach fire spanking, teach and dance the Bollywood spectacular, hold TED type talks, and provide our famous Tutu making tutorial with all the materials you need for an amazing tutu. We will be serving Kona coffee and Espresso. Come join us!
landmark: The Comfort Lounge with the sign Rogue Nation sign

name: Caffeination Station
description: Full service fueling
landmark: Gas station fuel price sign

name: Hold That Thought
description: A space dedicated to self-discovery, revelation and radical self-love.  Our mission is to support burners in articulating the transformative nature of their experience and preserving it for later incorporation.
landmark: Hold That Thought Sign

name: Sunset Lounge
description:
Sunset Lounge and Frick Frack Black Jack, you know us and you love us.
Up to our usual shenanigans .. Come find us!
landmark: Large LED Arch and 3 green lasers

name: Funky Town
landmark: Large tan-colored, triangle-shaped shade

name: Hibernaculum
description: Care to get shot in the box? Get dizzy on the Bat Go Round? Savor Bat Coffee? Emulate a continent? Harvest a dream? How about a late night movie or licking your lips with Bat Blueberry Pancakes? At the Hibernaculum, serendipity rules! Know what a Hibernaculum is? Come find out.
landmark: Bat-Go-Round, a merry-go-round with bat wings.

name: Serpent Moon
description: Serpent Moon is a diverse camp that celebrates the love and connection of all of humanity. Join us for 10 Principle themed heartfelt yoga and conscious breathwork to revitalize your Burn spirit. Our Serpent Moon art piece is visible during dusk and early nighttime, accompanied by soft beats and easeful smiles. We look forward to early morning movement exploration and moonlit kisses with you.
landmark: Serpent status that are placed in front of camp

name: Electric Gerbil
description: Art support camp for Commune, a deep playa art piece.
landmark: nearby camp, redhead manakin and playa names sign

name: ELEMENTUM
description: Earth. Air. Water. Fire. The place to nurture your nature. Experience the balance and amplification of the four elements through yoga, workshops, sound, and dance parties. We provide flow, connection, and restoration for people of all identities and points of view. Home of the Space Cow People and the MIDNIGHT SAFARI PARTY on Thursday. Magic happens here.
landmark: 2 shipping containers, 2 belle tents, and pastels

name: This Is It
description: This is a camp that serves pancakes and ASL led karaoke.
landmark: 'This Is It' sign, lighted up at night

name: Breakagay Weepubedick
description:
Espresso martinis and wine from 10-2 every day!
Get yourself a new, better Playa Name from our drunk Playa Name Robot.
Engage with Robie the Robot and interact with our phone booths.
landmark: "bar de nom" behind Scottish mannequin on corner

name: The Empress Theme Camp
