landmark: Large, domed, white fabric, shade structure.

name: Lingerie Lounge
description: We will adorn you and adore you, fulfilling all your lingerie and costume needs and dreams! We have a huge inventory of hand-picked, sewn and dyed items, and our attentive camp members will find just the right item for you. Come see us for lingerie and other fabulous and festive items! We serve all sizes, ages, genders, gender identities, gender preferences, race, creed, religion and ethnicity! Our goal is to remind each Burner who visits us that they are beautiful.
landmark: Lingerie Lounge sign and 20 foot beacon

name: Hostel
description: Hostel offers a safe place for consenting couples to have intimate relations for up to one hour(ish), as long as they don't mind the other couples on the other beds.
landmark: Building with HOSTEL neon sign and HOSTEL flag

name: Armageddon Bike Camp
description: It's not the end of the world, it's the safe word! Think Armageddon for all your bike needs. We've been providing Bike Love on-playa for about 15 years, and we offer professional bike repair daily. Or fix your own bike at our Public Bike Repair stations, 24x7! We also host great parties, don't miss our Weds Alley Cat Race and After Party with Funny Bike Demo! Our 28ft dome 'living room' / shade structure provides the perfect hang-out space, no matter the weather. Open to visitors 24x7. Drop in any time!
landmark: 28 ft dome with blue, orange, and yellow cover

name: Nonsense
description: Nonsense is where your imagination manifests a reality. Come experience what has been in your mind all along. We'll portal you to, through, in, and out what has been right in front of you. Unbuckle your mind for safety.
landmark: "Toob" LED sign right off the Street.

name: Chill Ville On The Esplanade
description:
In the heart of Chill Ville, amidst the flickering flames and rustic charm, one finds not merely a bar, but a realm where the boundaries between patron and bartender blur into obscurity, and fire is served! Here, conversations linger like a Deep House beat, fun flows freely as the mighty wind, and the line between stranger and friend dissolves into the ether.

For seven days, the sands of time shift, and the spirit of revelry reigns supreme, beckoning burners to partake in the communal joy that permeates this sacred space.
landmark: wooden 4' CHILL sign, illuminated at night

name: Alice in Slumberland
description:
It's finally our year! The oldest Alice themed bar on the playa is back, but much less Alice-themed than you'd expect!

Known for intricate cocktails and zany decor, this year the bar returns with an extra small bar, an extremely obvious speakeasy, and a bicycle drink and drive through. 
We offer our classic chill lounge with Tarot readings open every afternoon (relaxing space open always). 
In the evenings our drink and drive through becomes a community firepit and fire dancing space, come have conversations with your neighbours.

But careful, you might get trapped in a net if you don't pass our arbitrary DUI checks.
landmark: Large Aluminet Shade Structure with Tarot cards

name: The Factory
description: Step into The Factory, where the froth of creativity bubbles over in our speakeasy, hidden behind the guise of an unassuming costume closet, where creativity and froth bubble over. Indulge in mysterious cocktails and dance at our Gold Jazz Jamboree and Disco Drag Swing Soirée. Vintage outfits, expertly crafted drinks, and soft lights set the stage for a night of shared connections and unexpected delights. Join us for a sip of froth and a step back in time, where every conversation is a whisper and every dance a story untold.
landmark: Large wooden & yellow neon "The Factory" signs

name: Kurenivka
description: "Kurenivka: Reclaiming Home" is our cozy corner at Burning Man, a heartfelt nod to Ukrainian culture amidst the echo of distant turmoil. Here, art and stories weave through the air like the scent of borsch, bridging worlds and warming hearts. It's our way of lifting Ukraine's spirit onto the global canvas, painting strokes of unity, resilience, and hope against the backdrop of challenge. Our gathering is a delicate tapestry of healing and connection, a place where shared moments and cultural treasures light up the path home. We're not just about celebration; we're about coming together to honor our journey, fostering a sense of belonging for all who seek refuge in the embrace of community.
landmark: Ukrainian trident with Man inside

name: Mithyko camp
description: MEXICAN TRADITIONS AND GOOD TEQUILA
landmark: BIG YELLOW LED LIGHT SIGN THAT SAYS MITHYKO

name: The Real Dilla
description: We are a kitchy tiki themed camp that serves quesadillas several times throughout the week. Sporting a large dance area around our Dehydration station aka the bar, we will also have a Hydration station for those looking for a non alcoholic beverage. After working up a sweat dancing come chill out in the Real Chilla Dome, a covered dome cooled to perfection for a cozy mid day snuggle. You might catch is serving hot broth to wayward burners late night from time to time as well!
landmark: Big painted tiki signs!

name: SnowKoanSolar
description: Snow Koan Solar serves snow cones daily, hot dogs very late at night now and then, and provides solar-based power for a number of camps in our HUB. We also have a public charging station where smaller items can be charged.
landmark: Large solar array next to a 40' white trailer

name: Janky Barge
description: Janky Barge is an art car and all the people who made it. We cruise around the desert and have fun and play music we like. You should get on! We'll give you a ride to wherever we were already going.
landmark: 80x40 U-shaped shade w/ burn barrel in front

name: Polaris
description: An international, illuminating, and intergalactic camp, Polaris serves as a shining symbol of radical way finding. Steadfast in our statement to love and care for one another, our coordinates in the constellation of Black Rock City offers a signal to those searching within the starlight.
landmark: 30ft Star on art car

name: Deep Playa Surprise
description: Deep Playa Surprise brings the magic of the Deep Playa to the citizens of Black Rock City by offering daily gifts of culinary and artistic delight. Home to the art installation Docenting Adults, offered to those who wish to take a transformational and artistic journey into Deep Playa.
landmark: Deep Playa Surprise freeway off-ramp style sign.

name: Vines Without Borders
description: A chill international wine bar and lounge open 3- Midnight daily, gifting great chilled wines and snacks from around the world, served by people from around the world.  We celebrate a different wine producing region daily.  Great music, fun people, curated tastings and something new every day.
landmark: VINES logo and wine signs, a hanging wine bottle.

name: Catawampus
description:
As the bass fades and the creaking of your bike becomes audible once again, you turn onto tan unfamiliar street.  Appearing as the breeze sweeps the dust from the ground is a warmly lit wooden cottage, beckoning with firelight and the soft sound of mandolin and laughter.

Catawampus is ramshackle and sincere, just like our group of members, relationships and structures built with love and found materials. We spread the mantra of "magically imperfect", both in our on playa offerings and in our compassion for all people. We tap into the old wisdom, of the land and ancestors, worn but still worthy, to bring comfort and connection to all who venture to our porch. We are askew, perfect in our irregularity, having found a place that only we fit. You will fit too.
landmark: Warmly lit ramshackle witch cottage

name: !* I Taste Purple *!
description: Imagine if Willy Wonka and the Cheshire Cat had a baby—now look for our kaleidoscope of purple colors with our iconic lips and tongue logo. Our camp offers advice, crafting, contests, parties, a "triathlon," yoga, and more. We let our creativity run wild and each year try new things along with our annual favorites. Stop by anytime to join in on our playa family time conversations or come to one of our scheduled activities to smile and make memories. Join us for multiple purple tastings
landmark: double 3ft "I taste purple" sandwich boards

name: Titicaca
description: Come and join us on the mystical shores of the exotic Lake Titicaca and enjoy our Andean hospitality.
landmark: Titicaca sign

name: Electric Cheese Land
description: Electric Cheese Land brings the fun of the Apres-Ski culture to the desert. Yodel songs, cheesy evenings to taste delicious food from the Alps and dance the day away with our Swiss DJs. The "Naked Cheese Nights" will feed the crowd with melted cheese, the "Cheese-n-Chill tent" will provide shelter and entertainment.
landmark: Big purple flag with Cheese and Man

name: Disorient
description: Too Much Is Rarely Enough
landmark: Big Di...

name: Thirst Trap
description: Feeling thirsty? We're bringing playful mischief back to the playa with a game that will have your mouth feeling drier than the playa. But don't worry, at our lush oasis we'll quench your thirst with ice-cold drinks and whimsical vibes.
landmark: pink flags and pink signage indicating Thirst Trap

name: Critical Connections
description: Connections make us a collective being. They are all critical to us. And Puppets.
landmark: We have a 12x8 puppet theater and a 12ft pyramid

name: Mutual Aid
description: A group of humans that are here to party, as well as break down social barriers around wealth & social status. By building community among folks who might never have interacted with each other, we are creating solidarity & pushing against a staus quo of scarcity & exploitation.  That's a lot of words to say come on by for some mending, camraderie, or a stiff drink. Whatever you're after, we can help you find it.
landmark: Community board w/ Glowing "Mutual Aid" sign atop

name: Vibe Check
description:
Vibe Check is an oasis on the playa, here to welcome you in with a cold drink and a shady place to take a load off, or maybe a midnight rager, we're flexible. Pull up for a drink at our swing bar or relax in a hammock while meeting new friends and enjoying some bass.
Happy hour is Wednesday @ 7 with Pain & Pleasure trivia; or If thinking isn't your forte, pop by Monday for Beautify Your Bod – all you need is skin! Thursday will be fire with stargazing & miso soup.
Our group of misfits await you.
landmark: Swing Set Bar with Vibe Check flags

name: Neodebauchery
description: We are a throng of dome-dwelling miscreants, hooligans, bloviators, simps, warlocks, horse girls, diggerfish, and charlatans. As one of the aforementioned groups, your birthright compels you to complete the pilgrimage to the fabled land of Neodebauchery. A melange of tomfoolery new and old, Neodebauchery provides a welcoming space for weirdos of all creeds, colors, and degree of crustiness. Come gyrate to the soothing, yet somehow also abrasive melodies of our human-DJ chimeras, witness visual distortion unlike you have seen (since your last burn) with our procedurally generated Digital Domeflesh, and participate in our daily sinful activities.
landmark: Silver geodesic dome and a large shade structure

name: The Gong Spot
description:
Welcome to The G Spot; you've finally found it! At The Gong Spot, we believe sound, movement, and play have a profound ability to heal, energize, and connect individuals. TGS's mission is to contrast the Burn's high-intensity energy. We offer chill spaces (3 individual lounges) for weary travelers to rest, get out of the sun, or, in last year's case, shelter from the storm. Our scheduled sound baths (we like Gongs) and vibey spaces offer respite, grounding, or a quick nap for hundreds of Burners.

Our air-conditioned sound bath tent doubles as an (almost) 24/7 cuddle puddle lounge and hosts a variety of movement-based interactivity (both whimsical and sensual) throughout the week. Join us, and then tell your friends you've finally found The G-Spot!
landmark: 14ft Belle tent covered in lights w/ LED mushrooms

name: Sound Cabin
description: Sound Cabin Support Camp
landmark: 8' x 2' wooden sign that says Sound Cabin

name: The Balls Depot
description:
Your Neighborhood Balls Improvement Store.

"Do Yourself"
landmark: Orange "The Balls Depot" sign

name: Talent Show Camp
description: Come to our fun little anarcho talent show and show off your talent, your skill, your performance or just do something silly for your friends. We all have a talent and we want to see yours,... or come and watch us perform for you. Everyone is welcome at Talent Show Camp no matter how weird, or strange or made up on the spot your talent might be!
landmark: Large "Talent Show" sign above small wooden stage

name: Playa Circuit Boogie
description: Here at Playa Circuit Boogie we use circuits and science to spark ideas and bring strangers together, all while jamming out to groovy tunes and enjoying a cold beverage from our bar. Come learn the basics of soldering and circuit building; ride away with your very own light-up pendant and the skills to make an even better one next year. And bring us your broken electronics during repair hours, we'll try our best to get them working.
landmark: Orange, purple, and red triangular flags

name: SprackCity!
description: Come get lost in SprackCity! Lose yourself in our hip hop, electronic, & bass music. Find yourself on the dance floor. Enjoy some witty competition in our arcade arena. Rest in our cooled nap dome.
landmark: A large painted archway that says "Sprack City!"

name: Dusty Dillas
description: Experience the Wild Wild West at Dusty Dillas, a Western themed bar and a quesadilla saloon. Here you'll find comfort in assless chaps, refreshing libations, and some cheesy goodness. Come on down for a dusty good time and a chance to spin the wheel to determine your luck in the dust, enter our cornhole tournament, or have a dual at high noon.
landmark: Big Dusty Dillas sign and saloon doors out front.

name: Big Bitty Litty Committee
description: Litty energy with Big Bitty vibes, come hang out and join a Committee of like minded funky individuals.
landmark: Neon signage with the acronym BBLC

name: Dusty Booty Ranch
description: An outpost where misfits fit.
landmark: Scaffolding tower

name: Cirkus freaks
description: Cirkus freaks a freaky group of party animals.
landmark: Bell tent w/ a red and yellow cirkus freaks sign.

name: Boonville Camp
description:
Join us at our Love Lounge: a place to join a meditation, have some tea and tarot, or just chill out.   

We invite you to join us for our Thursday night Cabaret: an old-school spontaneous talent show.
landmark: Purple Boonville sign, Pink Heart light

name: Royal Honey
description: Art is the stored honey of the human soul, gathered on wings of inspiration and transformed into royal jelly by the contributions of many. Royal Honey is a camp with all types of bees that pollinate Playa with art, music, hugs, and love. Connect in our Meadow of Talking Flowers, enjoy sweet nectar from our Pollination Station Bar, lose yourself in our Rabbit Hole, and waggle your booty on our Queen Bee of Hearts Dancefloor.
landmark: oversized flowers and our Royal Honey sign

name: Pepperland
description:
Pepperland is your Playa home for the newbie and the veteran.
We are a mellow camp with a Beatles vibe that will send you on a Magical Mystery Tour.
We have a lot of workshops we do in camp, so many to choose from! You can also just stop by and relax in the Octopus's Garden and chill out!
landmark: Yellow Submarine Flag   Large Walrus inflated

name: DR. PLAYA'S EAR NOSE AND THROAT
description: Dr Playa's ENT Clinic helps Black Rock Citizens clean out there head holes daily. Open 12PM-3PM.
landmark: Metal Dr Playa's ENT Clinic sign on scaffolding

name: Stardust Saloon
description: The Stardust Saloon is a space age frontier fusion! A bonafide space western saloon serving a relaxed, fun and inclusive environment for all booties, ages and abilities.
landmark: saloon doors

name: Scotch & Hop
description: Oh My Fur & Whiskers! You're late! You're late, for a very important date! Come follow the White Rabbit into our garden, where you can journey down a whimsical Acculturation Path with glowing & mesmerizing flowers & sparkly things. See where the rabbit has gone, Down The Rabbits Hole, to get some enlightenment and inspiration for your life! Enjoy our Tea Party, day or night, where you may encounter some personalities like Queen Elizabeth, Mr. T, Ice-T, or some Tea-Rex's!  Who knows?!  We offer restorative libations of all types during the day and Hot Toddies to warm you up on your nightly adventures.
landmark: Red Scotch N' Hop Sign & Portal with goggled bunny

name: Lucid Dreams
description: Lucid Dreams is all about dreaming. Come and relax with some tea and snacks in our wonderland tea party, and if you dare, explore down the rabbit hole into our immersive 360-degree projection experience.  With different themes throughout the week, come visit us at different points to experience different environments and emotions as we take you to another dream state.  Within the tea dome, chat with fellow burners about your dreams and what it takes to truly lucid dream.
landmark: Two domes with bike racks and Lucid Dreams sign.

name: Nowhere in Particular
description: Welcome to Nowhere in Particular! You've been working and partying hard all week, so let us lighten your load. Settle down and chill with us for a while. Read some poetry. Write some poetry. Have deep meaningful conversations while cooling off from the heat of the day.
landmark: At night: bright neon cactus. Daytime: AC shade.

name: No Holes Barred Comedy Club
description: Oh my god we're back again! Brighten your day with Laugh Yoga, learn how to make friends and strangers laugh in our Stand Up Comedy Workshop, then test your new skills or win a prize during Open Mic Bingo. And the main event every night, our Stand Up Comedy Special! All Holes Welcome!
landmark: Neon sign of No Holes Barred Comedy Club logo

name: Chill Thrills
description: Chill Thrills is either your cozy relaxing corner with Spa and Breakfast, a destination for spiritual and heartfelt-yet-quirky celebration of love and commitment, or a place to make new friends singing and dancing. With people from all around the World, we cannot wait to be part of making your trip on playa memorable.
landmark: 4 pendant flags, and big neon Chill Thrills sign

name: Infinite Love
description: Celebrate love in all forms: Cultivate Self Love, Deepen Existing Love, and explore New Love. Enjoy yoga, dance, music, tea, and cozy lounges. Rich in daytime programming and shade from the desert heat.
landmark: Look for the infinity symbol twisted into a heart.

name: Camp Reno Nation
description:
Biggest Little Shit Show On The Playa

Great beer; Weird People

Welcome to the Shit-Rock Saloon!
landmark: Reno Nation Arch

name: Union Giraffic 2: Train Wreck
description: Who says trainwrecks are inherently bad? Come to Union Giraffic 2: Train Wreck and experience the finest waterholes a crash site can offer. Take in panoramic views of the playa from our climbable gym, sue a friend (on an enemy) at our in our Westward courtrooms and enjoy a dusty dance party at our favorite watering hole the Long Neck Saloon. Anyone with boots and a thick layer of dust welcome. Union Giraffic Railways keeps 'em rolling!
landmark: Dual 21-foot tall fire-breathing steel giraffes

name: dreamship
description: We are artists, engineers, and neuroscientists from San Francisco! We made a cool dreamship. Come pilot it with us, then stay around to nerd out about brains, computers, robots, and space.
landmark: Large neon rope "DREAMSHIP" sign!

name: Priscilla
description: Priscilla, the Imperfect camp with an Aussie twist addressing radical self-expression and how to unleash your imperfect. We're still the camp that you know and love, with Dildo Olympics (with a Disco Twist) gracing our backs with its sticky presence, our usual tear-the-house-down inclusive parties including a Rizzle & Sizzle (with sausages and arguments about whether tomato sauce belongs in the fridge or in the cupboard) and new hosts of the Official Paris Olympics After Party featuring real life French people - wow! Come for a refreshing dose of 'Who Gives A F*ck' and stay for the bloody good company. xoxo - Priscilla & the gang
landmark: Glorious pink camo net

name: AerialKnotics
description: We teach, we share, we tie people up, we impact with pleasure.  Our passion is gifting our BDSM knowledge including beginner to intermediate rope bondage and impact play classes, aerial bondage Shibari performances, and daily meditation with a Kinky Monk.  Waste your precious time in our dungeon… please BYOFUT (Bring Your Own Fucked Up Toys).
landmark: Pair of 20' tall bamboo aerial Shibari towers

name: Insomnophilia
description: Insomnophilia is back at it in 2024 to celebrate being awake with YOU! Insomnophilia (from Latin: "in" translates to "without," "somnus" translates to "sleep," and "philia" translates to "love") is defined as becoming aroused by being awake to the world around them and being with those that are also awake. Join us at our camp for coffee and merriment so we can wake you up physically, mentally, and metaphysically.
landmark: Colorful illumination and two large inflated eyes

name: Mindseye Bonsai
description: "Become the vision of the mind's eye and carry your flame to the fire. Do not wait for the fire to carry the flame to you." - Catfish Billy
landmark: giant eye, Oculus (2022/23 Honoraria sculpture)

name: Cockpit
description: Welcome to the Cockpit. On the one hand, we will spirit burners away to the golden age of air travel where they can stop by, relax and recuperate in our airport lounge with an espresso or green juice by day, or a cocktail by night, before taking flight again back to the playa. On the other hand, we invite burners to make a wish and jump into our pit of foam cocks. Because, who said a double entendre couldn't be literal?
landmark: the big orange wind-socks!

name: Once Upon A Teatime
description: Once Upon a Teatime will transport you to a world of wonder and enchantment as you step inside our fairytale lounge. We will be serving cold plant based matcha lattes to cool you off and energize your playa adventures.
landmark: big mushroom umbrellas in front of octagon tent

name: Dusty Taint
description: Born in the style of a 1940's "Negro Juke Joint" featuring music, games, and drinking. Passersby's relax and socialize after a hard day in the fields (Playa) in a multi-cultural and sexually diverse adult space. Activities will open viewpoints, perspectives and make new friends. When the sun is just above the mountains, we toast the sunset and welcome the night. We play games with a mature and imaginative twist. As with all Juke Joints, cards, parlor games, and themed gatherings occur and conversation informal. In a world of hate speech and some loud shitty people, we bring love and unity. We mix cultures into a new and ethnically comingled environment celebrating similarities, loving differences and learning from each other. We work hard to build a better Burningman community.
landmark: An arched shaped brown canvas military tent.

name: San Marco Square
description: San Marco Square is a bohemian oasis. San Marco Square has curated a selection of live performances, and music by world-renowned artists and novice creators a-like for your enjoyment in our square. The park is vibrant and alive – featuring a café/bar, a stage for performance, a large PA system, a dance floor, and several spaces for relaxation and reconnection. Interactivity will include classes hosted by knowledgeable campmates, performances from several bands and DJs, and a party of high-style and sophistication - Don't miss out! Come for the art, stay for the experience.
landmark: 3 Story Stair scaffolding  on the corner

name: Retrofrolic
description:
Retrofrolic is an adult destination offering a 2100 sq ft playspace and 1800 sq ft of public shade.    The playspace has multiple play station with different devices and furniture to explore your sensual and sexual desires.  Tables of toys!   Learn sane and safe play.  Get that heretofore unanswered question about kink answered!  No shame, no blame and no regrets!  All staff have completed consent classes by B.E.D.

Multiple offerings daily.
landmark: An illuminated 20 ft. RETROFROLIC sign above camp.

name: Camp Walter
description: Camp Walter where people are nice, the art cars are big and where you are welcome
landmark: tower of terror and Walter the Bus

name: Frothville
description: A collective of international miscreants with a shared goal to slowly take over the world.
landmark: 50' tall tower.. You can't miss it...

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: Kentucky Fried Campers only need one spice, and that's the spice of life. And if you want some, join us any time of day or night. We begin each morning with the best hot breakfast in Black Rock City; a shot of good Kentucky bourbon served with a fried baloney sandwich. Afternoons you'll find us relaxing in our Olde Kentucky Dome, crafting, napping, music making, perhaps a bit of gossiping, and lots of just watching the Black Rock City whirled go by. Evenings are for dancing and more music making. Look for the KFC high in the sky and then spot our gingham-wrapped dome. Kentucky Fried Campers have been waiting for y'all!
landmark: KFC sign up high above the gingham wrapped dome.

name: Hot Ass Trash
description: Do you like trash as much as we do? At Hot Ass Trash you will find a dumpster-full of treasures, smells, and grimy people. Organized by a team dedicated to direct action, mutual aid, and community education. Come take a dump with us!
landmark: Sign that says: Hot Ass Trash!

name: Plurraffinity
description: Get ready to dive into the ultimate rave and furry fusion at PLURAffinity Camp! Join us for engaging kandi making workshops, climbable interactive art installations, and a full on Rave!  Come unleash your inner beast and rave with us at PLURAffinity Camp!
landmark: infinity pyramids, Dome and Kandi wearing skeleton

name: Camp Alien Dick
description: Our camp offers a unique, extraterrestrial-themed experience highlighted by a three-story high inflatable alien with a distinctive feature, designed to draw attendees from afar to our engaging and inclusive space. Celebrations in the thematic area promise lively entertainment, refreshments, and a series of amusing games that playfully incorporate the alien anatomy motif. Complementing the vibrant atmosphere, we're distributing an alien-themed consent zine, emphasizing the universality of consent and respect, ensuring a welcoming environment for all adventurers.
landmark: Huge Alien with a Huge Dick Looming Above

name: Olympus
description: Olympus is the home of the gods! We are a Bay Area based Burning Man camp dedicated to self-expression, inclusivity, and the celebration of every individual. Since 2016, Olympus has always strived to help people discover the best versions of themselves, their inner god. There is no limitation in terms of mythology; gods from all cultures, times, and places are welcome. Olympians also create own mythologies if the spirit takes them. The only limit is one's imagination. The mission of Olympus is for every burner to foster radical self-love, self-expression, and a connection with their own divine spirit.
landmark: Big onion tent & LED dome next to a stage

name: Camp Hot Cheeks
description: Camp Hot Cheeks is a theme camp focused on having fun, engaging with BRC community, inviting people to enjoy our lounge and nonsense. We host an annual event the Sunday after the man burns called Sake Bomb Sunday. Sake Bomb Sunday is an end of burn tradition at Camp Hot Cheeks. It is a day of celebration and camaraderie. Burners from all walks of life come together to enjoy sake bombs and celebrate the end of the burn.
landmark: Yellow Camp Hot Cheeks Sign and couch and rugs.

name: You Are Here
description: Welcome, weary travelers! Whether you are looking for an escape from the sun, need a disco nap, or simply want to meet like-minded folks to share experiences with, You Are Here is open to all!
landmark: Dayglo/ glow-in-the-dark signpost

name: Camp Shark Cage
description: Welcome to the playa's one and only nautical Nicolas Cage theme camp!  Come steal the Declaration of Independence with us.
landmark: Large pyramid & our Nic Cage w/ shark body sign

name: Dancing Cat
description: Dancing Cat Wine Bar! Where there's alittle something for everyone!
landmark: Large black dome with 2 silver domes beside it.

name: Stag Camp
description: At Stag Camp, we invite anyone and everyone (drama free) including singles, couples and small groups from all walks of life. We have no strict regimen of things to do or fees to pay. We all just come and hang out, creating a community among ourselves that is unique, fun and will be whatever you make of it!
landmark: 1950's Red Classic Fire Engine and Zipline

name: Gender Blender
description: Welcoming home our trans, non-binary, and gender non-conforming community on Playa!
landmark: Large Rotating Go-Go Dancing Blender

name: Big Booty Love
description:
We like big boots and we cannot lie! Visit us, don't be shy! 

Come dust off your boots at Camp BBL to see our boot themed art and curated boot rack!
landmark: Monkey Hut with "Big Booty Love" sign.

name: Off the Dome
description: Come explore & express yourself at Off the Dome.  Formerly known as Freestyle Palace, Off the Dome is back in the playa Wonderland for its second decade as the original musical imagination sanctuary: the Playa Talent Incubator. Our namesake, DIY Jam Dome is powered by the talent and creativity Black Rock City's citizens. Our stage, mics & instruments are available singing, rapping and making impromptu music.  Off the Dome hosts the hip hop visionaries:  Black City All-Stars and Black Rock City Regional Air Guitar Championships - now in its 10th year. We are all about the magical love of music! Come play & perform with other performers and creators at our innovative haven. At Off the Dome, do it live at Home in BRC.
landmark: orange and green lighted camp signs

name: Fucking With Humans
description: You humans are so great to fuck with! Such juicy orifices and shapely appendages! And so cute, gullible and compliant. We're here from the Galactic Federation to investigate life on this planet and in particular human culture. We need to decide what to do with you humans! Turn you into pets, plasma or do nothing? Come, submit to our tests, add to our findings, and get thoroughly, probingly, fucked with. Oh, and we have a Zeta-Power Linear Accelerator ('ZIPLINE'), to test your bravery and dexterity at relativistic speeds.
landmark: Big UFO, lit up at night, with a 72' zipline

name: Dust Circus
description: We are a multicultural and multinational group of people with various backgrounds and lifestyles who decided to create a special space on the Playa. Come to us to have fun and participate in all our activities - Acroyoga, Shibari, New Year celebration, Art Installation. And do not hesitate to hop on our beautiful Mutant Vehicle, the ShroomVroom when you see it gliding on the Playa, let"s experience the beauty of the Playa altogether.
landmark: "Dust Circus" Signage and 2 Metal Pyramids ~15'

name: Bubbles and Bass
description: Bubbles and Bass is a 100% volunteer run art and music collective that brings joy to burner events worldwide! Our goal is to provide a home conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, energetically. Best known for our sunrise to midday dancing revelry: more Bubbles and Bass makes the playa a magical place!
landmark: Tan shade sails

name: Dacha
description: Experience a safe space for you in the desert to chill and get new friends. Dance your ass off with our DJs spinning at the night with bar and hookahs provided!
landmark: a geodesic dome with a Dacha sign!

name: Ranger Outpost Berlin
description:
Ranger Outpost Berlin - The Black Rock Ranger Station in the 3:00 sector where participants in need of assistance can
seek out the help of a friendly Black Rock Ranger. Located at 3:00 and C.
landmark: Ranger Outpost Berlin

name: Kosmic Korner
description: Come join us for a plethora of experiences whether it be Borg, jungle themed misters, all sorts of music, a prize wheel or an infinity mirror room - just know this will be the funnest Korner on the playa!
landmark: 7' Tall "Kosmic Korner" LED Sign

name: Putt Putt Palace
description: Putt Putt Palace hosts a, 24/7, glow in the dark miniature golf corse and holds daily tournaments. Come stop by for our early am coffee bar and our open every afternoon Putt Putt Bar where we serve both spirits and non-alcoholic beverages.
landmark: Moon dome

name: Bohemian Forest
description:
Art is our life! We invite you to our Bohemian Forest - where our artists will create a forest of incredible beauty, our dj will play selected house music, and musicians will arrange unforgettable live performances)! 
And yes, we cook dumplings for you! To make your tummy happy!!! 
Bohemian Forest is a light that cuts through space in time, leaving behind a story called Life!
landmark: Trees Of Flowers

name: I Need An Adult
description: Come relax, have a drink and enjoy our gift to the city.
landmark: the very bright custom sign

name: Mayan Warrior
description:
tired of having fun in the sun? take a momento for downtempo.
come chill with us at Malio's, the bar with the best view on the playa
landmark: big owl and turtle in the art garden at the front

name: Kostume Kult
description: Kostume Kult is a costume art, theme event and street-theater club that has HUGE fun! Based in New York City with members internationally, our "kult" is an open one inviting all to pursue costumed creativity year-around and on playa.
landmark: Chrysler Building and Brooklyn Bridge replica

name: Square One
description: A diverse group, united in creating large-scale art with efficient and sustainable designs that inspire individuals and camps to burn stronger. Our efficiency-driven designs enable us to contribute more to the community. Our involvement includes managing operations for Burning-Man-Centric, sustainable, versatile shipping containers, the Sparky (hot sauce) & Eden art cars, playa art projects, B&B BBQ, and the 35-foot Nest tower.
landmark: 40' shipping containers and a 35' hammock tower

name: Full Send
description: Ready Fully Send? Welcome to camp Full Send, and we're taking SENT to a multitude of levels. Stop by to enjoy our free standing "Wall-EE",  SEND a singing telegram to someone you love/hate on playa, or you can (try) to get higher than last night with one of our scenic sunrise tandem para-motor flights over the playa.
landmark: Huge helium glow bulbs and bouldering cave

name: Neon Amanita
description: Relax under the Neon Amanita mushroom and among the fungi forest. By day we offer shade from the hot sun in the mushroom lounge. At night, Neon Amanita glows in blacklight and transforms into a magical forest lounge with soft places to chill and ambient music. Visit our events for a cocktail, hot tea and treats, or black light body painting.
landmark: Neon Amanita logo sign posted at entrance

name: Red Nose District
description: Red Nose District (RND) has been in existence, in one form or another since 1998. In 2013, we resolved to keep our hearts, minds, and noses RED from now until the end of time! RND has roots and participants in LA, SF, Santa Fe, NYC, Las Vegas, Pacific NW, Canada, Israel, France, & various states & countries around the world. Our members are involved in (or are lovers of) the circus arts, & work to bring our skills & talents to the playa in forms that allow for immersive & participatory experiences for citizens of Black Rock City. Notable past projects/activities include: High Chair Stilt Bar, PedalBump, Muse, Fire Wire, Wheel of Fortune, Zenobia Blanca stilt limo, Mega Mega, Bounce Back, stilt lessons, 30' swings, & circus variety shows of all forms! Come find us on the playa!
landmark: Red & white Big Top circus tent

name: UniverseCity
description: Welcome to UniverseCity, the prestigious Black Rock City College of Arts and Sciences. Our accredited program issues diplomas on any subject matter, however imaginary. These range from the fictional and unlikely to major changes in life direction. Join us on campus and register at the Admissions Office to receive your Letter of Acceptance. Early in the week, attend New Student Orientation activities. Any day, come relax in our verdant Quad, take in lectures of questionable accuracy, gaze into our night time Planetarium. Later in the week we grant diplomas recognizing unique contributions to your field of study during a personalized graduation ceremony. We are a family-friendly camp, welcome all burners to our campus and encourage participation in launching your self-declared education.
landmark: Ivy-covered white columns lining our frontage

name: Cheshire Pancake Camp
description: Our camp offers a sampling of savory and sweet round tasty bites and beverages inspired by our members' favorite experiences traveling around the world. While waiting for your fresh off the griddle treat, step into our shaded lounge space with rugs, pillows, and cool mist fans. There, you can relax and enjoy connecting with new people and playing conversational and hands-on games. All ages welcome!
landmark: Bedouin-style tent with colorful flags

name: Come to Cheesus!
description: We serve grilled cheese and good times for all! Come worship with Cheesus MWF @ 8 and ride the Danger Noodle! Divinity and satiety for all!
landmark: Yellow Shade Structure with lit "Cheesus" Sign

name: Centripedal Porch
description: CentriPEDAL Porch and its Handle Bar is a space full of bike-based furniture and a human-powered blender bar, pulling bike parts out of the recycling and trash bins and bringing them back into the world. We also host a variety of bike-oriented events, teaching people the delicate art of how to physically and emotionally ride a tandem, how to do the limbo on two wheels, and many other mini-games focused on finding new ways to enjoy and appreciate your playa bike.
landmark: "CentriPEDAL Porch" sign, 6 ft wooden bicycle

name: Love Puddle
description: Where loving people come together and flourish. Established in 2005, Love Puddle is a vibrant camp at Burning Man dedicated to celebrating life and fostering inclusivity. With members hailing from diverse backgrounds, cultures, and identities, we create a welcoming environment where everyone feels valued and accepted. Our camp offers a ton of activities, including a bar, boutique styling workshop, games like strip rock paper scissors, and a lounge to rest your tired legs, ensuring there's something for everyone. We prioritize meaningful connections, provide safe spaces and love to meet new folks. Join us at Love Puddle and experience all the magic we've got going on this year!
landmark: Love Puddle Heart Flag!

name: Inappropirates
description: Come for piping hot pour over coffee! Meet interesting people! Challenge the Strip Plank! A harrowing game of skill and poise, walk the plank, grab the cock all while the crowd heckles you with supportive guff. Each time you fail, you can try again, but the price is an article of clothing! Winners get to skip the coffee line, losers lose more than their shirt... 9am to Noon, Monday through Saturday.
landmark: Wooden `Inappropirates` sign and pirate flags

name: Lost + Found
description: We are a family and community, a California-based collective of dreamers, artists, adventurers, and passionate doers, that loves throwing fun badass parties as much as we love connecting on deeper levels. We are professionals at being, playing, curating unique experiences, and faffing about - whether it's flow, dance, music, magic, bubbles, movement, fire spinning, food, drinks, art, live jams, deep talks, tiny things or a whole lot of silly nonsense. We're a diverse group of eclectic individuals that operates with love and respect for the 10 Principles of Burning Man. We create interactive and magical experiences together as we inspire others to flow, love, and be their free and fearless selves. We also take lost and found items, including people. ;) Come play and get lost with us!
landmark: Lost + Found Neon Sign and 35-Foot Light Totem

name: Playa Express
description:
The support camp of Playa Express Mutant vehicule
Come for daily  fresh Expresso Martinis, and get a to get ride on the MV around sunset time
landmark: Playa Express sign and Mutant vehicule

name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
description: Ranger Outpost Tokyo - the Black Rock Ranger station in the 9:00 sector where participants in need of assistance can seek out the help from the Black Rock Rangers. Located at the corner of 9:00 and C.
landmark: Ranger Outpost Tokyo

name: GALACTIK
description: Funky tunes and Reiki healing
landmark: Large lit up red trailer

name: Flat Tire Cafe
hometown: Los Angeles and New York primarily but we have people from all over the world!
description: Welcome to Flat Tire Cafe, your oasis in the dust! Join us every weekday from 10AM to 2PM for complimentary cold brew coffee and expert bicycle repair services. Nestled under a vibrant, colorful shade canopy, our camp offers a haven of relaxation and fun, day or night. Dive into our interactive game lounge, where laughter and camaraderie flow as freely as our coffee. Whether you're seeking refuge from the sun, a quick bike fix, or just a place to chill and meet new friends, Flat Tire Cafe is your go-to spot. Open to all, we're here to make your journey smoother and your days brighter. See you under the canopy!
landmark: Huge Flat Tire Cafe sign over our big shade canopy

name: Camp Butter
description:
Camp Butter is not only a camp of deliquescent souls. It is a movement... a way of sliding through life with a groove at your sails.
Equipped with DJ's, Butter-Inspired drinks, and a universal deep desire to churn ~ We're here to spread a simple message...
"Talk less, slide more",
-The Butter Crew
landmark: 4 yellow flags atop a structure of pallet racks

name: League of Luminescence
description:
The League of Luminescence camp brings multi-sensory art to life through offering the Nudibranch Mutant Vehicle. The Nudibranch combines sound, lighting, and music with education to inspire and support ocean conservation, as well as to celebrate everyone's unique expression.
The name, League of Luminescence, comes from the ethos that everyone has a story to tell, and a unique light to shine around the world. It is a community of makers, creators, doers, givers, and kind-hearted humans who believe in the power of love through action and gift, intention and thoughtfulness, preparation and generosity, collective efforts and contributions, curiosity and teaching, empathy and grace.
landmark: A large blue flag with "LOL" on it

name: Mystic
hometown: Maui, HI + Bay Area, CA  + New York, NY
description:
Mystic is a legacy theme camp with a 20+ year history in Black Rock City. We offer interactive and immersive art, high vibe music and performance, evolutionary Speakers and workshops, and a variety of transformational rituals and ceremonies.
BY DAY...
We host an evolutionary-themed Visionary Speaker Series and a variety of MIND-BODY themed workshops, ceremonies and rituals in our Mystic Theater. BY NIGHT...We host some of the most talented musicians, performers, fire spinners, dancers, and live painters on our stage (including our famous Wednesday Night party). Come check out our Visionary Art collection day or night.
MYSTIC FLYER EXPERIENCE - Find our interactive Mutant Vehicle in Deep Playa!
landmark: Mystic Theater with LED Arch & CNC Letter Box Sign

name: Camp Period
description:
Menstruating on playa sucks. Period.
Camp Period was started to help menstruating folks on playa with tampons/pads, and to provide a safe educational space for all to celebrate and learn about periods, whilst destigmatizing them.
landmark: Camp Period Sign and Little Free Library

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: A Safe place to drink and Derive. Share your problems with us.
landmark: 40' tall pyramid with an illuminated Pi on top

name: Pink Mammoth
description: Pink Mammoth is a 501c3 Non-Profit house music and creative arts collective based in San Francisco. We create an inclusive environment of love, compassion, connection, and self expression both on and off the playa.
landmark: Pink steel shade, flags, & PINKMAMMOTH sign

name: Camp TeaPunk
description: Stop by our Steampunk inspired tea/coffee tent and chill for a bit. With victorian furniture, plush rugs, a cuddle puddle, small library and games you're sure to feel welcome as you prop your feet up and relax. Looking for something more upbeat? Our "Weiner Liquor" party might be for you. With fresh grilled hot dogs and tons of toppings you'll get to pick your shot to wash it down, all while listening to an array of DJ beats. Our campers are the family you wish you had, we welcome you to stop in and say hi!
landmark: 32' wide 12' tall bell tent and camp teapunk sign

name: MAD Recreational Movers
description: Chicago-based, home of the ChiCargo community shipping program.  Mon-Fri: Radical Self-Espresso Affogato Bar, including non-caffeine and non-dairy options.  24/7: check out our renewable energy micro-grid.
landmark: Big orange semi-trailer, 48 feet long

name: ConTent
description: Jiggle your bones at the "Dome of the Dead", or enjoy the "Volleyball Court for the Deceased"!
landmark: Volleyball Court + Geodesic Dome

name: SUMANAH
description: At SUMANAH, we invite you to indulge in our unique morning-ritual café, where interactive mindfulness practices are centered around engaging daily themes. As we pour freshly brewed coffee for our cherished Burning Man community members, they can enjoy our exclusive Sumanah Print Newspaper, designed to chronicle their personal experiences on a daily basis. Each morning, SUMANAH offers a variety of guided rituals and techniques aimed at helping our guests feel grounded and complete while encouraging exploration and envisioning the potential impact of their Burning Man journey on their lives head.
landmark: colorful fabrics flying in the wind!

name: Stoop City
description: Stoop City captures the magic of a fever dream spent wandering the streets of Black Rock City. Come share a secret on our cozy stoops with a new friend, savor a steaming slurp of spicy ramen, or grab a last-minute bandaid from our Asian-inspired bao-dega. This might just be the late night corner bodega you never knew you needed.
landmark: NYC subway totem, and two large 'stoops' and swing

name: Burning Sky
description: Skydivers over Burning Man. Come see Black Rock City from 9,000 feet in the air. Watch the skydivers exit the plane while you stay safely inside, and get an exciting ride back to the earth. Gifting rides Wednesday & Thursday 11a-5p.
landmark: "Burning Sky" Cartoon Sign visible from the street

name: Sticky's Playground
description: Sticky's Playground is a bountiful medley of opportunities to reclaim connection with your inner child as you swing from our monkey bars, climb our scaffolding, jump on the trampoline, or play on our world famous giant spinning teeter totter!
landmark: Giant scaffolding

name: Possible Muertos
description: Wake up from the dead with Possible Muertos! Join us for morning movement classes (yoga, stretch, calisthenics), afternoon drinks with themes from around the world. And night-lighted games for nightcrawlers. Our camp features a shaded lounge with bar as well as a double-decker dome available to kick back, relax and take in the playa views. Other camp features include lawn games, art walls, instant photos and a misting/hydration station open during public events. Stop by daily between 10am-6pm.
landmark: Double decker dome and a skeleton with a sombrero

name: Elethia
description: Eletheia Camp is a support camp for the Art Car Eletheia. Come find us deep playa for some incredible high vibrations and music offerings.
landmark: 20ft flagpole with Eletheia Printed flag.

name: Fermented Reality
description:
We celebrate fermentation in all its forms – of foods, drinks, the mind, and the body!

This year, we're hosting events to ferment the SELF, ONE ANOTHER and the COMMUNITY. Ferment your fashion, mind, or taste buds with our morning event series. In the afternoons, participate in rowdy and eclectic games: Can you prevail in our Dickle Fencing ring? Are you ready to kneel before the Pickle Glory Hole? Maybe you just need a prescription from our Pickle Clinic to cure what ails you? Join us on Tuesday evening for The Pickle Ball or Thursday afternoon for the Kimchi Circus and Hootenanny!

We hail from 10+ countries and 7 states, and would love to make fermented playa magic with YOU!
landmark: Multicolor Fermented Reality Sign + Gobo Light

name: Stars And Bikes
description: Bike repair from Noon – 6 pm daily. Professional mechanics with professional tools and professional skills to fix all your bike problems.  We can't fix your personal problems, but we'll try.  Swing by! Both you and your bike deserve some love…
landmark: Red, flat shade structure with signage for bikes

name: M*A*S*H 4207th
description:
20+ years of this, and we're still not Doctors.

Looking for a rich full day? Come to the least disciplined military unit on the playa.

Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis, PBR, Mocktails, and maybe even grape Nehi at Rosie's Bar.

Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labeled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show, this year featuring films from the series. Signpost project open to all.

Life, liberty, and the pursuit of Happy Hour.
landmark: 10' wide 4' tall sign reading M*A*S*H 4207th

name: UnExPecTed SexEd Talks
description:
Unexpected Holistic Sex Ed Talks at 2pm
Sextionality Pop Up Q&A daily at 12pm
Psychedelic SciFi Movie Nights at 8pm
landmark: Opalescent Lit Globes and A Frame Sign

name: Nom De Plume
description: We are a tea lounge that has yerba mate brewing the entire event. Come by to lurk, chill, and lounge. Relax while thriving, and drinking tea. The way life should be. We have a variety of other teas available throughout the week but always have yerba brewing. Sit down and hydrate while you start or finish your day. Yerba Mate Dub starts every day at 10:30am. Classic dub sounds from around the world as time turns elastic.
landmark: White circus tent with a red stripe on the roof

name: Chico Urban Area
description: Climb aboard the Intergalactic Transporter for a trip across the Playa you will never forget! We are happy to give you a cold beverage, space to dance, chill or just meet new people.
landmark: four foot wide "Intergalactic Transporter" sign

name: Camp NOT a Cult!
description: Camp Not a Cult provides an alcohol-free, sobriety-supportive space for new and experienced burners with a light-hearted, silly vibe. We believe that by removing alcohol from our lives we have unlocked a way to live more authentically, feel better, and have more FUN every single day. Rather than daily recovery meetings, we offer a variety of yoga and meditation classes and workshops, a cacao ceremony & ecstatic dance, a fire-spinning workshop for beginners, Ayurvedic wisdom, and 1-2 sober/sober-curious meetups. All these events will be open to the community.
landmark: Interdimensional Mushroom Beings Garden

name: Poppy Moon Saloon
description: Step right up to The Poppy Moon Saloon, a vibrant and welcoming haven for those looking to kick back or karaoke it up, enjoy some dance'n and sip on a drink or two. You can dive into some delightful crafting or wonder over to the Nautilus (A Curiouser and curiouser Rabbit hole) art installation, enveloped in a large, spiraling silk fabric. This captivating structure invites participants to journey through its gracefully curving passageways.
landmark: 25 foot tall poles draped with colorful silk flags

name: Alma Burekas
description: Moroccan atmosphere with Middle Eastern influence. An open bar serving signature cocktails every evening from sunset to dark, accompanied by our legendary burekas, and mint tea to warm you up at night.
landmark: big white tent with colorfull scaffolding

name: Vitruvian Lounge
description: Turn your world upside down at Vitruvian Lounge. Enjoy good gyrations by taking a spin on our Human Sized Gyroscope, and stay to enjoy good vibrations in our lounge with great music, ice cold craft cocktails, and hot tea service. Explore the edges of your mind and body with regularly scheduled sound baths, meditations, and workshops hosted by our campers. Discover rope bondage in our consent tent. Head into the K-Box for Korean-style private room karaoke to sing the night away together from 9pm to sunrise.
landmark: 15 foot hexagonal gyroscope

name: Music Savages
landmark: Large Tan Colored Triangle Shaped Shade

name: Camp to be Continued...
description: Camp To Be Continued... is the home of the Playa Pet Adoption Center and a wonderful saloon. Look for the Poohrimeter and stop in to adopt a new friend and sip on something cool and delicious.
landmark: Poohrimeter (hundreds of Poohs sewn together)

name: Deep C
description: We are an underwater themed camp with a refreshing Oasis space and karaoke throughout the week. Come during the day to learn flow arts and escape the heat, in the evening to sing to the pleasure or pain of the crowd, or at night to lie under the Starfield and gaze up at the pretty lights.
landmark: Large wooden "DEEP C" sign & Starfield LED cube

name: Lustre Village
description: ​​Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures from nighttime film exhibitions in the Moolandia Outdoor Mooovie Theater, to immersive theatrical experiences at the Fever Dream Theater. Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii Moroccan Tent chill lounge 24 hours a day!
landmark: Red theatre with windmill & 3 spire Moroccan tent

name: Fatwatt
description: Experience Ego Death, an interactive electric chair.
landmark: "Fatwatt" sign & Ego Death electric chair

name: SPACE MONKEYs
description: funny loving mix of great folks who enjoy all and has a camp open and welcoming to all -bike repairs and pickle back shots
landmark: LARGE SPACE MONKEYS SIGNS AND GAINT PICKLES

name: A Shack of Sit
description:
Would you like to go down the rabbit hole into infinity? Do you feel like belting out a song?  Are you looking for a great spot to sit, grab some cold water, and watch the world go by while getting your nails painted, or your hair braided? 
Are you looking for the Mensa Camp? We will be waiting for you at 9:45 & Esplanade.
landmark: The Spinning Chair and The Mensa Flags

name: machinedom - the experience
description: machinedom-the experience.... come by and see us!
landmark: 20' flagpole

name: PopoVille
description: PopoVille is your local watering hole with an artisitc twist please come enjoy our excellent "M" cocktails and enjoy chilling out in our grafitti zone
landmark: 6 foot Popo and 2400 LED volcano on the bar roof

name: TEMPLE OF LOVE
description:
Our camp "Temple of Love" offers a serene atmosphere of a retreat, embodying Burning Man core principles and creating an oasis of peace and spiritual healing.
Our diverse range of activities — yoga, meditation, sound healing, live performances, drum circles, body treatments, massages, nailboard lessons, shamanic explorations, enlightening talks, art workshops, cacao ceremonies, and breathwork sessions – are designed to nourish both body and soul. Between these sessions, the air is filled with calming music and mantras, while select nights feature electronic music by amazing DJs. At Temple of Love, we provide a 24/7 sanctuary that feels like home where everyone is embraced by a community of open hearts and creative spirits.
landmark: Long flag with heart symbol

name: Camp Exclamation Mark!
description: If you're on the hunt for a warm bite to eat, a drink, and a chill spot to groove to some kick-ass beats, your quest ends here! Swing by our electric orchard under the big white circus tent and make new friends at our daily themed Beats and Eats events. Back for a 4th year of valuing self-expression, openness, and an infectious vibe of fun, we guarantee genuine connections, thought-provoking ideas, and unique themed parties. Check us out online at www.campexclamationmark.com or email us at campexclamation@gmail.com.
landmark: White circus tent with exclamation flags on top

name: Camp Beagle Scouts
description: Visit us for playa themed psychiatric advice or maybe some ADD-vice from Lucy and the rest of our camp. Now is your chance to finally kick the football!
landmark: Camp Beagle Scouts Flag and Lucy Psychiatric Booth

name: Playa Party Patrol
hometown: San Francisco and New York City
description: We are a global community who travel and party together around the world. At Burning Man we operate the Pardywagon art car and assemble as the party patrol and spread love and fun together. We support small to mid named DJs and artists who deserve a highly visible platform to perform on. We are San Francisco and NYC based.
landmark: Pardywagon during the day

name: Camp Suckeelent
landmark: Color-changing LED legged UFO and a circle couch

name: BS BOOZE CRUZ
description: Slow water rafting on the Playa. Our camp includes the actual 24 barrel barge you will need and the characters that make up the crew. During the day, these characters will present off the wall instructional presentations.. Semi Pro DJ's will keep the vibe going under the sun but you can chill under the 40x40 shade structure. Choose your favorite float toy, some on top of coil springs, to rest your feet. At night the camp will feature a small campfire and 7pm to midnight music. Sit on our chairs and look at the stars under the blue camp lighting. The music theme will change daily. Of course we will serve at least one meal. It will be Elote, Mexican corn in a cup, on Tuesday. Bring your own spoon and cup.
landmark: Neon blue LED camp entrance sign w blue strobes.

name: Nordic Paradise
description: Step into Nordic Paradise: where cold-brew coffee meets an exciting bar and rooftop cafe. Explore workshops for body and mind, dance to music, and chill out in style. Join our Qurious Viking party, celebrating all gender expressions. It's an unforgettable experience waiting for you. Welcome to Nordic Paradise!
landmark: Two trailers. "Nordic" & "Paradise" written in red

name: BRC Snow Club
description: Welcome shredders! BRCSC is the home of the first (and only) ski slope on the Playa! Come ski, snowboard, or sled down our 60-foot long, multi-tiered hill and enjoy refreshment at our bar! New for 2024: Disco Sledding!
landmark: 14' tall ski slope

name: Bedouins of Freedom
description:
Bedouins of Freedom
Crowd of free people 
Lectures, seminars, discussions 
Djs, music, performances
Russians, Ukrainians, Americans
Many interesting speakers and guests
landmark: 3 yellow flads

name: Black Rock Sauna Society
description: Experience the essence of Finnish sauna culture amidst the Playa's embrace. Our camp offers invigorating sauna sessions, traditional löyly rituals, and the chance to encounter real life sauna elves! Join us for communal relaxation, deep connection, and the transcendent warmth of the Northern spirit.
landmark: A container sauna, long side is plexi-glass.

name: Mountain Mayhem
description: Straight from the Colorado Rockies, Mountain Mayhem is the greatest dive bar on the playa. With the best drinks, games, and bartenders to be found we will be sure to keep it hot while staying cool. Come by for a thirst quenching snowjob and a shotski, or have your socks blown off at connect 4
landmark: short, ski-picket fence or blue glowing M's

name: Arabella's Lair
description: Arabella lives here.
landmark: Large metal phoenix art car (not a fire chicken)

name: Queertirement
description: Queer Retirement Community - Hang with the queer playa elders, drink lemonade, bring magic, love, and gifts and receive great wisdom.
landmark: Future Turtles LED lights - we will be nextdoor

name: Kegel Kommandos
description:
A warm Playa welcome awaits at Kegel Kommandos ("We're doing it now!").
Can't-miss Thursday's Annual Grilled Cheese and Baconstravaganza for those seeking gluten, lactose and fresh mimosas.
landmark: Checkered Flag Dragstrip and Kegel Kommandos sign

name: Y Knot Saloon
description: A late 1800s western town with its saloon on wheels, apothecary, and water tower. Come for a refreshing beverage, views and live music.
landmark: A 20 foot water tower with the Y Knot Saloon sign

name: Black Rock City Chicken Ranch
description: Interactive rubber chicken playhouse
landmark: Rubber Chicken

name: Pussy Avalanche
description: In spite of what degenerates might think on first read - Pussy Avalanche is all about cats.  Like cats, games, books, or dorky references?  Welcome home.
landmark: fake convenience store with 'used car' flags

name: Stellar Dusty Moon
description: Stellar Dusty Moon is an out of this world experience with beautifully illuminated geometric shade structures, Cheeky performers, and Banana! art car parked right outside (when she's home). Come on over for some good ol' fashioned mooning action, and stay for some glory hole hotdogs, music that will get your booty-shakin', performances and wide variety of interactive workshops and games! Grab yourself a drink from either the Full Moon Saloon or go on a hunt for one at our CHILL, secret, Pour Decisions SqueakEasy! And don't forget to grab an Assport to guide your booty to the best ASStivities around the playa! Our mission is to provide a comfortable space to get silly, be sexy, and have fun with our galactic visitors. So, come get squeaky and cheeky with us!!!
landmark: large lit up blue stripe shade structure w/ bamboo

name: Luminos
description: Come make a gourd lantern with us! We provide the gourds, tools, and know-how, to help you make a beautiful gourd lantern that you can take home with you.
landmark: 30 foot dome with a gourd in the entrance.

name: Bitchin Deepthroats and Backshots
description: Bitchin Noodle Shop is coming with its alter egothis year, Bitchin Deepthroats and Backshots! Come and show off your throat goat skills in our dildo jousting competition! Too much to swallow? Then come enjoy a refreshing tickleback shot and come get your hair braided by our playa experts.
landmark: Banners to camp

name: Be ROCK City
description: This is where you lost yourself in an uncontrollable-body-shaking-frenzy of ROCK 'N' ROLL, surrendering to your alter ego that loves to shred solos on broom sticks, belt into dildos on mic stands, slam out the keyboard section on ironing boards as you look over to see your drummer swallowed by the crowd, now surfing. WE WILL get you ROCK hard performances by night, where YOUr crew are the stars of the show, potential winners of the Battle of the Prop Bands.
landmark: Tall sign that reads "MM"

name: Avant Garden
description:
We are a small Burning Man camp focused on creating community and connection both on and off Playa. We maintain a camp size of around 25 members, mostly based in the San Francisco/Bay Area.

This year, we are bringing a two-part gift: Veg Out and The Brothel. Veg Out is our daytime gift, where we will be serving cool, fresh vegetables to overheated Burners. And at night, our Brothel will serve hot, steamy broth to people who want a cozy place to hang out and warm up.
landmark: colorful 16ft tall canopy tent

name: Cozy Cat Camp
description: Join us Cozy Cats in the shade! Snuggle in our cozy lounge to escape from the heat and relax. Enjoy some chill music and some tea. Catnap, or come alive with Cat-Stretch Yoga! Make some cat crafts or show off your style in our Catwalk Fashion Show! Play cat games with us! MEOW!
landmark: A sign that says, "Welcome to Cozy Cat Camp"

name: Camp Sonder
description: Camp Sonder is a oasis for sacred connection and profane bass music. We host a variety of intimate tea ceremonies, interactive connection playshops, immersive educational workshops, and live music performances designed express our light and integrate our dark side.
landmark: The "Camp Sonder" sign and interactivity schedule

name: Playa Pete's Plaza
description: We built a ship that doesn't float to sail on a lake that isn't there.
landmark: Giant ship or giant tower, Chinese junk or dragon

name: Turbaza Chayka
description: Our camp is a welcoming place for emotional exploration at Burning Man. We offer compassion therapy for deep emotional connections and healing. Our Listening Camp provides a space to share and feel validated. We use complaint forms for constructive feedback and themed days to explore psychedelic insights. Tarot readings offer mystical guidance. All activities aim to foster self-discovery and connection in an inclusive environment.
landmark: An announcement board with camp's name on it

name: Grilled Cheese Experiment
description: Serving gooey grilled cheese realness, the One Sin Spa, Playa Name Change Booth, and Literal Table Flipping to fine creatures of Black Rock City!
landmark: Grilled Cheese Experiment Flag with rain pole lit

name: The Real Grass
landmark: Big Green Glitter Bunny

name: Opulent Temple
description: Opulent Temple - Sacred dance to world class music since 2003.
landmark: Flame throwing DJ booth, 2 large visual screens

name: The Macaronis
description:
Look for the purple puppet theater, right on thje street, where we'll be performing "Emily in Gerlach" and "Sex and the Playa".
Also the faro tent with the tiger flag,  clandestine LGBT symbol of 18th century
Beyond that you'll see the center of life for The Macaronis…the "Molly House" decorated with the flags of all the Macaronis on the playa: Brazil, Trinidad & Tobago, Colombia, Canada, Puerto Rico and Chicago!
landmark: Purple Puppet Theater right on the street

name: The LightCult
description: The LightCult is a hub of connection for lovers of music, psychedelic art, experimental performance art, and unique, life-affirming workshop experiences. Featuring a digital art gallery and an abundance of subwoofers, The LightCult proudly offers the coziest, most enlightening vibes the future has to offer!
landmark: 40' pyramid of futuristic wooden teddybears

name: Hooter Tooterville
description: Hooter Tooterville is a small art support camp dedicated to bringing fun and original art to the Playa.  This year's Honoraria art installation is called "The Teetering Trail of Tooter", a fun 25' long trail of teeters powering a wall of musical pipes and fun things to look at.
landmark: Multi-colored fabric tent/awning beside trailer.

name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe
description:
Our camp keeps our fellow Burners biking: our repair shop offers education, tools and parts, for bike repair. Actually we'll help you repair just about anything, but bikes are our specialty. We also love to mix drinks and host visitors in our adjacent lounge.

Bike repair is our specialty, we will teach you to do your repair. We are open 24 hrs a day. We have a bar and lounge to make life easier.
landmark: The large arrow and roadside flags

name: CouchBurners
description: A cozy oasis offering shade, restful couches and a hammock forest, life-size games, workshops, a cuddle-puddle, tasty libations, late-night warming fire and black coffee. As Black Rock citizens for over a decade, we are a diverse international collective of travelers, hosts, creators, misfits, and friends from many walks of life and corners of the earth. Find us by the perimeter of international flags.
landmark: international flags & couch on shipping container

name: Booty Kitchen
description: Booty Kitchen is a community of  friendship-homies geared towards being homie-friends in a food-centric type of "FEED ME NOW" way that transcends bounds unless the bounds end up being barriers in which case it doesn't matter anyways.
landmark: 32' Covered Geodesic Dome and Aerial Rig

name: Naked Heart
description:
Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the divine feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart, your radiance, your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome. 

At Naked Heart we recognize the need to embrace both the light and the dark in our journeys. When we pursue the light we use movement, the senses, sensuality, sexuality and connection. This beckons us in and brings the light of awareness back into the bodies we have vacated. To go there fully requires confronting our shadows. We embrace those as well as we dive into shame, fear, anger, unsavory memories from this life and past lives, and disempowering images of our bodies. Welcome home.
landmark: Large steel entry way with the Naked Heart sign

name: Hang-Out, the
description:
In the heart of the desert, where dust dances with dreams, lies a hidden oasis known as the Hang-Out that embodies the spirit of the Burn. Here, souls intertwine amidst swaying hammocks and planted seeds awaken. Boundaries blur in this transcendent space. Desert winds carry ancient tribal beats and whispers of experiences to be found. 

Come, embrace the allure of this oasis, surrendering to the whispers of the desert. Experience our unique euphoria, enlightenment and a recharge of your soul and body.
landmark: 30 foot tall mast w/ LARGE beige shade sails

name: Hard as a Rock
description: A rag-tag bunch of geologists and crystal healers with a passion for sharing geology - including the geology of the Black Rock Desert! Join our geologists for rock talks, get creative with rock painting, walk our labyrinth to explore the geological timeline of the earth and discover our place in it. Get metaphysical with us - crystal meditations, movement, healing, hypnosis and more!  Dig up your best rock puns and strike  fools gold and other rockin' gifts!
landmark: Labyrinth, Geodesic Dome, Tents w/ Art panels

name: Raditude
description: A collective of Lucid & Light lucky individuals serving up Rad-Attitude Adjustments every DAWN & DUSK with a themed streetside Fireplace Art Piece and an Alchemy Tea Lounge; shoe-free shade and more for all those building, volunteering, and interacting within Black Rock City!
landmark: 4' x 4' Steel Mad Hatter Fire Art Piece & flags!

name: Hook Up Camp
description: We are a collection of full-time RV dwellers who come to the playa to "show you how it's done."
landmark: 16' x 24' event tent with our sign on the front.

name: Galactic Relay
description: The spaceport of love on the playa. Home base of Out Of Band III and Zodiac. Location of the Intergalactically famous bar: The Crocodile Milking Table.
landmark: Banner reading "Camp Galactic Relay" above a bar

name: Box of Wonders
description: Box of Wonders. Come and interact with the magic of our art car every evening. Join us during the day for our special « Do it like a Roman ». Charging station every evening, music and deliciousness every day !
landmark: Big art car or giant custom banners in our name.

name: The Annex
description: The Annex is a work support camp.
landmark: "Annex" sign by the road.

name: Sockdrawer
description: Where all socks are found, except the one you were looking for.
landmark: Sockdrawer sign and flag

name: Habitat for Insanity
description: ate novel burner technology and use it to bring new experiences to Black Rock City. This includes pizza ovens of our own design, shave ice machines, and HVAC/refrigeration adaptations for our new installation "The Tundra." We also bring Live Karaoke and Daytime Talks to the playa.
landmark: 42 Foot White Inflatable Igloo

name: Atom Cult
description:
Cool yourself down with a variety of Fission Ice Cream offerings at noon!
Fill yourself with Happiness and Joy while exploring the magnificent Garden of Earthly Curiosities!
Relax and recharge both yourself and your portable electronics in our Reactor Dome!
Enjoy the view of the Playa from our Clock Tower!
landmark: 20-ft dome, 20-ft tower, 30-ft air sculpture

name: Harmonic
description: Harmonic is a Synthwave themed bar and restaurant featuring synthwave music, lighting displays, a unique bar, and a boutique restaurant.
landmark: Greek statues, projectors, Harmonic sign

name: Lick Me
description: Lick Me will be driving around day and night. Hoop on for a ride
landmark: 20ft long Green Frog That lights up

name: Camp Come Find Us CCFU
description: Here at Camp Come Find Us (CCFU) we are a camp that is about finding yourself and exploring who you are at Burning Man. Every journey is individual and unique. Come flow with us and find your journey. We want to create a laid-back and spontaneous atmosphere. We want our offerings to be inspiring and fulfilling. We are going to be a small intimate camp creating a strong community among our fellow burners. Come find us and find yourself.
landmark: Green School Bus parked behind the main tent

name: ¡Playasos!
description: Come ride Señor Snail von Slidesmouth, a 40' foot long giant tube slide dressed up like a monstrous rainbow snail! Sure to make you squeal like a kid again, this ride is open at all times for all peoples, large and small alike. von Slidesmouth is eager and ready to take you on a ride and swallow you down into his dark and thrilling underbelly. This ain't your school playground's slide. Just don't be embarrassed when the 5 year old in front of you is less scared than you are :)
landmark: Giant Rainbow Snail

name: HOVerlandia
description: Designated camping for riders of the Burner Express. All riders are welcomed to camp across the street from the bus depot in HOVerlandia. Share your love for mass transit with Burners from all over the world.
landmark: Burner Express Bus Depot, DWP Shade Structures

name: My Dad's House
description:
My Dad's House is a cozy, classic respite from the maximalism of BRC. We don't have a singular offering, but rather a cornucopia of Dad-led wonderment. Be it dance parties, movement workshops, live jams, philosophy discussions, cereal breakfasts, poetry slams, socialist propaganda, or super-tan buttholes, there's something for everyone :]

At the same time, we're seeking to creatively redefine fatherhood, to reclaim masculinity, and to reparent ourselves, our friends, and our inner children. Y'all are warmly invited to hang out, write a letter to your Dad in our garage, and enjoy a sense of shelter, of safety, of home (and to boogie down and heckle and giggle and tickle and squirm too!). 

So c'mon by, ditch the shit, and stay a while.
landmark: big-ass house, slackline pyramids, & PURE VIBES!

name: Pinky Swears
description: We are the art support camp for Looking Up Arts. We design and fabricate art in San Francisco, CA. Our camp is open to teaching and mentoring art fabrication skills, and we accept new members with sponsorship through late July, depending on space.
landmark: Camp Sign: Blue/Pink hands doing a Pinky Swear

name: Camp Morning Wood
description: Welcome to Camp Morning Wood! Which is, quite simply, your friendly, neighborhood, summer camp-themed, saloon. Starting fresh each morning at 10:00 a.m. to "Eye of the Tiger" we're there to motivate the neighborhood, to attack a new day (after licking our wounds from the night before). CMW is ready to great you with a smile, music, dancing, or maybe just a view of the city from our raised platform. From sunrise to sunset (and beyond), you can almost always pull up a barstool for some friendly conversation, and an ice cold (hard or soft) beverage.
landmark: Log entryway displaying a "Camp Morning Wood" sign

name: Camp Curiosity!?
description: Our mission is to inspire and facilitate radical curiosity and connection. We are here to get curious about our fellow Burners, about the 10 Principles, and about Black Rock City as a phenomenon. Come get curious with us!
landmark: Large light-up exclamation point and question mark

name: Burner Express Bus Depot
description: Burner Express Bus Depot for arriving and departing Burner Express buses.
landmark: roofdeck and Burner Express Bus orange mural

name: You Look Amazing
description:
You Look Amazing is not just a camp name, but a state of mind. We LOVE each and everyone of you and want to get to know you better. 

Our camp is an oasis of wellness at Burning Man. Where mind, body, and spirit converge in a harmonious dance of rejuvenation and exploration. Nestled amidst the pulsating energy of the playa, our camp offers a sanctuary unlike any other—a haven where participants can immerse themselves in a holistic journey of self-discovery and transformation.

Join us for yoga, mindfulness, workshops, dancing and the best crepes you've ever had, we promise. They're better than sex. 

So come, weary travelers, and let us wrap you in dusty hugs and smiles. Tell us your stories and we'll tell you ours.
landmark: TBD

name: Kamp Kla
description: Glaze your ceramic burner medallion
landmark: orange kamp kla flags, or the big giraffe art car

name: Bohemian Dumpling and DJ Bar
landmark: led dome and flags

name: Desperados
description: Don't go to Desperados, it's a terrible bar. The bartenders are all narcissists and they can't make a proper drink. They just dance on the bar, knocking shit over while your cup is empty. The place is a junk heap, absolutely falling apart. What a shitshow. Stay away.
landmark: Desperados sign and saloon doors

name: ShamanDome
description: Since 2008, Shamandome Camp has taught Core Shamanism as described by Michael Harner, and offered shamanic healing in Black Rock City, reawakening burners to their shamanic relationship to nature and helping them connect with their true animal essence as a child of Mother Earth. The real deal. The sound of a single drum, beating at 185 bpm puts you into an Altered State of Consciousness (ASC), allowing you to journey to the Lower World, where you can meet your power animal. You can do it, because you're human. This the ultimate Hero's Journey.
landmark: A bunch of geodesic domes. A 23x50 kitchen tent.

name: Live Your Best Porch Life
description: Won't you be our neighbor? A throwback to the American front porch born from the melting pot of different cultures and ethnicities, our front porch invites friendly greetings, recognition, acceptance, and fosters neighborly community. Come sit in our adirondack chairs and have a chat. We will be offering no-frills cowboy coffee in the mornings and ice cold lemonade in the afternoons. Stop by and visit our yard sale full of trinkets from grandma's house. No early birds!
landmark: Pink front porch with white trim and railing

name: Looners
description:
It's a bird, it's a plane, it's a tethered hot air balloon flying 75 feet high in the sky!

Climb aboard and experience a unique journey while being serenaded by live instrumentals mixed with electronic beats high up in the sky. Enjoy stunning views of Black Rock City and take in the joys of life on our ground-level dance floor.

Craving some pampering? Step into our old world circus lounge where you can snuggle up, dive into cinematic wonders, and recharge with treats, massages, and a sprinkle of delightful surprises.
landmark: hot air balloon

name: House of Sammich
