Please feel free to climb up onto the back of our art car to get a great view of the neighborhood at any time of day or night--we look forward to seeing you there!
landmark: painted bus w/ roof deck & painted octagonal tent

name: Detroit:(B)RC
description:
Welcome to Detroit!
The Motown team is looking forward to seeing you on the Playa!
Stop in for a Motown Mule, grab a postcard, or just kick it with the coolest kids in the dust!  
Detroit Coney Dogs on Wednesday at 4:00pm!
Be there or somewhere else… we'll understand.
landmark: Detroit… EVERYTHING DETROIT

name: Dr. Carl's Collection of Depts.
description: Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments returns! Come play our legendary Dept. of Collections game, where we will give you a semi-fabulous prize if you can do, are, or tell us about a thing we list on the board of tiles. Enjoy a homebrew at our Dept. of Dumpster Dive Bar, or sit-in on our Let's Talk Forums. Get glowed up by our Dept. of Boudoir Photography and be adored and cheekily photographed (now including black light sessions after dark!). Be a subject in the Temporary Anonymous Zone, a behavioral experiment involving anonymous persons conversing in total darkness. Learn and play GO in our Dept. of Strategy, or simply enjoy our AI powered fortune-telling Pug-Witch, our blacklight Hissing Booth, or let fate decide at our luscious pink Kiss-Met randomizer.
landmark: Wooden structure with white, squarish tiles on it

name: Saints & Sinners
description: A welcoming and laid-back camp within Silicon Village, where most mornings are dedicated to family-friendly button making. As dusk approaches, our camp takes on a "sinnery" vibe, lighting up the street with a red glow. Our street-side shade structure is a hub of activity throughout the day, with someone always ready to greet you. Feel free to swing by and say hi!
landmark: Shade structure with a "Saints and Sinners" banner

name: RADICALOHA
description: RADICALOHA is a camp of Aloha! We bring the Hawaiian Culture to Black Rock City. We offer hula, workshops, DJ music and authentic shave ice.
landmark: ALOHABOX Shave Ice Trailer

name: Atlantis
description: The demigods of Atlantis invite dusty desert travelers to relax at our mystical shaded and fanned oasis. Our mischievous hosts will offer up savory treats to our guests in hopes they might become enchanted by the oasis and never leave. We invite our new friends to join us each afternoon in bacchanalian festivals and indulge in rituals of song and dance. Once the sun sets, mysterious lights illuminate the caves of Atlantis which reward nocturnal travelers with sweet treats and interactive surprises.
landmark: Six-foot-tall disco-trident

name: MOOP Museum
description: Did you stumble across something on the playa that someone can reuse, like a functioning bike light, or a super-rad dinosaur figurine in the dust? Bring it to MoMu, the MOOP Museum, and have our curators evaluate it for acceptance into our exhibit. All are welcome to peruse the exhibit and may even find something they want to take with them on permanent loan.
landmark: Pink MOOP Museum neon sign and chalkboard.

name: BAR MACTROPOLIS
description: We are a full service Bar.  All are welcome.   In the morning we serve coffee, extra libation, and blood Mary's!  For the rest of the day and evening, come on by for a blended drink that you can blend with our custom made blender, or enjoy a cocktail or beer. Our music is chill and our bartenders the best!
landmark: Slack Jaw Tower or Veggie Camp

name: Android Oasis
description: Android Oasis offers a refreshing and reinvigorating respite from the heat and harshness of the playa. We offer a staffed  "brain & body spa" with multiple areas to take a load off and be treated to cold refreshments and body work. Come by for misting, massage, mindful music, and a mental break. Stay for the vibes, vines, and vivacious community!
landmark: Ring of 6 LED palm trees + white geodesic dome

name: Castra Ursi
description:
Castra Ursi aims to lead and accelerate the future of what Burning Man's camps must become. It is a camp that is simultaneously efficient and comfortable, informative and inspiring, and one that is powered entirely by renewable energy.

Castra Ursi will provide public charging for participants' devices and small electric-powered mutant vehicles and will host several panels  engaging in topics specific to renewable energy on-playa and renewable energy powered public art.
landmark: Grey flags that read "Castra Ursi"

name: In Dust We Trust
description: An lovely camp, which has been giving away lingerie in exchange for a good life story for over 10 years now, serving snow cones in the afternoon sun and filled with people from all over the world, whose paths to our camp are always somehow unique and worth a story.
landmark: Blue and purple flags at the front, mermaid cutout

name: Acorn Oasis
description: Are you as nuts about Squirrels as we are?! If these mischievous charmers and their playful antics bring you joy, then scurry over to Acorn Oasis! Explore our 24-hour one-of-a-kind Squirrel Museum, a hilarious tribute to the most renowned and significant squirrels throughout history. Dash over to our daily Squirrell Soirees to enjoy a glass of Bushy Tail Brew and immerse yourself in our playful Squirrel Playground, teeming with games that will test your agility and wit. At Acorn Oasis, we're all about celebrating the playful spirit of squirrels, so come and get squirrely with us!
landmark: A giant squirrel at least 6ft tall

name: Questionable Camp
description: Welcome to Questionable Camp, where the lines blur between reality and imagination, and the only certainty ... is a questionable one.  If you're seeking a dose of whimsical play and art, join us for some questionable times!!!
landmark: 33' Dome w/ lights & Questionable Camp Arch/Sign

name: Steam Bath Project
description:
The original and still the best steam bath experience.
Step into a world of relaxation and rejuvenation at The Steam Bath Project. Located at the heart of Burning Man, our camp offers a unique and immersive experience inspired by the soothing power of steam. Enter our tranquil oasis and indulge in the therapeutic benefits of steam bathing, surrounded by the sights, sounds, and scents of the desert. Our Lavender Lounge provides a sanctuary for participants to unwind and prepare for their steam bath adventure, while interactive elements engage the senses and foster community connection. Join us for a journey of self-discovery and renewal, where the principles of radical inclusion, communal effort, and radical self-expression come to life.
landmark: A very large solar array

name: Bubble Lounge
description: Celebrating our 25th Anniversary, BubLo returns to BRC once again, bringing a place for shade, libations, and shenanigans!  Stop by for cold drink, a Quickie Body Wash, Music Healing, shade, funky stylings, and our newest addition... Playa Feud!  And of course, lotsa Bubbles!  A favorited camp by PEERS and that guy LH that we all miss, there's always a good time at our place on the playa!
landmark: 12 foot (lighted) Marquee Sign "Bubble Lounge"

name: Mystopia
description: Step out of the sun-scorched wonderland into our cool haven. It's an icy oasis, an ice cream paradise, and a sanctuary for all. We welcome everyone: friends, partners, parents, children, individuals of any race, orientation and identity. Stop by our burner family and experience the rainbow of diversity. Come play with us, sit down and watch some drag/burlesque, dance with a stranger or simply relax on bean bags surrounded by refreshing mist.
landmark: Circus tent w/ neon flags & rainbow Mystopia sign

name: Tiki Bar & Hammocks
description: Tiki Bar & Hammock –  bring your thirsty lips over to enjoy a fresh cool island drink or Kava tea and visit and connect with neighbors and fellow burners.  Share all your great stories "this one time, at burning man…!"  Get some advice if you are new to burning man, and of course, swing in our hammocks with us or relax on our sofas and stools in the shade!
landmark: Tiki bar and Big metal structure with hammocks

name: Sake To Me
description: Sake To Me - your friendly playa servers of various chilled and flavored sake. There's plenty of sake and chill in our shaded, cushion-ish area, plus giant Jenga and other games for all!
landmark: 3x4 EZ Up shade structure in red + Sake To Me sign

name: Preservation Society
description: Preservation Society: Preserving what has been lost. Our luscious green garden is your oasis in the desert. Our events refresh you with music and dance. Our bar serves potent potables with preserves from all the corners of the world from which our camp hails.
landmark: Preservation Society sign, "PS"  neon letters

name: Motel California
description:
A respite for weary travelers of Black Rock City. Come relax in the oases of the desert. Lounge out in one of our comfy cabanas, experience ultimate relaxation with our team of expert masseuses, and grab a refreshing drink at our bar.

We're committed to propagating environmentally conscious technology, art, and living through sustainability and innovation. Come experience it yourself at Motel California.
landmark: Wooden duxel/cube bldg and 'Motel California' sign

name: Badlands Bordello
landmark: Old Wooden Saloon Style Frontage, Wavelink art car

name: Love Plumbers
description:
The Love Plumbers (Formerly: SexyAF) are a collection of silly, sex-positive sweeties who are here to unclog whatever has you backed up, so that love can flow again! 

Clad in overalls, work gloves, mustaches, and carrying our trusted love plungers, and with our fowl-yet-friendly chicken mayor, Mr. Cluckzalot, in charge, we deploy interactive workshops, 24-7 intimate space, in-street mini-schticks, and elaborate evening experiences to flush out shame, scarcity, and insecurity, seal the seams where your love's leaking out, to help weld your emotional valves together. The Love Plumbers are a FULL SERVICE emotional repair shop.
landmark: Pink fabric the entire length of our frontage

name: FURngully
description:
Sometimes the view from the streets is quite contraire, so come climb our treehouse and get some fresh air! Come lounge in a hammock and swing to and fro, or watch as we heckle and muster up a show! No matter how sunny our days may be, we promise reprieve and a bit of shade you wont want to leave! A group of fine creatives will open their hearts, and they'll spread joy through our love of the arts!

FUrngully 
~ Treehouse ~ Hammocks ~ Vibes ~ Art~

Hosting Playa Art Projects :The Releve Ladies and Veraison. Stop by to chat with the artists and explore their vision!
landmark: 3 story LED Psychedelic Treehouse, FUrngully flags

name: Cosmic Casbah
description: We are a diverse group of like minded individuals that started off as strangers and became family. By becoming each other's chosen family, we feel we can be open and honest regarding our mental, spiritual, emotional, and physical health and have helped each other work through past and present trauma on and off playa. By building community and trust within each other, we are able to heal through art, music, and self expression. The goal of our community is to show genuine connection, love, and support with each other that we may not normally obtain in our default lives. Through this action we strive to create a safe space for individuals to learn and grow into the best version of themselves.
landmark: Brown circus tent and 24' flag poles on the Avenue

name: Got Your Back!
description: Got Your Back! camp is back for a second year. Oh my neck, Oh my back, my-neck-and-my-back! We're here to help relieve muscular aches and pains through quick 10-15 minute muscle therapy sessions by professional therapists.
landmark: Black and White "Got Your Back!" sign

name: Owl and the Pussycat
description: We are a small but mighty group of folx whose camp is a safe, welcoming environment for all Burners. We not only value physical comfort as seen by our cozy lounge and dining space, but emotional comfort to promote connection, conversation and reflection with our fellow Burners. We also value a good time! Come by our quiet Dream Hatchery lounge where you can take pause and meditate or join us for a tea leaf reading to ruminate on your dreams. The Owl and the Pussycat is like a warm hug for your Burn.
landmark: Brown and black Owl and Pussycat flag

name: Need A Minute
description:
Sometimes you just Need a Minute! Stop by to find out what kind of minute that is.

Sometimes you just need a minute. Need a Minute embodies childlike play, silliness, and free expression with experiential minutes, amazing music, and activities to connect with open-hearted friends and acquaintances. Stop by the Need a Minute Booth to spin the Wheel of Time and see what kind of minute is in your future. (is it really the minute you needed?) Or stop by our parties where we'll be serving the very best minutes you'll have all week.
landmark: ClockTower

name: Erotic Inclination Photo Studio
description: Swing by to EIPS (Erotic Inclination Photo Studio) to create one of a kind photo memory of yourself and your loved one with the help of our resident photo artist Saulius Kreismonas (Lithuania). Singles, couples or groups are welcome at our studio located in the outskirts of Black Rock City where the good ol' Razorback mountain is sitting and waiting to provide a natural backdrop for the art you're about to create using nothing else, but your body and the unique light of the high desert. We will provide a discrete environment to have your intimate photos taken in our photo tent or you can chose to make an appointment with Saulius to have a photo session outside in the walk-in camping area catching the light of the golden hour of the late afternoon.
landmark: Dark Brown 10ft tall Moroccan Bedouin Desert Tent

name: RIPPERS ROW
description: Rippers Row is an immersive and interactive theme camp hosting daily parties with DJs playing a variety of tasty music. You're guaranteed a high energy shakedown on every Ripper dance floor. Home of the mythical GatorWalrus. Long May They Reign.
landmark: Large white tent w/ two points & Rippers Row LED.

name: Glam Clams
description: Community! Music! Mischief! At the Glam Clams, we are the family you want to choose. Come connect with fellow burners and relax in our welcoming lounge. Get glammed in our Glam Station, take part in a workshop and shake your damn booty on our dancefloor. Souls of Black Rock City unite!
landmark: Glam Clams sign on front of flat-top shade

name: Burning Man T-Shirt Factory
description: Interactive DIY BM designs. We supply the spray paint and BM stencils.  You supply the clothing, gear, or body to paint. Totally interactive, quick, easy, and fun.  Open 24/7.
landmark: ZAP Lighting Bolt

name: I'm Croquet, You're Croquet
description: Come for the slamming balls, stay for the silly cheese steaks!  Our family-friendly camp includes Croquet gear available 24/7, and three Wonderland-themed games (think flamingoes and hedgehogs) with drinks and snacks throughout the week.  Everybody has won, and all must have prizes!
landmark: Neon sign with our camp name on the carport

name: Rat Trap
description: We are your dirty bar that never closes. Come on by day or night. Drink our booze, ride our horses and join us in radical self stupidity.
landmark: Giant steel rocking horse and Rat Trap camp sign

name: Rum Amok
description: Running Amok? Find our tropical oasis on the playa
landmark: A colorful, large RumAmok Sign (well lit at night)

name: planet wood collective
description:
Campers: designers, architects, and engineers in the built Environment.

Focus on the development of low-carbon infrastructure and living in Black Rock City. Give back to the community by sharing knowledge from yearly experimentation and iterations.
landmark: two wood domes and circular wood tower

name: Amber Dust
description: Pagan vibes, sizzling sausages, the fun is here!
landmark: Dome, covered in canvas triangles

name: Playa Bears
description: Come chill and get your bearings at Playa Bears! Where we're always bruin' up good times and kodiak moments. Our forebears believed in dancing, strong drinks, delicious food, and koality time with friends. We're serving up all of the above in our Playa Bear Den! Do you need a place to get away from the pandemonium of the playa? Fur the love of the man, honey! Come join us at one of our events or stop by anytime for a cocktail and a bear hug.
landmark: Hot pink metal trees, bears, forest tapestries!

name: PlayAground
description: We are playground with radical swings ,a shaded lounge and bar with couches and games.
landmark: PlayaGround sign tall blue orange red yellow flags

name: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers
description: We are BRC's long-standing oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive a healing session for the mind, body and spirit.
landmark: 3 green parachute tents w blue/yellow "HBGB" flags

name: Survivor Man Camp
landmark: Large 8 foot tiki totem pole and tiki torches

name: PO@6
description: We are the center camp post office. We send your postcards and love every year all around the world. You know us! You love us! Now bring us your stamps!
landmark: post office geo dome and sign

name: Tiki Fuckos
description: TikiFuckos at Burning Man is a vibrant fusion of Polynesian paradise and communal celebration, featuring a lively bar, morning yoga sessions, and exciting activity's during the day. Attendees indulge in inventive cocktails by day, connecting with fellow Burners amidst the desert landscape. In the mornings, they gather for rejuvenating yoga sessions, embracing mindfulness in the tranquil surroundings. As the sun sets, fire dancers mesmerize the crowd with their captivating performances, illuminating the night with flickering flames. With spontaneous daytime activities throughout the week, TikiFuckos embodies the spirit of aloha and uninhibited self-expression, offering unforgettable experiences at Burning Man.
landmark: 40 foot diameter army green dome

name: MUSE
description: The Maenad University for the Study of the Esoteric (M.U.S.E.) is a tribute to the deity Dionyus and offers a temple space for offerings as well as for our interactivity which ranges from spiritual to silly. We offer a 24 hour labyrinth for visitors to use as well as a kiosk which will host a variety of camp run and visitor run interactivity. We are a very welcoming group and you are free to say hi and chat with us when we are out and about.
landmark: A Lighted seven ring labyrinth available 24 hrs

name: Giving Tree Support Camp
landmark: 25' tall greenest willow tree in the city

name: The Assless Chapel
description: The Assless Chapel is here to marry you! Whether you want a serious ceremony or just some quick nuptials; a temporary marriage or a bond for life; we want you to get married here! Have the wedding you want, not the one the default world demands.  Marry yourself or marry a group of friends.  All people welcome, all ceremonies conducted, all marriage arrangements respected.
landmark: Lit up archway leading to a marriage altar

name: Hot Diggity!
landmark: Alight sign

name: Black Rock French Quarter
description: Welcome to the bayou! Home of the infamous Golden Cafe cocktail lounge, ubiquitous Cafe de la Fin du Monde coffee house, legendary Black Rock Bakery, elusive Lonesome Gator Gumbo Cookery, subterranean Black Rock Wine Cellar, fermented and pickled Swine and Brine, and ever apologetic Domeakase sushi bar. Your home for elevated drinking, fine dining, and boring stories about the old days, since 2003!
landmark: Neon fleur de lis signs

name: Bait Shack
landmark: Large LED fishing poles above our camp & Stop sign

name: Gritty Garden
description: Gritty Garden is a diversity driven camp offering a wide variety of workshops from glamor bar (for glamorizing vulvas, faces or other body parts) to heart-to-heart hugs. Offerings will also include a Monday-Friday bar and light dinner.
landmark: Large colorful letters spelling Gritty Garden

name: Motropolis
description: In 2010 several creative characters came together to embark on a journey that would change their lives. That trip was the "MoRoadtrip" 21 artists, from 8 countries, traveling 21 days from Austin to Burning Man on a 60ft bus called the "MoBus". Freshly inspired after a life changing trip a few "Mo" came together to form a "Transitional Culture of Mo." Meeting artists and creatives from the many walks of life led to "MoCarnivals", A "MoFarm", events, festivals, collective living, academic/activist discourse, a theme camp and lifetimes of friendships. We continue as an ongoing cavalcade of cosmic characters cultivating a common culture of creativity and convivial community.
landmark: Two white obelisks

name: Community Improvement Association
landmark: Orange- and gold-draped Chapel, "CIA" sign

name: The UnStable
description: We are a Mutant vehicle Support Camp sharing a resources with a camp called Satellite of Love. They have refreshments, sometimes and would love to see you. We will be having Pole dancers and flame effects at unscheduled times. Stop by!
landmark: Big Black MV with a horse head and torches.

name: Stimulation Station
description: Most of what we learn from the world around us is due to perception, cognition and activities are mediated through vision. SO what happens if we take away sight and focus on other stimulations like touch, sound and smell? Come check out Stimulation Station, service of soothing touch, peaceful sounds and beautiful senses M-F 12pm-3pm While your there enjoying our cozy seating and games in our brightly colored Geodome!
landmark: neon lit geodome

name: That Camp Over There
description:
That Camp Over There (featuring Dick Shaped Foods) - 
Where ... Over There? Yes, right there, with the ultra-comfortable shady, misted hammocks, exceedingly shady snacks, morning yodelling (with prizes), Snow-cone-eokie, Spanking Or Pringles?, the infamous DIY Crotch Wash and our entirely notorious afternoon Dick Shaped Food Parties.  Swing by for Random Theme Dance Parties and What The Fuck Did I Just Drink specials most afternoons.
landmark: Row of gold flags along street, "TCOT" sign.

name: NOT BORING
description: Step into our camp for exhilarating late-morning beats and an electrifying dance floor, where every inch is alive with the energy of those who live to move to the not boring rhythm.
landmark: sign NOT BORING

name: Sunrise Tavern
description: Come for the bacon, stay for the sunrise. You gnome you'll like
landmark: giant SUNRISE TAVERN letters & saloon doors

name: Slutt Putt
description: 24-hour Mini-Golf... with a Naughty Twist! Get strokes off your game for committing various 'slutty' acts posted at each our whimsical holes! Swing by the clubhouse for an Arnold Palmer or John Daly during our bar hours, or just relax and enjoy the lounge any time day or night. Innuendo, retina-searing color, and genitalia-themed decor abound. Kindness and consent mandatory-- clothing and class optional.
landmark: Bright, multicolored flags and small installations

name: Native Tongues
description:
A Native Tongue speaks to the frequency we all share, a common way of communicating with love, empathy & respect. An acknowledgment of the humanity we recognize in each of us.
And also a kick ass rap collective from the 90's!
landmark: Neon Native Tongues sign

name: Karma Love Camp
description:
Step into the celestial embrace of starlight and the gentle caress of sunrays, where a journey of profound self-discovery awaits. From embracing the essence of Divine Femininity to traversing the event horizon of transformation, immerse yourself in an experiential odyssey of perception.  Engage in events that not only challenge your senses but also honor your individuality, celebrating the unique essence of YOU.
Karma Love is a celebration of you, offering body art, wellness experiences, and a sense of community where you're encouraged to play and connect  Share in the communal joy thru dance, gifting, food and body experiences, recognizing that you are indeed the universe, awakened.
landmark: 15ft led starlight cone cudde puddle street side

name: People of Color Camp
description:
Bringing COLOR to the playa since 2014!
The People of Color Camp is what happens when The Muppet Show gets put in the same telepod as an episode of The Fresh Prince of Bel Air, MTV's The Real World and a debate at the United Nations.
We provide opportunity for BIPOC Burners to not only learn about and experience Burning Man, but make it our home. We bring the diversity of our cultures to the playa through events, workshops and simply our presence. We bring our music, our soul, our rhythm, our culture… Unapologetically!
We welcome all people of all backgrounds. Stop by! Add some color to your burn! It's always love! :)
landmark: POC Camp Mosaic Sign

name: Spec-Taters
description: And amidst this sea of humanity, there are potatoes. Yes, potatoes. Perhaps an unexpected sight in the midst of such a surreal landscape, but therein lies the magic of Burning Man. These humble tubers, often overlooked in daily life, take on new significance here. They're not just food; they're symbols of sustenance, resilience, and community.
landmark: Big sign that says "SPEC-TATERS"

name: Pickle Joint
description:
Downtown Black Rock City's favorite magical little hole in the wall. Serving our world famous Pickle-Tini Cocktail since… errp… too long.
Let's say well over a decade. Always a sumptuous groove on our dance floor….or maybe a Led Zeppelin Kazoo orchestra.
landmark: Big lit up sign says "PIckle"

name: Lunar Disco
hometown: San Francisco, Santa Rosa, Nicaragua, Puerto Rico
description: Embrace the cosmic elements in our electrifying dance and party spaces, with interstellar beats and mesmerizing ambience. Connect with fellow stargazers in our ceremonial space, honoring the celestial bodies and the shared human experience. Embark on an otherworldly adventure at Lunar Disco.
landmark: 14' Shimmering silver portal with Lunar Disco sign

name: Rootpile Dustopia
description: Rootpile is an established themecamp at Burning Man whose mission is to bring live Bluegrass music, Bluegrass musical instrument instruction, and Southern food and culture to the burns that we attend. We offer live pro-Bluegrass music most nights of Burn week. We are open to new members who embrace our mission and culture.
landmark: Rootpile Signs and Giant Pink Fiberglass Pig

name: Stardust Lounge
description: Enter an interdimensional portal that leads to a magical experience comprised of love, silliness, and sparkly things! Stardust Lounge is an eclectic pit stop for dusty travelers on their inter-playatary journeys. The three sections of the camp--the Lounge, Spa, and Wedding Chapel--offer visitors a fun blend of rituals, games, and opportunities for self-care.
landmark: Infinity mirror box Stardust sign!

name: Camp Elektra
description: Come meet and hang out with our dragon Elektra. She is ready to host you throughout the week at our camp as well as late nights out on the playa. Come lounge with us, wave us down for a ride, or meet us out for sunrise adventures deep playa!
landmark: fire breathing dragon with over 3000 LED lights

name: Cold Yogis
description:
Cold Yogis exist to awaken terrestrial sprit and ancestral resiliency by wilfully disrupting homeostasis and diving into discomfort - Using breath to anchor consciousness in reality. 

We offer workshops for breathwork, cold exposures, brain over body techniques, rocket yoga and animal flow to increase health, self control, and consciousness. We are an international camp that shares space with Camp Contact, DECENTRAL and others.

This year, we will bring the Temple of Mokosh to the Playa.
landmark: Large Cold Yogis sign

name: Baalam
description: We are a dynamic camp, open to meeting you and welcoming you with a big hug, a smile and inviting you to spend a pleasant time with us.
landmark: Yes Public

name: Robotronia
description:
Fun and unique interactive art including our own Pump-bot game, Periscope of Procrastination, Hotshot the Robot, Humdrum the Washing Machine and others!
Battery charging and electronics repair stations available at most hours.
landmark: Large round sign w/ a robot face logo

name: Camp Contact
description: Camp Contact is dedicated to offering a more embodied world through Contact Improvisation, Acro Yoga, Ecstatic Dance, Internal Family Systems, and other Psychotechnologies.  We bring a dance floor, steam bath, and domes for our offerings!
landmark: Multi Colored Shade Structure -Pinwheel

name: Ludus Symposium
description: Ludus (playful love) Symposium (Meeting for music, drinking and intellectual discussion) is a place to hang out on our friendly deck/bar above the playa and watch cheezy cult movies.
landmark: Colorful Ohm flags

name: Chicken Cooter Soup
description: Chicken Cooter Soup, a band of misfits, born of the playa, dedicated to give back via hot dogs, ice cream, and root beer
landmark: 40ft, 12ft tall, MCI bus with solar or neon signs

name: Lounge Syndrome
description:
Welcome to Lounge Syndrome at Burning Man!

Nestled in the heart of the playa, Lounge Syndrome is a vibrant, welcoming camp celebrating diversity and creativity. We're built on principles of Radical Inclusion and Communal Effort, making our space a sanctuary for Burners from all walks of life. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a first-time attendee, if you're positive and open-minded, you're welcome here.

Dive into unique experiences like our Leopard Bingo and Lounge Synth Dome, fostering connections and self-expression. We're more than events; we're a community dedicated to sustainability, self-reliance, and leaving no trace. Every member contributes to our clean, safe, and inclusive environment.
landmark: Large geodesic dome, Camp sign 'Lounge Syndrome"

name: Bumblepuss
description: Bumblepuss brings a spa theme to the playa with the addition of the aromatherapy focused Lavender Lounge. Visit and soak in the aromas while you relax in the shade after your steam bath.
landmark: steam bath and lavender dome

name: Kazbah
description: Kazbah is the tower that protects the kingdom.  Its where the local leader resides, in our case the DJ, playing house music and good vibes from midnight to noonish on Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday mornings.
landmark: 48' tall pyramid obelisk w/laser blasting the sky

name: Femme Noir
description: The Femme Noir Theater will be hosting a variety of performances throughout the week before the main feature film plays at 8:30PM. We will be featuring local Femme Noir talent and neighbor Burners alike. We have expanded our cuddle puddle zones in our theatre to entice relaxation among the audience while our burlesque shows, psychedelic story times, and open mic comedy nights unfold. We can't wait to share our collection of black and white films that will be showing with each respective theme of the night. There will be no gate-keeping around here, they are ready and willing to give you some tips to step into your very own burlesque persona for the night.  At some point, it will be time to settle down for a moment and share some tea. Only time will tell, and time is an illusion.
landmark: 60' pole LED green light

name: The Donner Party
landmark: 3 story led beacon and covered wagon art car

name: Nest of Magical Creatures
description: We celebrate the magic in every beautiful creature. We thrive on helping everyone discover the magic within themselves through art, music, activities and experiences that aid this process.
landmark: Magic eye portal. 10' tall and shaped like an eye.

name: FAFA Camp
landmark: FAFA sign

name: Martha Love
description: Martha - Sharing Love; Jump on board and enjoy the loving company, visit the artists, and the best beats in Black Rock
landmark: Martha Love Sign

name: Milk + Honey
description: Milk + Honey's mission is to draw on both secular and spiritual traditions to create experiences for people to grow, heal and express themselves creatively. We are excited to offer our fifteenth Playa Shabbat service and gathering, inclusive of vegan food and entertainment following the ceremony, which draws on secular and spiritual traditions for the creative expression and collective healing of individuals and communities. We nourish the hearts, spirits, and bodies of all who find themselves wandering in the desert! Come hang, eat, drink, dance, play, and perform with us throughout the week!
landmark: Giant Milk + Honey banner hung from 53' container

name: Dr.Baron von Realz, Esq. Sideshow
description:
Come join our circus of freaks
Burning man will be here before you know it and "Dr. Baron von Realz Esq. most spectacular Steampunk Sideshow of altered reality and debauchery" needs you. Come join our circus of freaks and be a part of the shenanigans of our camp. Flaming girls, tattoos, body modifications, piercings, carnies, performers, artists, suicide girls, freaks, geeks, and other oddities are welcome to fill our ranks. Besides filling our ranks we are always looking for dedicated minions to help us set up and tear down the camp, couch taters need not apply. We are looking for people who want to be Burning Man, not people who want go to Burning Man.
landmark: 30 foot dome cover in camouflage parchute

name: Unnecessarily High Five
landmark: UH5 sign with white light around, 12 feet up

name: 706 Tribe
description: A pioneer, convener, and incubator exploring unlimited possibilities of personal, spiritual, and social transformation. In the long term we aim to incubate various of communities experimenting with authentic relating, psychological support, and co-living space with its members. We will explore & incubate sustainable living powered by technologies, and experiments future lifestyles. We eagerly participate in building a more compassionate, inclusive, connected, and sustainable world.
landmark: streched tent with a 706 logo on it

name: Node
description: Node is an oasis of epic proportions. serving coffee daily from 830ish-11, followed by morning vibes daily. Dont miss our Hip Hop BBQ on Wednesday!
landmark: glowing pink triangular sign at night

name: Refugee Camp
description:
The journey to Burning Man involves leaving behind the familiar and embarking on a journey towards the unknown. This shared experience resonates deeply with the journey of immigrants, refugees, and boat people, who leave behind everything they know to navigate unfamiliar territory in search of a sense of home in an unlikely place. Black Rock City Refugee Camp celebrates the strength, resilience, ingenuity, and compassion of these remarkable communities.

With open hearts, we welcome all who seek solace, camaraderie, and belonging. Join our journey of resilience and celebration, as we create a space where the enduring spirit of immigrants, refugees, and boat people shines brightly in the heart of Black Rock City.
landmark: Quan Am (Quan Yin) with radiating LED Halo

name: Lil Playa Plane Ground Crew
description: Welcome to the Lil' Playa Plane Ground Crew! You can find us at the airport flags in front, if the plane is in the hanger stop on by for a cool refreshment and good conversations
landmark: Lil' Playa Plane in the hanger! with Airport flags

name: Blinky Things Hospital
description: Shit breaks on the playa. Electronic shit super breaks. Did you bring a full repair shop? No? Good news - we did. Come to camp MVC and our Blinky Things Hospital to leverage the tools, voltmeters, and engineering talent you need to troubleshoot your ride, exhibit or playa gifts and, hopefully, get it fully functional again. MVC is staffed by the creators of the eight-foot, LED illuminated, motorized, sound-infused Burner Boards (surfboards) you may have seen riding across the playa…. You might even get a ride! But no, we're not going to build you or sell you a board.
landmark: "Blinky Things Hospital" sign by the front door.

name: The Wastelanders
description: Wastelanders, the apocalyptic band of miscreants bringing drinks and entertainment during the evenings and peace and tranquility during the day.
landmark: Post apocalyptic vehicles and the Black thumb bar

name: Chariot Project
description: Injured? Have a curious mishap? Fear not! Chariot Project has a rainbow fleet for hurt feet. Our pedal-powered mobility carts are available for checkout by the day to attach to your own bike.  While you are here you can explore our enchanting collection of canes, orthopedic boots, braces, and more to help you on your healing journey.
landmark: Yellow Flags, Bike Pump Sign and A Frame

name: OKNOTOK
description: OKNOTOK stands as a beacon for those yearning to taste the magic of the unknown. Here, beneath a sign that dances between OPEN and CLOSED at the whim of the cosmic OK-CAFE team—comprising the alchemist CHEF, the voyaging SERVER, and the guardian HOST—reality is gently stirred and poured anew. Seated with strangers you will taste flavors unique to your combination... and whatever the CHEF might create just for you.
landmark: 24 foot red-painted tower with OK mounted on top.

name: Nice Nice
description: Nice Nice comprises an international group of artists, musicians, yogis, dancers, scientists, and creators. We're the camp with the great Hanging Gongs and RimbaBamboo Pipes. At Nice Nice we take an old-school approach to Burning Man -- interacting and connecting one-on-one, person-to-person. You're invited to come by anytime to Bang the Gongs or Jam on the RimBamBoo Pipes. Or join us around our camp fire at night and warm up with a cup of coffee.
landmark: Nice Nice sign, Hanging bells/gongs, and Fire pit.

name: The G-Spot & Sloth Sinema
description: Can you find the G-Spot?  We are your favorite neighborhood dive bar.  Come thirsty, leave happy!  New for 2024 we are shifting to an evening offering and opening the Sloth Sinema.  Join us for a chill evening of great movies, themed cocktails, and of course, shenanigans!  Family-friendly matinees included.  Already have plans for the evening?  Come by in the morning for "Saturday" morning cartoons and milk and cereal.  Just like mom used to make.
landmark: Godzilla  and G-Spot signs

name: The Cloud Mutant Vehicle Support
description: Our camp is a collective of cloud enthusiats dedicated to transporting you to Cloud 9. We leave every 6 minutes.
landmark: 20ft flagpole with a cloud on it

name: Kindergarten Kamp
description: We are fun place to let you inner child come out to play. Our main interactivity will be our playground for all ages.
landmark: Large well lighted sign "Kindergarten Kamp"

name: Crepes and Tonic
description: Crepe and Gin&Tonic on French Electronic music, a kitchen, bar, and a small sound system. We will promote a French touch with crepes every day before sunset, serving spirit-free drinks all day and Gin Tonic during happy hours.
landmark: Crepe and tonic vinyl banner

name: Off Brand
description: Bike not doing so hot? Come to our 24/7 bike repair area, we supply the tools and tarps. When we're open (2-5 Monday-Friday) we will have a team to help with your repair. While waiting for your bike, we offer stencil airbrushing and leather branding with a little mood music. Come visit we have shade and will share.
landmark: Multi flag shade structure: US, South Africa, etc

name: PickleBack Mountain
description: Come by and enjoy our homemade Pickle Back Juice at our Pickle Back Bar. Come through our Saloon Doors in Space, mosey on up to bar, throw down a Pickle Back! Then, for the daring, jump on Gherkin our famous Bucking Pickle for the buck of your life!
landmark: Bucking Pickle

name: Whiskey and Dust Mutants
description:
Whiskey and Dust Mutants is a hybrid camp riding on the coattails of the beloved Whiskey and Dust Theme Camp, who are taking a well-deserved break this year. But fear not, because Whiskey and Dust Mutants will be there to support two mutant vehicles, Ma'am the Mammoth and Frederick the Nautilus, all while teaching the masses about good whiskey. 

So, we got together with the Golden Guy Alley where we will be building a new bar. Look for the iconic Whiskey and Dust neon sign. But wait, there's more! You can find a Speakeasy in the Mutant Vehicle Support Camp. While the alley bar will be a little more focused on whiskey education and limited to six guests at a time, the Speakeasy is a good place to hang out during any moment of the day or night like in the Whiskey and Dust bar of yesterday.
landmark: Red 20x20 tent

name: Kaleidoscope
description:
We serve individually brewed cups of exceptional, single-origin coffee prepared by our baristas. Our relaxing lounge area, adorned with low tables, cushions, and ambient music, encourages you to engage in meaningful conversations with fellow Burners.

Finally, don't miss the opportunity to climb our iconic 26 ft crow's nest lookout tower. This unique structure offers a high vantage point to take in the sights and sounds of Black Rock City.
landmark: 50x33 ft cafe, tower and the Kaleidoscope sign

name: BRC Ski Resort
description: With great powder comes great responsibility. Black Rock City Ski Resort's EXTRAterrestrial hosts welcome all earthlings to join us for in the apres-ski experience of a lifetime. Send it on the dance floor with Frosty the Snowman Discoball and our iconic DJs, kick it and recharge in our luxurious hexayurt lounge, and get toasty at Starfucks coffee bar with the playa's finest cold brew and shot-skis.
landmark: Gondola and gate/sign next to the ski ramp!

name: Happy Hair Salon and Happy Cones
description: Happy Hair Salon is a colored hair extension, rave braid, bubble braid salon where we give burners hair makeovers while serving them snow cones. You might have the perfect outfit and shoes for Burning Man, but if you don't have Happy Hair, what do you really have anyways?
landmark: Big rectangle tent with a runway in front

name: Bag o' Dicks
description: Free spirited camp with good beats, booze, and the friendliest bag o' dicks around! Look for the big LED dicks in the sky and come say hi. A bag o' dicks isn't always a bad thing, come check out our dicks and judge for yourself.  Come warm up your dick by our bonfire most nights or early mornings.
landmark: 3 neon dicks in the sky with sparkly come shots

name: Fake Moon Factory
description:
Fake Moon Factory is an international team of extraordinary Burners working together with Australian artist Clayton Blake, to bring art to the playa. 
We have exhibited the iconic shopping cart sculpture titled "Perpetual Consumption" (2018), shipping container sculpture "Containerisation" (2019), and inflatable ball sculpture "Toxic" (2022).
Last year we created a 26ft stainless steel inhabitable rocket titled "Odyssey" (2023). 
Beyond the art, we had a nightly "launch" performance on playa and held artists talks daily in our camp hosting other prominent BM artists.
We are excited to be back in 2024 with our most ambitious project to date, "Sanctum". A 30ft tall inhabitable and interactive sculpture guaranteed to challenge and inspire.
landmark: Inflatable mushrooms

name: Be Less Gross
description: Are you tired of being gross? We have your important answers, adventurous quests, and can offer the comfort of a gently used mullet. BE LESS GROSS with us. We will conjure supernatural, psychomagical experiences individually designed for you.
landmark: yellow booth and pink & green flags

name: Secret Mantra
description: Secret Mantra is a space that brings together the high-caliber community triggers of entrepreneurs, pioneers, and seekers of spiritual practices.
landmark: Secret Mantra sign with Blossom and Star of Agenda

name: Simian Akademy
description: Flat bike tire?  Drop by "Tubes, Lubes, & Boobs"; our team of hotties will have you patched up, lubed, and on your way! After it's been replaced, what to do with that limp inner-tube? Take it to "Sexy Treads" sustainability station & convert it into fabulous fetish wear! Tools, supplies, & examples are on-hand to create a sexy, strappy harness! Looking for a unique interactive experience? Come visit the Olfactorium where our Mistress of Scent will concoct a custom perfume just for you, based on your unique, personal preferences. Cranky from the heat? New best friend getting on your nerves already? You need to CHILL THE FUCK OUT & COLOR! Visit our shaded dome to relax & color your frustrations away. Choose a beautifully embellished swear word, or perhaps a pic of unicorns being total assholes!
landmark: Two pointy white pylons, and dome with 6 antennas

name: Camp THREAT
description: Dominating the portos for 5 years running. Unofficial Headquarters of The Black Rock City Communist Party (BRCCP). Gonzo Decommodification Experts and Proud Purveyors of Bullshit. Sales and Service 100% Guaranteed to soothe the soul and waste the body and mind. Cold looks and warm seats. The whiskey is tolerable and the wine is worse. While supplies last. Conditions and terms apply. We are not a cult.
landmark: Scaffold tower, commie flags, road signs,

name: Chai Lounge
description: The Chai Lounge is a place where we celebrate life over a cup of chai, in a drum circle, during ecstatic dance, and inside our portal where we explore the unseen realm! The Lounge's mission is to bring people into sincere interaction with one another and experience deep love and a profound, spiritual, consensual healing. This is facilitated through our camp healers. We will invite guests to sit and connect over tea and join us in creative activities such as our large drum and handpan circle, ecstatic dance, as well as yoga, Tai Chi flow arts, painting, journaling and drawing.
landmark: 3 flags on one pole: Chai Lounge, Love, and   חי

name: STRANGELOVE
description:
Fly the Friendly! 

Come get your altitude and your attitude adjusted in our airliner-themed lounge, where each afternoon you can enjoy the company of your fellow jetsetters while you sip ice-cold draft beer or a signature cocktail and groove to tasty house beats at our 16-foot wing-shaped bar.
landmark: airliner walls painted white, blue, and grey

name: La Felicità
landmark: LA FELICITÀ sign

name: !Zoom!
description: Immerse yourself in Camp !Zoom!, an aquatic playground oasis celebrating decades on the playa. Our camp offers a whimsical mix of adult-sized "sea-monkey" bars, swings, and a wobbly walk to rekindle your playful spirit. As dusk falls, be captivated by our LED seascape and thrilling fire spinning shows. Experience the joy of aerial acrobatics on our Lyra, participate in fire spinning sessions, or unwind in our serene lounge. Embracing R.I.D.E., we welcome all to share in our legacy of creativity, community, and unforgettable moments. Dive into a sea of adventure and come !ZOOM! with us!
landmark: The giant LED "Z" Tower

name: Camp of the Rising Buns
description: Camp of the Rising Buns is a community that celebrates the many gifts of the sun. Come to our Abuntent to experience the renewal of a new day while basking in the evaporative cooling powered by the gift of the sun's rays. "Sun's out, Buns out!"
landmark: Two large Lotus Mahal Belle Tents in OASIS HUB

name: Good Question
description:
What can you expect from our camp? Good Question!

Stop by our shady oasis to deepen your connection with your friends and loved ones, or meet a new friend entirely in a cozy, intimate atmosphere. You'll leave feeling more connected to others, and having formed a deeper connection with yourself.

Come by in the afternoon when we will be serving tea and batch tea cocktails, or stop by late at night to warm yourself by the fire. Additionally, we will be hosting 24/7 self guided deeper connection activities in our cozy frontage. 

There are no wrong answers, only Good Questions!
landmark: 30' blue container with our camp sign "G O O D ?"

name: Gears & Beers
description:
From rusted out Jalopies to busted Art Cars, we're your on-playa resource for vehicle, art car and mobility equipment repairs.  

With mechanics from shade tree to professional working our repair shop, there's a curated inventory of often-needed parts in-stock plus raw materials, specialty tools and field experience, we'll fix your clapped out rig and get you back on playa for everyone to enjoy!

Repair Shop is open Sat, Sun, Tues & Thurs. Hours vary by day and mechanics may be out on field repairs. Walk-in only.  No working during drinking hours.

Our dive bar serves multiple taps of ice-cold microbrews paired with 80's New Wave music, Bar is typically open afternoons and evenings so please come over for repairs, or a beer... Or both!

WE DON'T DO FUCKING BIKES!
landmark: Trailer with giant beer mug logo facing street

name: Hookers & Peggers Naughty Cafe
landmark: Large wooden ring & hook game

name: A Confederacy of Dunces
description: We're a New Orleans based BIPOC and Queer welcoming group hailing from New Orleans, North Carolina, New York, Massachusetts, California, Oregon, Texas, Washington, DC, Alaska, Virginia, Kentucky, Africa, England, Brisbane, Australia, Belarus and South Africa.
landmark: The White Snowflake (it's lit at night)

name: A Medium Place
description: Welcome to an impermanent realm of mediocre existence curated especially for Burning Man. Our uninspired camp is the not-so-premiere destination for unexpectedly disappointing experiences and half-assed fuckery; the metaphorical handy, where no one fucks yer Burn.
landmark: Train, "A Medium Place" sign

name: Tarwater
description: Look for the mannequin caged in a travois:   There you'll find Lady S's Boutique, Cut throat Bowling, the Cabinets of Curiosity, Scrabble Fortune Telling, miscellaneous games and the welcoming denizens of Tarwater. You'll also recognize us by the crusty old Rat Taxi, parked in front.
landmark: The mannequin caged in a travois, front corner.

name: Luxurious Vagrants
description: Luxurious Vagrants are where sandy bodies meet rough luxury
landmark: Diamond lit up on top of 20ft canopy. Lux vag sign

name: Jewish Space Lasers&Shirtcockers
landmark: Jewish Space Lasers, shirtcockers and darkwads

name: Mobility Camp
description: Mobility Camp offers accessible Camping and provides mobility services to the Disabled and Walking wounded. We loan out crutches, wheelchairs, knee scooters, etc. Tours into the Deep Playa 3-4 times a day. Charging station for Medical Equipment.
landmark: Crutch Sunburst with silhouettes of disabled Man.

name: KeyHaus
landmark: Big Tea Temple Tent w/ 'Remove Shoes Please' sign

name: SomeDay Isle ...
description:
SomeDay Isle... Tiki Bar and Broth'l
Inspiration Destination and Late Night Orientation Staytion.
We encourage you to find your dreams.
landmark: 4 Neon Green 15' tall Flags, big SomeDay Isle sign

name: Found It
description:
You know that rush of relief when, amidst the panic of losing something, someone shouts "Found it!" That's the essence of CFI. We're a tribe of seekers, driven by the love of music and friendship. Here, every discovery is a cause for celebration!

CFI is the perfect blend of all-night ragers, and self-discovery, making us the go-to spot for those craving a side of enlightenment with their euphoria.

Get ready for 3 epic parties with, quirky themed cocktails from the open bar, and guitar-sax-drum-DJ mashups.

Daytime's for soul-stirring workshops like daily meditation and the infamous "Croc Talk". Plus, our spontaneous Ramen Nights might just make a comeback.

You'll know when you've FOUND IT!
landmark: 3ft x 5ft wooden light up "Found it" sign.

name: Schnitzel Camp
description: "Schnitzel - camp" serving best Schnitzel on playa! Watch out for the crazy food truck!
landmark: Schnitzel Camp Food truck

name: Maybe Bike Repair
description:
There's no faster way to fuck your burn than to have a broken bike. Bikes break. If you've ever had a broken bike on playa you know it sucks. A broken bike is much worse than no bike at all.A broken bike on Playa is the fucking worst; so, we get Burners with Broken Bikes back to burning by fixing their beaters. Does it always work? No. That's why we're "Maybe Bike Repair." 

We're a group of committed bike mechanics, enthusiasts, and artists who work with Burners with Broken Bikes to unfuck their bikes.
landmark: Giant trailer with "Maybe Bike Repair?" sign

name: Synaesthesia
description: Visit our synaesthetic dreamworld where movement/light/sound unite!
landmark: Glowing multicolor "Synaesthesia" sign in front

name: Celestial Tea Garden
description: Welcome to Celestial Tea Garden Camp, a vibrant, women-led, multicultural oasis celebrating the rich diversity of asian and asian-american culture amidst the dusty canvas of Burning Man. Our camp is a sanctuary where ancient traditions meet modern playfulness, all dedicated to fostering a deep sense of community, understanding, and radical inclusion.
landmark: Flashing LED Sign and Giant Talking Panda Bear

name: Alchemy Stop
description: Alchemy Stop is a dusty sanctuary for anyone to enjoy a quiet musical retreat with a cold hand-made limoncello in hand. Look for our open bar and block printing stations - we will be welcoming you with open arms.
landmark: Bar with a large LIMONCELLO sign

name: Snow Cone Zone
description: Snow Cones
landmark: snow cone sign

name: The Church Of No FOMO
description:
The Church Of No FOMO will help you exorcise Fear of Missing Out (FOMO) from your life! It is our mission to help you deal with Past FOMO, Present FOMO, and Future FOMO in healthy and / or impulsive ways!

Stop by our camp for impulse weddings, improvisational re-enactments of events that you missed during the pandemic, and conversations about how to be present in diverse society.
landmark: Bell tent and sign that says "Church Of No FOMO"

name: Afterglow Lounge & Spa
description: A communal space of nurturement where wandering burners can rejuvenate, relax and recharge.  A caring place where burners can restore and reignite their radiant glow. Come to enjoy the spa, grab a drink and relax at the lounge, or get weird to the sound of our beats to show off that new sexy glow!
landmark: Afterglow signage

name: HORIZON
description: HORIZON is a camp of community, celebration, curiosity and creativity. Enjoy the stunning views from atop our 16' viewing decks, lounge under our stretch tents, get weird at our corner Carnival Bar, and show us your moves at our variety of dance parties.
landmark: 16' high sunset viewing towers with HORIZON sign

name: Foreskin
description: Camp Foreskin, not what you're thinking!  We provide facials throughout the week For Your Skin!  Great group of people just wanting to give back to our community.  Come chill with us anytime and you might be in for a skin-gasm.
landmark: up 20 ft 2 ft led dick shooting on 4' "face mask"

name: JOUJOU
description: Our camp is a multicultural, multi-sensory oasis that offers live concerts, panel talks, and workshops. The camp's atmosphere and aesthetic are inspired by our campers' diverse backgrounds from Native American to Bedouin. JOUJOU is built around the ethos of inclusive and dedicated hospitality. We welcome all at our communal tent and lounge for our open series program.
landmark: JOUJOU metal sign in front of a large Indian tent

name: Octopus Garden
description: Octopus Garden is a psychedelic underwater lounge and game room with evening through sunrise music and vibrant, funky vibes.
landmark: giant inflatable purple tentacles

name: Camp Tell You
landmark: "Camp Tell You" frontage sign and LEDs

name: Temple Oasis
description:
Temple Oasis is a decompression spot and camp for those who have gathered at, worked at, or been a Guardian at the Temple.

An Oasis on the playa from the heaviness of the Temple and our service to it; a place to find others who are welcome to talk or sit in knowing silence as we unwind our experiences.
landmark: Blue Temple Oasis banner or lit-up sandwich board

name: Swirl Support
description: Basecamp / garage for Chosen Yogurt.
landmark: A glowing sign that says "Swirl Support"

name: Jurassic Playark
description: Jurassic Playark promises a prehistoric party experience like no other. So grab your dino-gear and let's make this desert adventure legendary before we all go extinct!!
landmark: Find the metal t-rex!

name: pandemonium
description:
kinky or jus curious ?  either way we have  a home for you at camp pandemonium Where chaos becomes joy, and pain is pleasure.
Home of the Flaming Heart.  come enjoy some of our guided kink classes in rope, flogging /impact, and fireplay. enjoy our 2 story pyramid and grand views above the dust . swing is our lyra open 24/7.  dance w djs on our intimate  dance floor. meet old friends and make new ones. pandemonium is what you make it ...come explore
landmark: twin pyramids

name: CatLand
description: Step into CatLand, Burning Man's haven for feline enthusiasts. Join us for themed parties featuring tacos, stretching sessions paired with doughnuts, and craft activities all centered around our beloved cats. Indulge in our open bar, where camaraderie flows as freely as the drinks. Escape into a world where every moment is infused with the whimsy and wonder of our furry friends. Experience magic of CatLand, where the spirit of Burning Man meets the playful spirit of cats.
landmark: Red and White Circus Tent and White/Pink Cat Flare

name: Iron Monkeys
description: Home to the Iron Monkeys, the creators of Glimmer
landmark: blue, tan, green shade, fire pit, Monkey Logo

name: The Salvage Yard
description: We are an art support camp bringing "The (Re)Salvaged Spoon", a 2024 Honoraria art installation. We believe in the magic of reuse and the transformative power it has to change the world. Stop by our installation to revel in the many wonderful things we've brought to show you.
landmark: pink and blue Sunrise Diner awning and signage

name: Choo Choo
description: Experience the ultimate musical journey at BiPolar Express Mutant Vehicle support camp! Groove to electrifying DJ sets on our top-notch sound system while enjoying refreshing drinks from our bar. Unwind with healing meditative music sessions that soothe the soul. Join us for an unforgettable fusion of beats and serenity at BiPolar Express!
landmark: Black flag with "Choo Choo" camp name and 2 trains

name: Capricious Cat Herding
description: Capricious Cat Herders may be fickle but like all felines we can be won over by good snacks and scratches. Come for comfort, catamount connections, and leonine learning. What are you waiting for? Come join right meow!
landmark: Capricious Cat Banner

name: Playfully Yours Village
description: Playfully Yours VIllage is an adult themed camp. The Playfully Yours Dungeon is a well equipped dungeon area for those who are beginners and intermediate and also those who have been curious about dungeon play. We provide a welcoming experience in a safe and supervised dungeon. We have a variety of equipment and toys for you to experiment and play with such as floggers, crops and paddles and we will show you how to use them properly and help facilitate your play.  We focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon play. Spend some time in our Playfully Yours Lounge and enjoy a tasty beverage. Spin our wheel of play, we dare you! Enjoy being the pet in our human petting zoo. Enjoy a spanking or flogging while you visit! Enjoy our great music, stop by to dance, and drink with us!
landmark: Marque lit Playfully sign/ Dbl white peak tent

name: Heavy Petting Zoo
description: Heavy Petting Zoo's main purpose is to create community while providing spontaneous opportunities for fun and inclusion for all species of party animals.
landmark: "HPZ" sign

name: Camp One More
description: Camp One More's ethos is "Yes!" or even "Okayyy". How did we get here? By a series of excellent choices of course! Join Camp One More for a bevvy at the Excellent Choice Bar during Canadian Breakfast which is neither traditionally Canadian nor a typical breakfast. We welcome you to hang out and enjoy the high low-key vibes in the Excellent Choice Lounge or Liff Laff Luff tent. Make sure to stop and hop on our see saw for a moonlit bounce!
landmark: Camp sign + Seesaw (lit) & Excellent Choice Flag

name: Camp Peachy
description: Apeachiate the peachy cocktails, peachy bum art and peachy tunes. Ain't life a peach!
landmark: big white flag with a peach on it

name: Oh mi Gato! Cat Cafe
description: Oh Mi Gato Cat Cafe, offering a unique cat experience for cat lovers, haters, and cat spirits. Come sip, snack, relax, and dance salsa with us. Clean your claws at our 24/7 spa and visit our cat art gallery space.
landmark: Large wooden cat pic cutout in front of camp

name: Candyland
description:
Come join the fun at CandyLand. Enjoy a sweet treat from one of a dozen retro decorated candy dispensing machines. Then you can step over to our "Candy Bar" for a shot of Jolly Rancher flavored Vodka.
After choosing your favorite vodka flavor, get in line at "The Claw" for an opportunity for more treats, and some x-rated toys for those over 18.
CandyLand is open everyday until 6 pm.
landmark: CandyLand Sign

name: Womxn Sex-positive&Pleasure Sluts
description: "Womxn Sex-positive & Pleasure Sluts" is dedicated to creating a safe, inclusive, and empowering space for womxn (women/non-binary/trans/genderqueer/lgbtq/etc.) to explore and celebrate their sexuality, creativity, and personal growth. Our camp offers a vibrant array of interactivity that engages participants in a variety of enriching experiences. Join our ecstatic dance parties, sex-positive events/workshops, and our signature event the "Bang Sluts Orgy Bus!" where participants can explore their desires in a consensual and respectful environment, and enjoy delicious vegetarian or vegan meals.
landmark: Rainbow lights & purple RV in the middle.

name: Blue CATerpillar
description: Come to the Wonderland Hookah Lounge to enjoy Tribal/Shamanic beats, herbal teas, cool smoothies and a variety of games like Backgammon, Chess, Checkers, Dice Poker, Spy, The Hat, Catan, CodeNames, UNO, etc. For those looking for more active entertainment we have a 15' trampoline and foosball, so put your best foot forward!
landmark: Big Blue CATerpillar figure, lit at night

name: Aurora
description: Konnichiwa, pardner. Whether you're coming home from a long night in the saddle or just mounting up for the day, join us for a fresh bowl of ramen that'll soothe both body and soul. Sidle up to our cozy bar, share a tale with a stranger, and settle your spirit to the sweet sounds of smooth grooves.
landmark: Aurora sign, flat top bar shade structure

name: Awesomesauce
description: We are a Unicorn ranch decorated in bright fuchsia pink, lights and unicorns. We run an afternoon bar, called The unStable, with daily events, and serve our unique 'Unicorn Tears' drinks. We also have Awesomeball - large inflatable Zorb balls people can climb in and bash against each other.
landmark: Bright pink lounge/bar & a pink lined ball field!

name: Wild Horses support camp
landmark: a banner with "Wild Horses Art Support Camp"

name: Black Rock City Tea Company
description: Enjoy a hot or cold cup of fine tea and engaging conversation in our calming Tea Salon, and participate in a Tea Ceremony led by our enlightened Tea Masters. In the late afternoon sing along during Human Karaoke with our famous songstress and her 300 tune songbook. Our tea bartenders are pleased to add libations to tea for guests of legal drinking age.
landmark: Teal picket fence and arbor with Tea Shop logo

name: Do What You Will
description: Come one, come all! Join us and Do What You Will in either our sober area or our bar area. We have games, activities, parties, art tours, and COLD BREW. We welcome all to swing by and kick your feet up, have a drink, play some games or just...Do What You Will
landmark: Trailer painted like "Starry Night"

name: Gigsville
description: Gigsville embodies decades of Burning Man history, mixing a spirit of playful anarchy with a deep commitment to inclusion. Renowned for our legendary fuckery, we create a space where creativity and rebellion flourish. Here, every form of individuality is celebrated, from seasoned burners to wide-eyed newcomers. Our ethos is built on challenging norms and embracing everyone with a penchant for mischief and a heart for community. Expect the unexpected: from mind-bending installations to spontaneous performances, all wrapped in our trademark humor. Gigsville: where history, hijinks, and heartfelt acceptance collide.
landmark: burnt-out, or on fire, white Chevy Suburban

name: Pink Heart
description: We welcome all Burners! Whatever state you are in, you are welcome at Pink Heart. Recalibrate your body, mind and spirit with chilled water, vegan ice cream served on Tues and Wed from 1pm-4pm, and transformative buffer massages. Process how Black Rock City has blown your mind and changed you into something different. Find your way home via our Pink Heart Arch Beacon or stop and feel safe in our comfy pink cocoon of shade. Share your experiences (and yourself) on our pink fur couches while gazing upon the beautiful open Playa.
landmark: Pink fur couches & glowing pink heart arch beacon.

name: CAMP JUICY
description: SMOOTHIES! 11am-5pm. Come get a fruity, frosty, frozen orange banana smoothie with extra playa love! If you come on the right day you'll get some frozen berries, mangos and pineapples. We encourage you to bring your entire camp or village. We love our guests! We want to talk with you about your love of fruit and juice. There could be a snow cone in it for you too. We will have a DJ spinning for your enjoyment and a chill lounge to hang out in the shade.
landmark: CAMP JUICY SIGN/ORANGES

name: Arcane Spirits
description: Come cast a love spell or hazard a curse! The cauldron is hot and the spirits are hungry: tarot, theme nights, and magical lore galore. The pointy hat is optional, but thirst is mandatory.
landmark: green glowing sign that says "Arcane Spirits"

name: Porta Party
description: Porta Party: The camp with the remote controlled Porta Potty and Hel's Diner art car from which they serve potstickers!
landmark: Red & White star shades and big Porta Party sign

name: The Outpost: GGA
description: Ever been to Golden Guy Alley? Golden Guy East is on the other side of The Playa. If you're at Golden Guy Alley, start walking east til you reach the man, and then keep walking. If you reach the airport, you've gone too far. We recommend the buddy system to avoid getting lost.
landmark: Moms

name: Lady Whiskey
description: Lady Whiskey Support Camp - home of the LW MV.
landmark: large, rusty train car.

name: Shitty Glitter
description: Welcome to SHITTY GLITTER, a boutique Bed and Breakfast providing the most luxurious hospitality experience in Black Rock City. Stop by for a rest in the clean white linens on one of our freshly made canopy beds (changed daily) and be sure to chat with a camp concierge to get the most out of your stay. Be sure to swing by The Parlor on Wednesday evening for our breakfast (for dinner) party where we'll be serving breakfast burritos and dancing the night away. If you're in need of some relaxation, check out our in-house spa, SPAcate, where we'll be providing cold Tecate, face masks, massage chairs and other gadgetry to put you in the ultimate state of relaxation.
landmark: Neon pink Shitty Glitter sign hanging out front

name: Black Rock Cinemas
description: Black Rock Cinemas is pleased to announce that "The Playa Film Festival" has arrived. We have curated a selection of short films to entertain, amuse, challenge, inspire, educate and otherwise get the conversation kicked up a notch. Our 75-minute screenings are followed by an After Party you won't want to miss with drinks and popcorn. Be sure to add your "Sandprints" to our outside theatre walls and cast your vote for our "Burner Choice Awards." Every day is a new selection of 4-6 short films. Come enjoy a show in our cinema tent, or at one of our two street theatres. Check our web site for showtimes and Special Events We are here to interact with you and present the Playa's most underrepresented art form: film. Come play with us.
landmark: Two triangular needles 20 ft high and glowing pink

name: HIGHKU
landmark: Torii gate with our camp name across the top

name: Shotski Wanderlust
description: Shotski Wanderlust, we have it all! Shotski's Skiing! Snowboarding! Nipple Dunk Challenge and Après Ski in the lounge!
landmark: Ski lift chair, Shotski signage

name: Secret Garden
description: Lounge camp that hosts events, dance parties, and classes. Cooling rags are available in the afternoon. Feel free to sleep in our lounge if you don't want to go back to your camp at night or the wee hours of the morning.
landmark: Lotus Tent and Secret Garden circular metal sign

name: Empire of Dirt
description: The terran home for the Spaceship EMPIRE art vehicle as well as The Wrecker. Also home to the Purple Unicorn Sexy Army art team.
landmark: Plasma cut arched metal sign saying Empire of Dirt

name: COOT: Crew Out of Time
description:
We are the art support camp for Matter Out of Time (MOOT), a theramin powered time machine which originally appeared in 2014. 

MOOT appears as a shiny, spiky ball, partially embedded in the playa. However, upon entry and interaction, it comes alive and your travel through time is controlled by your motion!
landmark: Beacon (LED firework), M/COOT sign, couch swing

name: Space Racers
description: Have at least a marginal interest in space? Us too! Slide into our stargates to experience micro-penis-gravity with big dipper energy. Pop by our Refueling Station for out of this world drinks, karaoke, lecture series and more!
landmark: "Space Racers" Banner + 3 ring stargate sculpture

name: Raised by Wolves
description: An actual wolf pack is primarily composed of siblings. We're not related—or wolves—but we do yell at the moon. Raised by Wolves is a community of artists and doers who gather in the desert to create epic fun and invite everyone in to share our space and run with the wolves. Come visit us (T, Th, + F) for nights filled with beautiful live music, whimsical interactions, and unique artistic and creative experiences. From magical elixirs to intimate puppet shows, amateur dentistry, and hand stuff, it's an evening to remember. We also serve the best evening beverages to keep you going all night long. On Tue, Wed, and Thurs during the day we offer the opportunity to battle friends and foes alike with foam swords. No experience needed. It's the best thing you'll put in your hand all day. We're fun.
landmark: Pyramid-shaped dome topped w wolf head LED beacon

name: The Juice Boxx
description: Large font wooden sign says "the juice Boxx"
landmark: Large wooden sign reads juiceboxx

name: Amulet
description: The Curious cross into the dome, and The Curiousor find the answers.    At our Amulet table, you'll be gifted a brass dog tag; pre-stamped with the Burning Man symbol. Our highly skilled Amulet Counselors will guide and inspire you to make your mark, and answer the great pressing questions of your life as you customize your Amulet. Using metal stamping tools you can add names, numbers, symbols, astrological signs, and Viking runes.  After you have all the answers, we'll put your Amulet on a necklace, keychain or bracelet for you when you're finished.
landmark: Two 15' tall yellow/blue Amulet flags lit at night

name: Epiffany & Co
landmark: Mexico Tobago Peru & Catalan Flags, Orange Shade

name: Trashistan
description: It's a food bank AND a cinema! Pop by, tell us your tale of woe, and replace your lost food. Vegan and keto available while supplies last. Grab some popcorn and stay for a movie after the sun goes down. Ride the 4 speed creature. It trots, it gallops, it has a replaceable head. Spoken word project available, complete with striped tent.
landmark: red/black/white Cyrillic sign, tan shade structure

name: The Refuge
description: The Refuge is a place for weary travelers to refresh and recharge. We are a camp that serves food & drink from around the world and comforts all those that seek respite. Our campers come from every culture, ethnicity, sexual orientation and background. We bring to the playa acceptance, love, and a cold beverage on a hot day.
landmark: 8 foot tall flame-like structure, The Refuge sign

name: DeKomodo Dragons
description: You guessed it! The DeKomodo Dragons are all fired up about Decommodification. Hopefully, you took care of this principle before you arrived, but if not...we can help. We'll turn your 'U-Haul' into 'Ru-Paul', your 'Budget' into 'Fuck-it' or your 'Ryder' into 'Dyper'. Stop by our camp to get supplies to decommodify your truck, your body or your bike at our DIY Station! Make decommodification cool again!
landmark: 20' tall LED diamond in the sky

name: The Last Starfighters
description: Greetings, Starfighter. You have been recruited by the Star League to defend the playa against commodification & moop. Your participation in supporting artists by building a branch of The Solar Library & giving home to Solarians is to be commended. Your communal effort & civic responsibility will be known across the galaxy. You as a radically self reliant creature have always wanted to fight a desperate battle against incredibly dusty odds. The Trailing Soul & Augmented Reality Porta Potties are your legacy. Remember to listen next time a gung-ho iguana tells you to relax.
landmark: The Green Windmill

name: Sparky's Garage
description: Sparky's will fix everything even your broken ego.  We focus on generators and electrical, but we are tremendously creative in fixing all sorts of things.  If you're not broken, come by and play Croquet.
landmark: Big sign that say Sparky's Garage

name: Freeloader Pizza Kitchen
description: Coal fired pizza in deep playa. Look to be BLOWN AWAY with our pedal bike transportable pizza oven and art installation in serendipitous locations in deep playa over the week.
landmark: Freeloader Pizza Kitchen sign

name: Golden Gate Project
description: Best way to describe our camp address would be as if you were describing someone who has never been to San Francisco.  Look for the San Francisco Bridge.  Except at Burning Man our camp is best described by a 60 ft long, 26 ft tall replica of the San Francisco Golden Gate parked at our camp.    When the Golden Gate is not parked at camp, our camp main entrance driveway is marked on each side by 15 ft tall wooden, painted in international orange,  replicas of the Golden Gate bridge's metal towers
landmark: Entrance marked by 2, 15ft Golden Gate Towers

name: Back To Camp
description: Back To Camp is a summer camp oasis in the hot dust of Black Rock City. Come on down for daily movement classes, themed cocktail parties, and our signature arts 'n crafts postcard program. We serve food too! You'll know us by the kitschy camp decor and Playatech pine trees.
landmark: Pyramid shade structure and playatech pine trees

name: TACOCAT FOOD 4 THOUGHT
description: We provide Totally Awesome Caloric Objects Cheesy and Tasty daily  M-F, 2 PM until our 400 portions are gone.  Enjoy a daily variety of grilled cheese sandwiches, along with hydration and FUN games. Come, bring your curiosity, and nourish yourselves with "Food 4 Thought".
landmark: Lime Green and Orange tent, TACOCAT FOOD 4 THOUGHT

name: Narwhals
description:
Narwhal Lost Art Lounge is a place where you can find lost art. It could be art that you inherited or art you found at an estate sale or thrift store you will find it in our gallery. 

Come walk through the gallery and spend some time with the Narwhals!
landmark: 8 Foot light up Narwhal Sign

name: IGNITED STATES
description:
Ignited States is all about our states of mind, our states of being, our states of consciousness. It's about lighting up our worlds. It's about igniting and fanning the flames of our creativity. And sometimes, it's about igniting the fire in our bellies with a shot of fireball.

- Ignite your artful state by making a flag to illustrate the state you're in or immersing yourself in the lights and sounds of the Point of Interest
- Ignite your wakeful state with mimosas, coffee or espresso martinis while getting bad advice
- Ignite Your ready to party state at one of our popup dance parties or at Fireball Friday happy hour
- Ignite your State of Awe as you watch aerial performances
- Ignited your playful state with our ring toss game, Heads of State
landmark: 7' Man and the 24' tall aerial rig

name: Temple Guardians
description: The headquarters of the Temple Guardians, including the Guardian & Burn Perimeter training area, Temple Guardian help desk, and Temple Guardian leadership.
landmark: Large lit Temple Guardian sign on training area

name: Cuddle Oasis
description:
Too hot? Too Cold? Partied out? Need a break? Need a cuddle or two? or Ten? You have come to the right place!  Come relax under our many shade structures.  Enjoy morning Sound Baths and Yogas.     

Follow that large lighted Palm trees at night and come enjoy a drink at the bar and ask about our daily activities that vary each day.
landmark: 4 large Palm Trees, Dome, and Starshade

name: Time of your Life!
description: Camp Time of Your Life! and Braterpillar Art Bus is here for your playa transportation and assistance. Hailing from Costa Rica, Cabo, Canada, and West Coast USA.  We are a mixed tribe of Burners who embody Burning Man philosophy, connection, and transformation year round since 2000.
landmark: Braterpillar Bus

name: Hair of the Dog (HOTD)
description: HOTD is the oldest and longest running bar at Burning Man.  We hold a piece of the original fire.  HOTD gives raw performance and spontaneous acts, powered by you.  You bring the booze and the music, we bring the music and the booze.
landmark: Large orange HOTD sign

name: Reactor
description: Support camp for "Reactor" art
landmark: Nuclear "Reactor" symbol, high & light up

name: Irrelephant Bird Camp
description: Colorful eyebrows? CHECK! Dunking Contest? CHECK! Bad Movies? CHECK! Yacht rock? Jock rock? Not rock? Check, check, and check! Trying to get a handle on what we do here at Irrelephant Bird Camp? Don't even try it. Just come by and get a little silly with us, touch base with reality, or take a nap overseas.
landmark: Surf lounge with painted beach backdrop

name: Karmastan Airship
description: Karmastan Airship is a steampunk inspired bar camp that's new to the Playa this year. Our little crew of miscreants, scoundrels, and artists want to gift some fun and frivolity to the Playa in the form of themed bar night and a lounge for relaxing!
landmark: Large lit up sign "Karmastan Airship"

name: Camp CataLÜN
description: HELIOS camp - The art support camp for "HELIOS". An open playa, kinetic LED sculpture inspired by the mechanics of harmonic wave phenomena.
landmark: Large "HELIOS CAMP" sign, Many felted pendants

name: [The Camp With No Name]
description: An international camp hosting DJs, daily theme parties, a bar for the thirsty, cozy lounging, bar games and flogging/kink dungeon. Specializing in dubious advice and questionable antics.
landmark: The sign saying "Bar With No Name" and flamingos

name: Abraxas Camp
description: Home of the Abraxas Dragon Art Car
landmark: Abraxas Banner on a bamboo pole and a big dragon

name: Swagatron ~Gaia Weeps Art Support
description: Come to Swagatron to get whatever your wearing turned to a one of a kind piece for Burning Man swag. We print on whatever your heart desires as long as it can its flat and withstands 333 degrees of heat.
