description: Bay Area Food Camp serving hot quesadillas and cold beer & lemonade.   Get your ass stamped too!
landmark: Guerrilla Cheese Camp & ASS BRANDING signs

name: Rooftop Frose
description: Rooftop Frose for a view at sunset with a cool refreshing drink for relaxed burners
landmark: Rooftop Frose sign at top of scaffold

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on the playa, with all the trimmings! Department of Wedding Planning is in our camp, consult with the experts.
landmark: Dome with flowers and flashing red beacon at night

name: Rumpus
description: Morning cartoons, fun and games, non-electronic beats, and a chill bar.
landmark: purple flags and blue and tan shade.

name: Bubble Camp
description: Bubbles, bubbles everywhere and drops to drink for all. Dispensing thai iced tea and cold pressed coffee for all you parched playa peeps.
landmark: Big Pink Bubble Dome

name: Congee Central
landmark: Hot pink/white Congee Central Sign

name: Rubber Armstrong
description: For everything bad, Mezcal, for everything that is good as well, and if it still does not help, one and a half liters. We are a diverse solar powered camp made up of members from all over the world all sharing a love of Mezcal. Come join us for a delicious sunset Margie.
landmark: Large bedouin tent with two 15' domes either side.

name: CAMPWWIT
description: CAMPWWIT is place to ask yourself the question, "Wait, What's In This?" We explore the playa experience through snarky reflection, encouraging internal monologue and external dialogue through games, drinks, and music. With everything going on during the burn, we hope you can reflect on what's going on inside you with others to help bring these playa lessons out into the default world!
landmark: Giant lit up Miniwheat, Mansonian timeline

name: ESD Station 3:00
description: ESD Station 3 is the home of Black Rock Fire and Rescue. ESD Volunteers from far and wide have been camping at station 3 for nearly 25 years! Bringing their collective skills and experience to help our community in time of need.
landmark: The red neon Heart at 3 & C

name: Barbie Day Spa
description: Get pampered at Barbie Day Spa: Fingernail painting, foot soaks, foot massage, body wash, erotic massage, cold drinks.
landmark: Barbie Day Spa Flags - "NAIL SPA"

name: Mysfits 2024
description:
The Mysfits
This is our 20th Year Anniversary as a Theme Camp.
Please come use our Narwhal Stage as Public Stage to perform on!
We have staff to help you.  We have a pristine JBL sound system for your use.  We will have a midday and night schedule.  Please reach out and reserve a spot on our Narwhal Stage.
We have a amazing Public Area with a blazing fire at night for your comfort.
landmark: Pepe Ozans Narwhal - a 40' boat/Narwhal

name: 17 Virgins
description: 17 Virgins invites you to the transdimensional portal. Come explore our 250' long tunnel to another universe! Who knows you may find a hidden doorway to the party of your dreams.
landmark: Neon Owl, 250ft long tunnel

name: Tierra Bomba
description:
Tierra Bomba brings a Latin American flair with a kick to the playa, infusing it with spicy flavors that transport you to a vibrant oasis. Our camp embodies the spirit of Latin hospitality, aiming to foster connections and create magical moments for all who gather under our roof. With open hearts and arms wide open, Bombito's mission is to share our unique blend of Latin culture with the Burning Man community, embracing everyone with the mantra: "Mi casa es tu casa."

Fueled by the energy of Latinos, heavily influenced by Colombian roots, Tierra Bomba is a camp that embraces diversity with open arms. We welcome people from all corners of the globe, including Mexico, Argentina, Italy, France, Turkey, Ghana, Pakistan, and beyond, creating a melting pot of cultures and experiences.
landmark: Palm tree flag,Military tent & net shade structure

name: T.B.C.
landmark: basketball court, shady truss structure

name: Helioz
description: At Helioz, we worship the Sun god. To honor our god, we roast delicious animals and share them with all guests. Come by in the late afternoon and evening for some tasty treats, and drink a sun-god libation.
landmark: 15ft scaffolding tower and/or Glowing sun entrance

name: Rears! Bar and Hill
description: Prepare yourself for an extraordinary adventure at the residence of Hippie Hill Mutant Vehicle and 'Rears!' themed bar. Come and join Norm and the rest of the crew to make unforgettable memories that will last a lifetime... or at least a few hours.
landmark: 3ft Wooden "Rears!' Bar Sign

name: The Playpen
description: Play with Me!  Get to know your partner and build a deeper connection thru play and interaction.
landmark: "PLAYPEN" sign along the street.

name: Geckos
description:
The Gecko camp has been a BRC landmark since 2007 and we are ready to rock the playa again this year! Our main bar lights up with an interactive Simon Says Games starting night fall. Our dance floor and lounge focus on deep house disco music. Our resident DJs (DJM, Galexy, GoSouth, Samcake, DJ Loustaoun) will be rocking the Gecko's Camp this year again, every night starting at 7pm. DJ-M has been playing music for Black Rock City for over 17 years now!. 

Oh, and don't forget: on Thursday noon, we host our Playa-renowned ABCD PARTY: bring your Ass, eat some Bacon (and pizza), drink some Champagne and dance to Disco!
landmark: Gecko purple flag

name: Creamee Coffee
description: We blend the invigorating spirit of Burning Man with the universal love for coffee. Each day, we serve up an eclectic mix of fun, innovative coffee creations that awaken the senses and fuel the soul. From espresso-infused adventures to creamy concoctions that defy the ordinary, our camp is a haven for coffee enthusiasts and curious souls alike. Join us for a cup of joy, connection, and creativity as we celebrate the magic of Burning Man one sip at a time.
landmark: 20 foot led light stick with a coffee cup on top

name: Shimmering Oasis Altar
landmark: circular array of prisms, lit at night

name: Sepia Lux Homebase
description: Come find the Cuttlefish back at it's lair and say hi!
landmark: Big Glowing Cuttlefish

name: ESD Station 9:00
description: ESD Station 9 is the home of ESD volunteers from all over north America who bring their passion and skills to BRC. The camp supports all the branched of ESD!
landmark: We are right behind ESD medical at 9 & C

name: Black Rock City Municipal Court
description: Join us for Court! Whether you're looking for legal information, know your rights trainings, or to simply grab a drink and talk to a tired attorney stop on by!
landmark: 4 large Roman columns and BRC Municipal Courthouse

name: OPERA
landmark: twinkling OPERA sign

name: Dusty Bunnies
description:
Come visit Dusty Bunny Boutique and treat your awesome self to a fine outfit! We have complete costumes and accessories for every occasion  to allow you to create your perfect Playa look: 
Don't know what to put on Monday? We will dress you up!
Need a tutu for you Tuesday? We have it!
Looking for something white for your Wednesday? Come on in!
Just need something clean to wear on Thursday? Stop by and check out the practical leftovers.
landmark: Large Dusty Bunny sign and Rabbit Head sculpture.

name: KAZE
description: Camp Kaze the home base for the Kaze project, a memorial to the victims of the Hiroshima Nuclear Blast. We are dedicated to openness, hospitality, and conviviality. Creative human connections and the belief "There are no strangers. There are no enemies" are our bywords.
landmark: low wood fence,and torii gate with Camp Kaze sign

name: Salty Jacks
description: Camp Salty Jacks: Day and night we are the local deep dive bar of the 9:00 neighborhood. Nautical, underwater themed, we are your safe haven from the fervor of the playa playing Hip Hop, R&B, Soul, Blues, Electro-swing, and Disco.
landmark: Lighthouse and giant SALTY sign

name: Portal Oasis
landmark: not sure yet

name: Elvis Wedding Chapel & Gardens
description: "Happily ever after" begins here! Now in our twelfth year of hosting ersatz Playa weddings for Black Rock City's nuptially needy, EWC welcomes individuals, couples, trios and all other configurations without regard to race, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, species or any other limiting factor! First, our Fashion Director and her team of trained experts will outfit the Bride, Groom and Attendants in dazzling Playa finery, on loan from our legendary Bridezilla Lounge. Then, our most excellent Clergyperson officiates over an endless variety of custom-tailored ceremonies, each climaxed by the dramatic revelation of the spirit of Lord Elvis himself—as embodied by the amazing, life-size, audio-anatomically accurate ELBOT 2000: Black Rock City's most venerable robotic resident!
landmark: Bell tower w/ Elvis on it; listen for wind chimes!

name: Terrapin Station
description: Stop by and slow down at Terrapin Station! The Galactic Terrapin welcomes all!
landmark: Driveway lined in lights and "Terrapin Station"

name: Captain Pump's Raiders
description: Captain Pump's Raiders is Black Rock City's finest giant-robot driving mercenary company, and we roll a mean D20. Come visit us for RaiderCon IX, the Playa's premier (and possibly only) roleplaying-game convention!  Don't miss our Starcraft and Magic tournaments.
landmark: Captain Pump's Raiders sign, 10' flat top shade.

name: Polegasm
landmark: Polegasm Flag -- Skull & thigh-high boots

name: TEREMOK
description: Welcome to "TEREMOK," a Burning Man camp where the surreal world of mushrooms meets the vibrant spirit of the playa. Our camp features giant mushroom structures, a central gathering area called the Mushroom Grove, and a dance floor known as the Spore Dance Temple. Join us for workshops, delicious mushroom-inspired treats, and surreal DJ sets under bioluminescent mushrooms. Come immerse yourself in the magic of TEREMOK!
landmark: Giant inflatable LED mushroom structures

name: CASA
description: WE ARE YOUR HOME AWAY FROM HOME, A REFUGE FOR ALL WITCHY BEINGS. IN OUR CASA, A SOUL FAMILY OF ARTIST, MYSTICS, TEACHERS AND DREAMERS AWAKEN TO TRANSFORMATION. AS GUARDIANS OF THE EARTH OUR DEVOTION IS FOR A GREENER, SWEETER, EVOLVING PLAYA. ITS HAPPENING!
landmark: CANOPY INSTALLATION MADE OF HANGING FABRIC SHEET

name: Coyote Garden
description:
Coyote Garden is BRC's all-ages, all-hours neighborhood coyote park built around a kinetic art installation that brings together dozens of UV-reactive coyote art pieces to celebrate the native song dog of the Americas (and BRC itself). It's tended by an eclectic group of coyote-adjacent artists to increase coyote consciousness by showing these canines in different lights.﻿

Coyote Garden exists outside of known time and space. It appears out of the ether on very special occasions when the colorful progenitor coyotes are summoned to this realm by the secret rituals and dark science of the mysterious Coyote Gardeners. The interdimensional coyotes are especially active from dusk till dawn, when the garden fully transforms and reveals its truest form. Sometimes pancakes and coffee appear too.
landmark: Giant glowing coyote towers & UV-reactive coyotes

name: The Institute
description: The Institute of higher yearning invites the dusty wanderer to expand their mind into the bottomless pit of knowledge and exploration.
landmark: INSTITUTE sign between two geodesic domes

name: Nocino's
description: Nocino's is the Tokyo Sector's Local Pizza Tavern in the 9 O'Clock neighborhood. That cozy social place where people come to hang after a long day of [redacted] and [censored] to connect with beer, pizza, and good music.
landmark: Pink and yellow flags on top of a 16' parachute

name: Enchanté
description: Welcome to Enchanté! Where we drop bangers and know how to keep the party going all night long. Swing by for one of our sunset parties and get the best dusty cock(tail) on the Playa and dance your face off!
landmark: lasercut crystals, scaffoldings, city street sign

name: Lusty Chanterelle Kombucha Bar
description: The Lusty Chanterelle Kombucha bar is a place to rest, unwind, and drop in with good conversation and a cold non-alcoholic beverage with your fellow burners. Come with an empty cup and we will fill you up and help you feel at home with the most quaffable drink on playa.
landmark: Mushroom Cap Shade Structure and Fungi Art Forest

name: Covered-in-Bees!!!
description:
Covered-in-Bees!!! hosts events, workshops, art, and a bar inside our 38-foot dome. We have scheduled activities nearly every day in our dome, including:
– Board games!
– Juggling and object manipulation workshops
– Sunrise Megaphone sing-along and Pineapple Sacrifice
At night, our dome becomes a bar with a barside experience focused on personal storytelling. Some nights also feature musical activities like karaoke and the Waggle Dance Party. Check out our themed bar nights like On the Dusty Sea and Sexy Pollination.
Also, come visit our Minimum Viable Pyramid across the Esplanade from our dome – an irresistible opportunity for cross-Esplanade megaphone duels.
landmark: 40ft dome, 30ft pyramid, 8'x4' sign with a Bee

name: Om Skillet
description: Om Skillet - serving the playa Gourmet Grilled Cheese  lunches Monday through Thursday and hosting the Short Stack TuTu Tuesday dance party at 2:22pm on Tuesday since 2011.
landmark: pastel 30' dome, restaurant, and grass dance floor

name: !Knot! A Bondage Camp!
description: We're an adult-themed camp with members hailing from up and down the West coast of the U.S.  Come by for instruction in bondage safety techniques (including negotiation and consent).  We might treat you to an ice water flogging, let you play on our dungeon furniture, or invite you to climb one of our raised platforms for the view.  We're also offering suspension bondage rides and Tarot card readings.  Because at !Knot! A Bondage Camp!...your future hangs in the balance, and is never all for naught.
landmark: 2 tall white view platforms with rotating benches

name: Disfunktion
description:
Come join in with our wobbly world of Weebles , Music, Fire and Mayhem
Enjoy crepes Tuesday and Thursday mornings.
Evenings for eclectic music , slushy's, fiery chill areas
landmark: 2 x pyramid steel stands + propane burning dish

name: Destindipity
description: Destindipity is a place where what is meant to be, and what happens to be, reveal themselves as a gateway into what couldn't have been imagined. On the surface we are a tea camp, a clean airy oasis designed for comfort and connection. What draws people in isn't a carnival barker or a giant sound system. Instead, it's the unmistakable emotional appeal of genuine human warmth. Our camp is home to many experienced burners well schooled in the arts of quip and camp, but our offering to the city goes beyond the superficial. Ours is a camp for you to be seen and heard so the magic that moves us can flow, and the structures that bind and blind us can melt away. Let your truest self be freed to connect with others and be blown this way or that, all over a cup of tea.
landmark: Red teahouse tent and giant teacups, lit at night

name: No Drama Camp
description: We are all inclusive Camp that provides the Citizens of Black Rock City with a fun and interesting place to stop by for a Drink at our No Drama Bar.  We host many daily events under our large shade structure. Nightly DJ's play music for those stopping by on their way around the Playa.  Enjoy our fun oversized Bar Games, while you sip some of the best drinks to be found.  There is always something happening that you don't want to miss at No Drama Camp and Bar.
landmark: 20ft Black and White No Drama Bar sign

name: Trailer Trash
description: Your Friendly Neighborhood coffeeshop,  serving the playa's Most Adequate coffee each and every morning,  snacks & shade included -  usually, and providing a place to chill in evening.  Bonus: our camp is home to Overchill, a marvel of evaporative cooling tech - ask for a tour.
landmark: 9x'3' backlit sign "Trailer Trash" + a 17'dome

name: Under the Bridge Collective
description: Welcome to Under the Bridge Collective!  United by the camps combined, and separate experiences partying under bridges, prepare to embody troll-ness! Mischievous opportunities await, alongside dj sets, the Potion Parlour, and Troll Treasures.  Have you ever 'Bitten a dangler' before?  Do you want to? ;)
landmark: The Troll Bridge

name: HomeSlice
description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"—Playa-style. Participate in our Experimental Grilled Cheese Theatre, climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower's inverted pyramids, or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics.
landmark: 30' hourglass-shaped wooden climbing tower

name: Smile High HQ
description:
Come play with us - in our Mutant Vehicle and at our camp we will transport you to enlightenment and enjoyment
Our cause -Mental Health-
landmark: Large  LED Smile Face

name: Weird Steel
description: Welcome to Reared In Steel, a dynamic Burningman camp where steel artistry takes center stage. We are a collective of passionate artists and creators dedicated to pushing the boundaries of creativity through the medium of steel and steel-framed art installations. From Rhino Redemption, Medusa, and The Flower Tower, just to name a few. Our camp is a celebration of innovation, imagination, and the transformative power of art.
landmark: Large raised platformed stage called "Brass Ring"

name: Playa Glass
description: Would you like to make jewelry from the playa dust? Grab a pair of welding goggles and harness the energy of the sun to melt the playa into glass. We provide the instructions, tools, and supplies, you cast your artistic aspirations into glass.
landmark: White high top tent and  large' Playa Glass' sign

name: Jolt
description:
Jolt! Come to get recharged! If your bike is sick, we'll fix it for ya!
If you're low on energy, try our refreshing icy slushies while relaxing in our cozy lounge.
landmark: Bicycle LED sign

name: Serenity Now
description: An oasis in a world of dust. Serenity Now is a long standing coffee house and performance space, with cold brew coffee service, featuring art and music.
landmark: Tall aluminet dome with triangular door

name: Kumaya
description: Come cozy up in our 24/7 Library Lounge, filled with pillows, blankets, books and art. Write in, doodle on, or read any number of the journals we put up dangling from the sky, filled with the stories, art and reflections from this year's and previous burns. Sip tea with us at the sunrise in Deep Playa, lounge with us and fellow travelers and take part in our sound bath ceremony. We hope to get the chance to share the special gift and experience of Burning Man soon < 3
landmark: Large white dome and a big sign that says "Kumaya"

name: WHOMP WAGON
description: The Whomp Wagon Art Car
landmark: The Whomp Wagon Art Car or Whomp Wagon Camp sign.

name: Camp Estonia
description: Camp Estonia - small and cosy oasis to connect with elves themselves.
landmark: Aluminium shade retangular.

name: Disco Space Shuttle
description: Home of the Disco Space Shuttle art car and camp. Board with us at ~10pm and take a ride around the Universe and Beyond until ~3am or whenever we run out of gas.
landmark: tail fin of the Disco Space Shuttle

name: My Favorite Things
description: At My Favorite Things, we're all about creating unforgettable experiences and fostering community spirit through an array of interactive activities and experiences that we love. As you explore our camp, you'll discover a plethora of exciting offerings designed to keep you cool, entertained, and connected: a cacao ceremony to connect with the spirit of ancestors,  an aerial arts workshop, playa dust sculptures, and the best Polish pickles you have ever tasted. Join us as we celebrate creativity, connection, and the magic of Burning Man!
landmark: Reclaimed lumber gates with the name at the top

name: Wild Child
description:
Run away to our circus community, hosted by world class artists, where every day is filled with workshops designed to ignite your passion for performance.

Dive into the world of partner acrobatics, master the art of flow props, explore the freedom of parkour, and unleash your creativity with tricking sessions. 

Whether you're a seasoned performer or curious beginner our inclusive community welcomes all skill levels.

Join us for an unforgettable circus adventure.
landmark: circus space with the Wild Child banner

name: Black Rock Observatory Theme Camp
description: Black Rock Observatory is a mobile astronomical observatory dedicated to showing people just how amazing the universe is. Started at Burning Man in 2014, we have expanded beyond the borders of Black Rock City to educational institutions and events all along the West Coast.
landmark: Black Rock Obs sign, telescopes, space tapestries

name: Rock 'n' Snow
description: a camp for climbers, skiers and hikers, we love outdoors!
landmark: Rock 'n' Snow sign

name: 3rd Alternative: Jail of Hedone
description: A large Old Western wooden-fronted enclosed space with air conditioning & cooling misters. This JAIL evokes Hedone, the Goddess of Sensual Pleasure and so, is stocked with cots, giant pillows and couches; snacks, water, cold beer & drinks (including our signature Absinthe-Whiskey craft cocktail) along with a stripper pole, whips & ticklers, great music, the occasional foot bath, along with sporty fun on the side, such as the Soccer Goalie of Death, Topless Soccer, BM Foosball and more! Come be judged and whipped and relax in A/C, and kick a few balls around!
landmark: large sign "JAIL OF HEDONE * THIRD ALTERNATIVE"

name: Hammered and Sickled
description: Hammered and Sickled is an international camp compromised of members from 30 plus countries of origins. We run a flavored Vodka bar as well as other libations and our mantra is "No one leaves our bar thirsty or walking in a straight line". We offer the weary desert travelers an oasis where they can take a break, relax and kick their shoes off. Our campers come from different corners of the world, backgrounds and offer a variety of insights and opinions to liven up any conversation. We have our in house DJ's spinning lounge and mashups through out the day.
landmark: 30+ Country flags above our lounge structure

name: PlovKraft
description: We cook delicioud PLOV and serve it daily!
landmark: Big PLOVKRAFT Sign

name: Silver City
description: While cooling down fellow burners with delicious soft serve ice cream, Silver City will be supplying the beats that will have peoples feet stomping and body swaying.
landmark: Large rocking horses 8ft squid Silver city sign

name: Camp Be Bothered
description: We can't be bothered to fill this out.
landmark: 18' tall Shruggie illuminated sign

name: TRM Art Camp
description: A place for all creative people to gather and share good and bad experiences while working towards being an artist! This is our first time displaying art on the Playa and invite all to give us feedback and info to help us improve and grow in the future!!
landmark: Look for the TRM banner

name: Mad Tea(se) Party
description: Mad Tea(se) Party is a circusy, satirical and sexy(?) cafe focused on providing the public with interactive day parties and cabaret shows. Since 2019, Mad Tea(se) has hosted cat-theme competitions, circusy wonderland performances, and decompression events under its iconic, red striped circus tent.
landmark: Big striped circus tent next to Awkward & Tawdry

name: Nose Fish
description:
Come get coffee from the Nose Fish itself (or this year maybe something even curiouser!) Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday mornings and stay for the music! Also, back by popular demand, we're giving away panties!

Bike repair clinics are happening Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, and Friday afternoons, as well as personal lighting repair/tutoring, and darning your dazzling duds with our resident seamster/seamstress at our super sewing service!
landmark: NOSE FISH sign, LED lights on curb, snow fence

name: PolyParadise
description: PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from '2:00 - 10:00' since 1999 celebrating 26 years in BRC in 2024. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. We welcome ALL Poly & Poly Friendly folks to camp within our borders. PolyParadise 2024 welcomes the Twisted Swan | Temple of Bacchus as part of your Playa Experience. PolyParadise is NOT a Swinger Camp. Being Poly or Practicing Poly is NOT a requirement for camping with us, but being OPEN MINDED about other people's lifestyle choices IS!!
landmark: 10' Black Metal Man with Red Heart/Infinity Symbol

name: Burn Pops/ anglerfish
landmark: Burnpops bar

name: Kamp Kaos
description: Celebrating all that is chaotic! KAOS campers hail from across the US. We celebrate art in all forms, as well as its creators.
landmark: Black, purple, and white panels of the maze

name: Camp Cosmo
description: Welcome to Camp Cosmo! We are a tribe of global citizens who come together to create a Cosmopolitan playground. We have karaoke on Tuesday and Thursday from 2-4pm .On Monday Wednesday Friday from 2-4pm we host "Bring Your Cup We Have The Hat- English High Tea", pastries are served and polaroid photos are taken to capture your moment! You won't find anything else like our "Eastern well-blended into Western" vibe on the playa, so come and join us!
landmark: COSMO logo on the curb

name: Mad Hatter's Mirage
description: Trip the light fantastic over to Mad Hatter's Mirage where you and your friends can try your hands at our Escape from Wonderland escape room, craft a new hat, smoke some hookah with the Caterpillar, and enjoy a variety of non-alcoholic cold beverages.
landmark: Big dome with a large Mad Hatter's Mirage sign

name: GYST - Get Your Shit Together
description:
Because we definitely don't have ours! 
Come get tips for hacking your burn while sipping at our bar.
Forgot your tutu? We got you!
Rest in the lounge, cheer, and race in the Caucus Races!
Want a banana? Well, yes, we have no bananas, but we've got a banana party for you!
Or maybe Stevie in Wonderland is more your style?
Whatever your fancy, GYST has it and then some!
landmark: Two 6' tall neon blacklight GYST pyramid signs

name: Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring libelous libations and scornful judgment by our panel of experts. Commiserate with the best as we help keep your shame in perspective.
landmark: Pink Oh No You Didn't sign which is lit up at nite

name: Snuggle Shuttle
description: We are an art car/mutant vehicle support camp at Burning Man. While we're not a theme camp, we provide essential space to work on our vehicle upon arrival at the playa. We also offer a chill-out area where anyone can escape the sun and relax during peak hours of the day. Come join us and unwind!
landmark: Big tent cover in flowers

name: Dust Slug Den
description: The Dust Slug Den is a support camp for the Dust Slug mutant vehicle.
landmark: Large lit up sign that reads "Dust Slug Den"

name: Stone Soup
description: We are open 24 hours a day, buffet style! Our Infinite Buffet Table magically produces an abundance of cold aguas frescas, hot and cold teas, and healthful snacks. Visit us from 5:00 PM to 7:00 PM daily for a full meal. Try your hand by making your own bowl, spoon, or cup at our plastics-upcycling table—and then bring 'em to the buffet table and use them for your own meal! Relax in our dining/socialization area.
landmark: RV whip pole with streamer

name: Happy Kaos!
description: This year HaPpy kAoS presents S.S. HaPpy kAoS! A deep sea spin on our technicolor kaos. So come on down to the wharf and board our ship for some deep sea hydration, cuddles in the mermaid cove, and if you're lucky you'll be mystified by the magic at the bottom of the abyss! Walk the plank of destiny, it's you're only way out.
landmark: Disco Ball and Black Light Flags

name: Chill Vibez
description: The dome beckons!  We offer a chill space to vibe and hang in our LED powered dome.  We will have music and synchronized LEDs nightly.
landmark: large white covered dome

name: Satellite of Love
description: A shady oasis in a sea of mutants...and their mutant vehicles. Stop by, relax and enjoy our downtempo beats while sipping one of our world renowned Pineapple Upside Down Drinks. Bring your own pineapple and we'll make you something truly special.
landmark: shiny gold 18 wheel semi truck with trailer.

name: Contraptionists
description:
Join us, 1 to 3 PM,  for our afternoon Fire and Ice parties with Snowcones and FireFries.
Over heated kids can ask if we have ice anytime to cool off their little Brains. (Any age in destress will be helped.)
Check the schedule for Yoga classes, or having your reading done.
or just come cool off in the shade and watch the world go by.
landmark: 40 foot tower, white, w/ ball at top. white tents.

name: The Espresso Martini Organization
description: Whether you are tired and in need of energy, or simply heading out on the playa and in need of a drink, stop by our camp for an espresso martini (or simply an ice cold coffee or non-alcoholic beverage)!  Meet and chat with fellow burners while you sit in our shade, lay down in our hammock, or rest in our cuddle puddle.  A trampoline and dancing pole are there for the adventurous!
landmark: Yin/Yang signs, trampoline, dance pole. Lights

name: Bad Education
description: Our multicultural miseducators are committed to providing love, creativity, nourishment and a complete uneducation to all the beautiful students and members of the BRC community. We will be providing a Breaducation of the yummiest, most carbohydrate-y kind. From Monday to Friday 10am to 2pm, we will be serving warm, fresh baked bread with a variety of delicious/nutritious spreads, ensuring that all students start their school day off right. All are welcome & invited to our UnProm and Homecoming Dance on Sunday and Wednesday evenings, The punch will be spiked and the music fun and flowy, ask your crush to dance or makeout behind the bleachers, we won't tell the PTA. This is your official hall pass to let us shower you with miseducation, love, music and carbs so c'mon by!
landmark: 40x40 structure of red and tan shade sails

name: Death Guild Thunderdome
description: Join us for our nightly exhibition of good-natured tussles. Remember, if you don't participate, there is no show. Bring your own partner. When the sign is lit, we're open. Usually around 9 PM.
landmark: the dome and the scaffolding.

name: Illumination Village
description:
Illumination Village is an eclectic gathering of camps, held together by history and shared resources. We have our own process of placement within the village, much like the microcosm of Burning Man, showcasing our most talented artists in the front, and then placing others around our edges of our camp, and within the village in our Town Square and internal roads. 

Each year it's a new experiment in radical collaboration to create a cohesive feel for the village, across our many diverse camps. We love the multifaceted variety of environments and believe that it makes Illumination Village a unique and delightful place to visit. 

Come take a steam during the day and make sure to visit our Fire Art Carnival in the evening. Our Fire pit will be lit up late into the night. 

All are welcome!
landmark: 20 foot Illville sign and the Fire Carnival

name: Red Rooster Ranch
description: The Red Rooster Ranch art car celebrates the fun and frivolity of Nevada's tawdry past and present association with saloons and cat houses. Come join us for a ride and enjoy a libation in our tiny saloon!
landmark: Little red Saloon or the Red Rooster Ranch art car

name: ZAPHOD
description:
Zaphod acquired a derelict spacecraft at auction. In it we found a bunch of strange green elixir and a computer displaying orders to rescue colonists on BRC2024 and something about bringing home a specimen.  

The Zaphod StarCastle pours absinthe snowcones and all-ages beverages periodically throughout the day, and absinthe at sunset. Come visit beforehand and learn about the organic herbs and processes we use, then celebrate the green hour up on the viewing deck!   

Catch a ride on Xeno the Playamorph: a menacing new  playamechanoid/Red Baron mutant vehicle. Because, Zaphod.
landmark: Triangle viewing structure or giant alien MV

name: End of the Line
description: We welcome Dusty Burners wherever they are on their hazy paths through the city and transformation. Old West inspired shenanigans to keep you amused, bemused and maybe a little bruised (consensually). Or just stop for a drink, games or a whine about how much Burning Man sucks, except when compared with the Real World.
landmark: Wild West Saloon with 'End of the Line' sign

name: Snack Shack
description: Home of The World Famous Black Rock City Hotdog Eating Contest. Floggin' and Doggin' since 2022
landmark: Snack Shack sign

name: Dusty Beavers
description: We are the Dusty Beavers. We are a camp at Burning Man. We are from Québec, Canada, France, and the US. We bring love, joy and maple goodies to Burning Man!
landmark: Winter SnowMan

name: White Elephant Exchange
description: The White Elephant Exchange is a waypoint for roving pachyderms from all eras, generations, and originations to gather. We are brought together by our love of our substantial Funkadelephant and joy of celebrations and adventures. Come by to find the Funkadelephant and its growing family, or come find us roaming the wide open Playa.
landmark: Illuminated elephant-head sign and 'WEE' sign

name: fruitPOP
description: fruitPOP is a queer-centered Burning Man theme camp (est. 2019). With events ranging from ridiculous to titillating, we build a safe, judgment-free, consent-driven space throughout the burn. fruitPOP values creative expression and participation from our fruity members and on-playa guests.
landmark: Neon flags, fabrics, and décor with a neon sign.

name: Sandy Taco
description:
Sandy Taco; We are a gay camp, with deep shade and Taco events.  The events will be impromptu, so stop by during the week to inquire about when we might have our next Taco distribution.  

We have a cocktail bar and focus on adult themes during our hosting times.  Look forward to some giant jenga and naked twister as some of the fun during our seductive parties.
landmark: Dark Green Canvas With Purple Torches and Flags

name: Cameltopia
description: You Look Thirsty! Welcome to Cameltopia, your desert oasis and refuge from the sun's heat. You are welcome to pet the camels but please do not feed the animals. Recharge your soul and fill your vessel with premium unleaded H20 at our post-apocalyptic "Route 66" gas station. Our attendants will refuel your canteen while you browse our Inconvenience Store. Monday-Friday 11AM-5PM Playa Standard Time. Wednesday afternoon is our annual "Hump Day" party with an eclectic mix of tail-shaking beats!
landmark: gas station setup on the camp's frontage road

name: Legends of the Hidden Playa
description: We run an obstacle course/escape room that is loosely based off an old 90's game show and its recent reboot. With 13 separate rooms, each with their own puzzle, we will truly test your Burning Man preparedness! We have daily timed trials to earn a spot on our leader board and see if you can solve the Shrine of the Silver Monkey-Man!
landmark: 2 story scaffolding structure and a dome

name: Cult of the Magic Lady
description:
Come to our Cult, we have snacks!  The snacks are babies, but don't worry, they are alcoholic.  We also have a church, for your physical wellbeing and personal gains.  And we feed on your shame.  

We also have a library.
landmark: Cult of the Magic Lady sign

name: Hot Mess Camp
description: Day and night come to enjoy our gorgeous temple and impressive playa view. Don't forget your cups to be served delicious handcrafted cocktails at day and tea/coffee at night. Join our Meta talks and workshops at noon and flashiest parties at evening /night.
landmark: 3 story wooden temple and sign Hot Mess

name: Art Car Camp
description:
on Playa since 1994
a Place to gather and get your issues resolved  
To reunite with old friends and make new ones
Gandhi's Garage for mechanical issues
Barter Bob's Lost Camp Supplies for Gear
landmark: tan dome with Red rocket on top

name: Wonder Camp
description: The Department of Wonder is our on-playa bike shop. We offer bike repair service and education every day of the event through man-burn.  We will be offering work shops around fixing and maintaining bikes in playa specific conditions.
landmark: Lit orange & yellow striped "Dept of Wonder" sign

name: Yummy RUMInations
description: Come taste anything real or imagined at the Yum Cart! Playfully-mindful camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness. Daily experiments in vulnerability, intimacy, self-discovery, and storytelling.
landmark: The Rainbow Colored Yum Sign!

name: Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon
description: The Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon Is a Honky Tonk that is half John Ford, half Frederico Fellini. We play great music, engage in shenanigans, and pour the best cider this side of Old Razorback
landmark: Illuminated red " Flaming Ugly Cowboy Saloon" sign

name: Shake, Shake, Shake
description: Swing by SHAKE, SHAKE, SHAKE to shake your tail feather as you enjoy an ice-cold, hand-shaken cocktails on a hot playa day. Voted "the best damn cocktail bar on the Playa" by our friends and regulars!
landmark: Neon sign depicting a hand shaking a cocktail

name: Nightcrawlers
description: HEROES WANTED for hazardous journey, constant danger, honor, and rewards, if you happen to succeed! Come to the Nightcrawlers camp to jump into this year's PlayaRPG, a week-long playa-wide adventure! Choose your class, receive your first quest, and share a drink with your fellow adventurers. It's up to you to save the day! The game continues throughout the entirety of the burn, so don't worry if you miss the kickoff party Monday night, you can still join by visiting the camp! Daily gaming hours Tues-Sat from 11:00-2:30pm, or whenever you see the "Heroes Wanted" sign out front. Be the hero you were meant to be!
landmark: Heroes wanted sign or large Nightcrawlers banner

name: Powder Palace
description: We are proud Northerners bringing a winter chill to the playa and looking forward to sharing some of our winter delights.  Come by for snowshoe races and our apres-ski dance party!
landmark: Large wooden snowshoes and telemark skis!

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia since 2011 where merrymaking, mermaid lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground. Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren's call!
landmark: large pirate ship and trampoline in frontage

name: Shrubble 'n' Glymbrr
description: Shrubble 'n' Glymbrr, a black and white world one moment transforms into color splashing and mark making movements with cozy flickering corners. Our human steamroller printmaking event dances with carved wood which gets smooshed into making images for you to take home. Be apart of the process and enjoy some refreshing Shrubble!
landmark: A printed jungle of black, white and technicolor

name: Little Pink Chapel
landmark: 2 Pink Tents Back to Back

name: M.E.L.T
description: M.E.L.T.- Multiple Environments, Lounges and Terrariums-Our domes are a great place to hang out, meet people and relax if you just can't dance anymore or want to make new friends. You can rest and reflect in the Fairy Bower full of flowers, vines and the gentle tinkle of a waterfall, or get out of this world for a cosmic chill in the lively performance space of the Wormhole. Our domes are hosted, welcoming inclusive spaces to connect and inspire.
landmark: 2 large white domes with trees outfront

name: Sonic Soul Tribe
description: Our Soul is Sonic..An elemental camp, Sound is our passion - our reason for being...Yet we move in threes - We celebrate the frequency of life an all that is..through music, dance and art. Radically inclusive, we seek to create a magical space for each one of us to connect, plug in and find our way. We deliver the best in world class organic and electronic music, the most amazing sound system on the playa, and art to open your minds and evoke the spirit of imagination and love. We bring you an interactive visual delight of art, lasers, video and lighting, dancers, fire performers and other surprises.
landmark: Circle of light and lasers extending to the sky

name: Vomiting Sparrows
description: We are the Vomiting Sparrows! We serve the best Bloody Mary on the playa. We entertain, we make friends, we make fun, we welcome all. Keep an eye and ear open for our special events. Chirp Chirp Blarf!
landmark: Vomiting Sparrows lettered sign on scaffolding

name: Get Toasted
description: Step into a world where childhood memories meet adult indulgence at "Get Toasted"! Immerse yourself in the comforting aroma of warm, buttery (vegan) cinnamon toast that will transport you back to carefree days. For those seeking a bit of spice, savor our tantalizing cinnamon whisky that adds a grown-up twist to the classic treat. As the sun sets, join us for electrifying DJ sets from 9 pm to midnight, creating the perfect ambiance for unforgettable nights under the desert sky. Get ready to ignite your senses and toast to new adventures at Get Toasted!
landmark: Large chrome toaster and get toasted sign!

name: Astro Cats
description: We invite all burners to chill at the Flying Saucer Lounge with special cocktails during the day, and hot or cold sake or premium Tequila at the Dragon Lounge at night. You can enjoy acrobatic, fire dancing performance and workshops at scheduled times, and a place to practice and spin fire with us.  If you want to join our kitties for morning yoga or a afternoon tandem running race, bring your mat to stretch and pose with us You can chill on our chairs and watch people pass by while sipping our special drinks. You can learn to be a puppet master and perform at our Improv Puppet Theatre. You can challenge yourself to walk the plank, or play the game of Giant Jenga, or play poker at our game table while enjoying your sake. Yes, we also invite your for our theme dance parties!
landmark: Large Poster of a black cat riding on a rocket

name: The GASS Co.
description: Home of a bunch of busy bees working hard to pollinate and cultivate the playground budding in deep playa.
landmark: White billowy shade structure with white camo net.

name: Juicy Rootz
description: Juicy Rootz is offering Juicy Frootz (that you can wear!). Stop by and meet us— the playful, welcoming and heart-centered Juicies. We'll be offering two workshops/parties wherein you'll get to make a piece of wearable art out of dried and resonated citrus fruit to help commemorate your week on the playa forever. We'll also be standing by with refreshing non-alcoholic electrolyte drinks at our "Juice Bar." Come for the Froot, stay for the wiggles, connecting and joyful vibes.
landmark: bright yellow flag, and faux fruit tree entrance

name: House Of Skin
description: Welcome to "House of Skin." Come get your daily rub down of sunscreen or grab some sunscreen and ChapStick to go on your next adventure. We are a safe space for all and also have many fun things to distract you from your original goal. Come sleep on our trampoline, hang out the fire, participate in our tether ball tournament, get your BRC passport stamp, pick something out from our free store. I would to tell you more, but I am not going to. Come f*ck around and find out :)
landmark: Look for "House of Skin" signs.

name: Playa Paul's Concierge Service
description:
Discover Playa Paul's Concierge Service, where unparalleled support meets the spirit of Burning Man. Our camp redefines the playa experience with a suite of services, including daily gourmet coffee service, refreshing afternoon beverages, and personalized RV maintenance. Embrace the convenience of our on-site concierge including pump outs, water, and art tour bookings. Each evening, join our vibrant community gatherings for networking and relaxation. Our interactive art installations and dedicated spaces foster creativity and connection. At Playa Paul's, we ensure your journey is as fulfilling and comfortable as the memories you'll create. 
At Playa Pauls you are a VIPP!
landmark: Flashing lights at night and a velvet roped runway

name: Burthday
description: The most common birthdays are in August and September. Come born, reborn, and yet-to-be-born to celebrate your Burthday. Burning man and birthdays aren't mutually exclusive and you should be celebrated at both. Enter the Youterus and celebrate the day you entered this Curious world, with a party just for you, any and all yous welcome. But also for everyone else.
landmark: Tented structure with pink tunnel entrance

name: Spanky's Village (and Wine Bar)
description: The infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars. We take a tongue-in-cheek approach to wine, and a paddle-to-cheek approach to your butt ;)
landmark: 60 foot shade structure (day) searchlights (night)

name: Mirage Garage
description: Three generations, and that is not just a tequila, it is what we are. From New York, the Bay Area, L.A, Colorado, Mexico, New Zealand and beyond, we bring you the best cold brew coffee, clown and improv classes, two great parties (Tuesday afternoon and Thursday night), our beautiful Henry Chang art cars and more! Come by and try our aerials instruction or slings hung from our aerials truss. See our neighborhood from our viewing platform. Or just get out of the heat in our main tent, and get some water. Everyone welcome, and police should know that if you don't have an i.d., you will not get served either... we know who you are!
landmark: Big white wedding tent, aerials rig, and art cars.

name: Three of Cups
description: Come on down to get a tarot reading, learn to read tarot, and play tarot games.
landmark: Three of Cups sign and Tarot Dome

name: Hippocampus
description:
Hippocampus invites you to play with us at our Pucker Up lemonade stand and cafe that's packed with interactive workshops, dance and a healinghut to connect and take a break from the playa. Enjoy fresh squeezed lemonade in the shade! We serve it sexy and
helpful, icey and fresh.
landmark: Lemon trees and lemonade stand with seahorses

name: Slow Burn Lounge,aka Fandango Bar
description: 30 years ago people were dumb and came out to party. We are loud, rowdy, assholes with a heart of gold, punks, pervs, weirdos, punkish hippies, artists. Nothing has changed, and everything has changed. These are our people. We are our people. Welcome to Fandango.
landmark: FANDANGO signs

name: Intergalactic Sasquatch Village
description: The Intergalactic Sasquatch is returning for its 8th year on Playa, 10 years old- for the day trippers, the night walkers, the virgins to the vets, our funky lil cantina offers a place to escape the madness and go down the rabbit hole! Take a stroll through our fractal forest, guests are welcome to walk about the woods through fractal trees, but we warn you to tread carefully and keep an eye out for the very creatures that find their home in our camp! You might be asked to pay the "squatchtoll" in our interactive gameland and if visitors are 21&older, Squatch O'Hairs offers deliciously refreshing bevvys for in between rounds.
landmark: Wooden Sasquatch and Fractal Tree Forest

name: Firm Globe
description:
Firm Globe's revenue in 2024 is THROUGH THE ROOF, thanks in large part to the plentiful unpaid labor... *ahem*... I mean... "hard-working enthusiastic burners" that came to our office on the Playa in 2023 and took care of their TPS reports in a timely and compliant manner.

The shareholders are demanding we return to Black Rock City and do what humans were born to do - contribute to a profitable enterprise!

Sure you might not get paid, but think of all the career opportunities that will surely open up to you with a name like Firm Globe on your resume. As a matter of fact, you can't afford NOT to put in 40-60 hours of focused, productive effort here during your Burn!
landmark: office cubicles

name: Moondrive
description: Decorate your bike! - seat cushions upgrades, handle bar tassels, DIY license plates, and fun time with new friends under a cool mist
landmark: Our large lit up camp sign on frontage

name: Campus Callosum
description:
Hypothesis: Scientifically rigorous yet playful participation enhances your burn.

Intro: Campus Callosum invites you to experiment with our placebo bar, sci-art and brain-inspired activities. 

Specific Aims:

Aim 1) Are you drunk!? Our speakeasy The Double-Blind Pig serves placebo-controlled refreshments. While you sip, ask the local (inebriated?) scientists all your burning questions (results may vary)

Aim 2) Can we tickle your brain!? Play with our interactive neurotech, mind-stretching games, and discover the neuroscience of your favorite drugs!

Aim 3) Ready to blow your mind!? We're not just nerds, we're artists too! Study our scientifically inspired pieces co-created by neuroscientists and friends. 

In summary, WE WANT YOUR BRAINS to try our innovative approach to nerdy fun on the playa!
landmark: Large Bedouin Tent with red "LOBE" sign in front

name: Bureau of Misinformation
landmark: Large, glowing information I

name: Camp Peace of Ass
description: Camp POA (Peace of Ass) provides the "professional installation" of lusciously, unique, "Peace of Ass" bike seat covers, bringing "Peace to the Playa, One Bottom at a Time." We continue to service the lovely citizens of Black Rock City who make their way to our inviting camp.  We encourage our customers, with humor, to check out the Wall of Mirrors, and write on our annual poster. We also offer an "Ask the Expert" advice table as a "pop-up" activity.
landmark: The Wall of Traffic Mirrors and flags of fleece.

name: Automatic Subconscious
description: Automatic Subconscious is back again with our 31 foot, fully climbable non geodesic diagrid gherkin complete with netting at the top. Come by and relax in the netting or catch a beer that we launch from the sky.
landmark: Egg shaped dome on the Esplanade.

name: Valhalla on the Playa
description:
Friendliest Viking Bar you'll ever find! We offer a shady lounge, full bar, with silly and not-so-silly interactivity while you sip on a delicious cold drink. Come by for one of our specialty drink happy hours, featuring drinks such as fresh watermelon daiquiris, solar Margaritas, and Mead! 
Our music always meets the vibe and raises it up a notch! Come celebrate Black Rock City with us!
landmark: "Valhalla on the Playa" sign - on Lounge peak

name: Space Cats
description: Enjoy cool beverages, impeccably timed snacks, hearty camaraderie, and the best karaoke system on the playa (we checked) with your friends the Space Cats! Find us in camp or on the move with our mobile karaoke unit, spreading music and song through BRC. We do it for the love. You know you're curious…
landmark: Space Cats Sign (LED neon at night)

name: NYC Deli
description:
Please come to NYC Deli for authentic New York deli food and sassy service! We're serving bacon/egg/cheese sandwiches, bagels, coffee and tea 10:30am-12:30pm Friday through Sunday. Veggie, Vegan and GF options available! 
Service Note: Rangers, Medical, DPW, Law Enforcement, Parents with children and Differently-abled with mobility problems can cut the food line and get fed first. 
For the rest: Our food line is usually only 15m long and in that time we will teach you how to be a New Yorker. Lovingly, with some Seinfeld commentary!
NYC Deli also hosts public swamp-cooled tents open during daylight hours. These spaces are quiet and un-programmed; perfect for napping during a hot afternoon!
landmark: NYC Deli Rat

name: Ashram Galactica
description:
The Grand Hotel | Your Home Away From Home Away From Home 

Located Directly Above the Center of the Earth
landmark: Large "Ashram Galactica" archway sign out front

name: Shiny's Keepers
description: Shinys' Home
landmark: sign that says Shiny or the big reflective MV

name: Draft Punk
description:
In the future, Daft Punk steals OUR name, "dRaft Punk".
We're here to steal it back.
And we brought a LOT of ice-cold beer with us.
Grab a cold one on the go, or hang out with us for the day.
K nqxg aqw!
landmark: Orange Trash Fence above a shade structure

name: Sparkle Camels Costume Bazaar
description: Need to upgrade your playa swag? We've got you covered, from funky hats, tutus and sparkle bootie shorts. You never know what you'll find. Open every day from mid-day to dusk. All are welcome!
landmark: Big Camel

name: Twisted Swan Celtic pub
landmark: The celtic flags and the red door

name: Lost and Sound
description: A cozy neighborhood space, welcoming everyone to immerse themselves in the spirit of discovery and togetherness. Engage with our interactive art installations that narrate the tales of artifacts from forgotten times. Every corner holds a secret, and every artifact is a key to new connections. Share your story of what you found, the journey it took you on, and watch as we create a cocktail that embodies the spirit of your adventure. We welcome you to explore, relax and rejuvenate with communal conversation. Our intimate dance floor beckons you to let loose and find your rhythm. Come, explore, and leave your mark on our ever-evolving story.
landmark: 3 36" LED compasses

name: Boom Boom Womb
description: Boom Boom Womb is your feminine, funky, soulful, childlike home away from home on the playa.
landmark: 3' light-up Moon & shade with 18' truss

name: Baggage Check
description:
Check your Emotional Baggage with us and Posit a Curious Pondering! By writing down your emotional baggage you don't have to carry it with you; use that freed up emotional headspace to cultivate and connect with your curious-side, because nearly everything is not as it first seems! We'll turn your emotional baggage into ashes and celebrate your newfound self-actualization at the temple burn. 

Stop by any time of the day or night, lounge in our super comfy dome, treat yourself to our pamper station, get out of the sun, or join a dance party in progress. We have a full slate of events every day - whether it's a Disco Line Dance, giant Cuddle Puddle, Consent Workshop, Hypnotising Eye-Gazing Session, or a Topsy Turvy Happy Hour - we have something for you and welcome all with open arms!
landmark: 30' silver dome with 15' bunny ears on top

name: French Manila
description: Our name is inspired by the melting pot of different cultures and backgrounds of our camp members. We love bike gangs, trolls, airport lounge and après ski themed afternoon dance parties, and meditating to techno!
landmark: French Manila sign in the front of our camp

name: YES IS MORE
description: Say YES to MORE! More love, more dancing, more awkward interactions. We're here for a good time, not a long time. Come say YES to being MORE in the moment.
landmark: Cosmic Cabana sign

name: Playa Agora
description:
Our camp is a wonderland of interactivity, offering a smorgasbord of workshops that'll ignite your curiosity and fuel your soul.
Join us as we craft an unforgettable experience at Burning Man 2024, where learning and laughter intertwine in a spectacular dance of community and creativity!
landmark: "Playa Agora" sign and the long frontage canopy

name: Groundhaus
description: Groundhaus is a poorly planned community featuring BRCGC spinning Industrial, EBM, Cold Wave, Dark Wave, Deathrock, Synthpop, RETRO, New Wave, and more.
landmark: 2ft x8ft LED BRGC sign on top of shade structure

name: Lost Art
description:
Come and visit the Lost Art of Conversation Cafe! We at Lost Art celebrate opportunities to create deep connections with friends old and new. At our Conversation Cafe you will be welcomed and supported in exploring avenues of conversation that encourage depth with the goal of learning something new about others and maybe even yourself. We want you to come and settle for a while and get lost in conversation. To keep you nourished we have tea in the mornings and street foods from around the world in the evenings. 

We are a small collaboration and connection driven community from across the US who love taking on ambitious projects, connecting with other awesome communities, and seeking growth and meaning in all that we do. Come on by, we'd love to get to know you.
landmark: Lost Art sign and five cafe areas

description: Need a respite from the heat of the playa? Camp "&" invites you to come enjoy our family-friendly face painting, shaved ice, spam musubi and more at our tiki themed afternoon events. And more? Yes, and more - come with your curious and curiouser spirit and you shall be rewarded with an even chillier treat.
landmark: "&" surfboard

name: Alborz
description: If you find yourself parched and disoriented, listen carefully. Follow the melody and you may just stumble across camp Alborz. We'll be happy to nurture your body and soul before we send you back off to find the next adventure.
landmark: Mountain Range of shade with large neon sign

name: Theme Camp Theme Camp
landmark: Two large trampolines right in front.

name: Playa Piano Bar and Lounge
description:
Playa Piano Bar and Lounge will be featuring live collaborative musical performance along with refreshing beverages every afternoon except Friday. Come by Tuesday for Tutus and Tacos from 12 -2
Come by Friday for Pizza Pockets and Pickles from 12 -2
Drinks and music every afternoon Monday to Thursday 2 to 5 or 6
landmark: Large Well lit grand Piano standing 14 feet high

name: Astropups
description: Fun, Frisky, and Fabulous! Exploring the Playaverse one Open Heart at a time.
landmark: Large, ground-level, multi-color "ASTROPUPS" sign

name: The Middle Path Gang
landmark: 'Idle Hands' sign with rainbow circle lights

name: Playa Jack Rabbits Dusty Hole Bar
description: Playa Jackrabbits Dusty Hole Saloon is here to wet your whistle while roaming the BRC backstreets.  Stop by say and spin the wheel of truth or dare.
landmark: tall led lit tower with canopies

name: Afterglow
landmark: An arch with AFTERGLOW, and large aluminet shade.

name: Mattress Society
description:
We spend so much time on our feet at Burning Man that sometimes we just need to get horizontal! So come and indulge your senses at Mattress Society, a huge 24-hour air mattress oasis in the desert. Like any thriving Empire on the brink of decay, our theme is decadence, abundance and over-indulgence.

Once you're all cuddled out, grab a new friend and play a leisurely card game in our bistro area. Enjoy our regular afternoon chillout DJ sets Mon, Tues, Fri (1pm-4pm) with featured drinks and more. Hedonism on display at our Thursday night cocktail party 7pm-12am.

The day humanity decided to elevate itself from ground to Mattress was the day we detached ourselves from nature to pursue our limitless ambitions. So enjoy… or die! Because, ultimately, nothing else mattress.
landmark: Mini trampolines and white bus with a rooftop deck

name: The whipping waffle
description: The whipping waffle. We have the fix for all your indulgements.
landmark: The couch and rub a tub

name: Foam Home as Foamier & Homier
description: Foam Home presents Foamier & Homier to Black Rock City! The Foamy Homies will be blasting off again this year. Foam down and rinse off your human socialization and awaken your divine curiosity for your miraculous body and connect with Earth & each other. Wednesday through Saturday from 12-1pm for families with kids, and 1-4:20pm for all.
landmark: Big beige tent behind beautiful tapestry murals

name: Long Feng MV Support Camp
description: An ever transforming theatrical, performance-driven mutant vehicle. At it's core, Long Feng is an homage to the intricate articulation of a contortionist, mirroring the circus performer's ability to transform and transcend. A canvas of both past and future, Long Feng is a vessel for the human spirit to soar into the boundless realms of imagination. It's soul is a celebration of the Chinese Year of the Dragon and a not to Ready Playa One, her sister theme camp. She is an invitation to explore the infinite within ourselves and to dream beyond the boundaries of reality.
landmark: Red Chinese lanterscape

name: Disco Bunny
description: A little disco bunny support camp for the art car Gladys Bright, a large geometric disco loving bunny that poops tiny butterfinger ice cream cones and gives rides to weary burners who might need a little pick me up or have lost their way.
landmark: Pink Neon Bunny Sign & Disco Ball Above Camp

name: iBurn/Burning Man Earth
description: Come download the iBurn app -- a gift to help you navigate BRC! iBurn can be your compass, your activity guide, your art interpreter, and your savior in a dust storm. Even without wifi, iBurn can help you find your way home, your next adventure, and more. Bring your phone and answer the Burning Man trivia question for indespensable access.
landmark: Black/White striped seating area and iBurn banner

name: Partner Dance Adventures
landmark: PARTNER DANCE ADVENTURES lightbulb sign

name: Shanti Town
description: We at Shanti Town Sound Movement strive to bring you the citizens of Black Rock City the most authentic experience in Reggae music and Sound System Culture. Delivering strictly Irie Vibes to Burningman since day one!
landmark: "Rasta Colors and Flags"

name: Ballistic Bubbles
description: Ballistic Bubbles, mutant peace tank that blows bubbles not bombs.
landmark: Large round army green sign, "Ballistic Bubbles."

name: Gravity
description: Camp Gravity is welcoming participants to exploring their inner child with art installations, activities, and workshops for adults and children alike.  Looking to open up who you really are and wake up that child that's yearning to play, feel, and love?  Visit us!
landmark: A large elevated sign that says GRAVITY

name: Fuck Yeah!
landmark: the giant FUCK YEAH! sign

name: Tree Circle Art Support Camp
description:
Art for the moment and trees for the generations of the future. 
Our intention is to create sacred space for transformational experiences, where as a tribe we come together and reach states of collective coherence, supported by the power of sound, frequency, intention, and dance. We build art and create live Alquem experiences.
landmark: Bamboo 'Tree Circle' sign

name: Black Rock Piano Lounge
description: Black Rock Piano Lounge is the place to come and share your talent with a friendly audience. We bring great musicians to the playa but build our lounge for that spontaneous moment where the perfect vocals are combined with the best tuned pianos on the playa. Lets make some beautiful music together.
landmark: All white tent structure with pianos and furniture

name: Planetary Playground
description: Visit our giant Jupiter and bounce on our moons!
landmark: Planetary Playground banner!

name: Metamodern Magicians
description: We gather to cohere around conversations and workshops about the Liminal Web, Game~B, The MetaCrisis, the Great Turning, The Great Simplification, The PolyCrisis, and Metamodern Philosophy.  We envision a different future where solutions can be found that are Win Win if not Omni-Win, and that allow us to recover from Moloch in all its forms.
landmark: Dome that is 30' with an off white cover

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
description: VICE
landmark: Large aluminet strucutre with purple/gold curtains

name: Mona Mushroom camp
description:
Welcome to Mona Camp, where the spirit of caring, loving, and creativity thrives amidst the vast expanse of the playa. As part of the same community that brought you the Huge Mona Bunny in 2023 and the enchanting Mona Mushroom in 2024, our camp is dedicated to spreading the Mona spirit far and wide.

We believe in the power of art to inspire, connect, and uplift souls. Our theme revolves around celebrating art and mushrooms. 

Join the Million Mushroom March where everyone who identifies as mushroom (or has mushroom inside of them) will dress up as their favorite fungus and parade from Center camp to Mona Mushroom. We'll have workshops from legendary mycologists and neuroscientists beforehand.

Regnum Animalia finitur. Regnum Fungi surgit.
landmark: Dome with mushroom pillows/mushroom decorations

name: Black Rock City's Cleanest Camp
description: Black Rock City's Cleanest Art Car
landmark: Two story tall Scrubbing Bubble.

name: Brothers & Bourbon
description: "Brothers & Bourbon" is a Burning Man camp fostering mental health conversations over bourbon. Located on the event's outskirts, it provides a supportive space for men and allies. With embedded mental health practitioners, it offers therapy workshops, group discussions, and peer support circles. Embracing Burning Man's principles, it prioritizes inclusivity and communal effort. Through bourbon tastings, campfire chats, and creative sessions, it encourages authentic expression and meaningful connections. By integrating mental health awareness with community spirit, it aims to destigmatize mental health discussions and promote well-being.
landmark: American and mental health flagg

name: Earth Guardians
description: Earth Guardians are an outreach and communications volunteer group whose mission is to educate and inspire Burning Man participants to Leave No Trace (LNT) at the event. We can go beyond leaving "no trace" and leave instead, positive traces on the land. Come see our many bike nature and geology tours, sustainability speakers, DIY workshops, Aztec Burner dances, or volunteer training and gatherings! Come and volunteer on our LNT and compliance outreach teams or participate in a Gerlach LNT our hot-spring patrol, or jump on our MOOP train.
landmark: Earth Guardian Sign and EG man

name: Strung Cheese
description: Your home for Shibari, Quesadilla's and ethically sourced AlienCum
landmark: Look for the Moon Base

name: dust & stars
description: WE WELCOME ALL WHO DARE. this is dust & star's eleventh year as a placed theme cult. that's right: we're a cult. since the dawn of us, we've donned black robes and warned other burners the endless night was on its way. to celebrate our 10th anniversary last year, we held a very special initiation ceremony on thursday night... AND THE ENDLESS NIGHT FINALLY ARRIVED. well...  something did. maybe we got the incantations wrong? to tell you the truth, we're starting to think the night not actually be endless. in fact, the horizon is getting brighter — and from what we've glimpsed, there's a breathtaking new dawn on the other side. literally breathtaking, and shiny. blinding, even.
landmark: neon LED beacons and DUST & STARS sign

name: ReImaginate
description: We are bringing night market where we will join forces together with our fellow camps within Alight market to present a diverse array of offerings from our varied cultural backgrounds.
landmark: Big Sign that reads "Alight" in gold and black

name: Down The Rabbit Hole
description: Step into the shoes of Alice as you enter a world of mysteries and surprises. Take a leap into the rabbit hole and wake up into a world where small appears big, rooms are turned upside down and where you can play with the riddles and mysteries we have placed along the way back into the "real" world of Black Rock City. Along the way you will ponder on the questions of reality, perception and collective consciousness. Enjoy the ride!
landmark: 15' pvc tunnel & a 6' post "Down the Rabbit Hole"

name: French Maid Brigade
description: The French Maids are a playful, meaningful, health and wellness camp that is excited to offer Ayurvedic Massages, Scented Oils, Yoga, Breathing, Happiness and Art workshops to express any Burners creative skills...Come chill and add to your experience on playa with the MAIDS!
landmark: French Maid sign and beautiful red curtains!

name: Zhuangbility Base
description: your oasis of connectivity and relaxation at Burning Man! Our camp features around-the-clock internet access, perfect for those who need to stay connected. Unwind or rev up at our 24/7 lounge bar, where the drinks flow and the ambiance uplifts. Whether you're here to chill or recharge, just look for the "Zhuangbility Base" sign and step into a space crafted for comfort and convenience.
landmark: A Large "Zhuangbility Base" Sign

name: Camp Average AF !
description:
Come Hang Out Guilt-Free 
9:30 AM Monday to Friday - Yoga
8:30 PM Monday to Thursday- Night UV glow face and bodypainting + Fire spinning flow arts
landmark: Camp Average AF sign in frontage

name: That Bunch Of Pricks
description: If we are not there when you get there, we are definitely somewhere.
landmark: See the small-ass sign: That Bunch of Pricks

name: Lazy Skool Daze
description: ​​​Lazy Skool Daze brings back your school days-- with an adult twist! Come join us for Drunk 90s Singalong, Recess, volleyball tournaments, face painting, guidance counseling, Burner 101 classes, field trips, and sunset cuddles and drinks! Look for the giant alphabet blocks and stuffed animal swimming pool.
landmark: ​​4' alphabet blocks and stuffed animal pool

name: Luna Land
description: As the sun sets on playa, Luna rises. Standing tall, she is a shining beacon across the night sky that can be seen from far and wide, guiding us and calling us home. Luna invites us to find flow in impermanence, lean into our softness, and connect to our collective poetry. In her warm light, we are safe to dance, howl, dream and revel. Join our reverie.
landmark: moon-shaped entrance surrounded by clouds

name: The Shire
description: At the Shire, we're all about CONNECTION and PLAY. Come prance through our lush garden and crawl into pillow forts! Dance like a hooligan at our DJ sets (you'll be in good company). *Almost* smooch a stranger in our Tension-Building Pre-Kissing Workshop. Take flight on our infamous rotating seesaw, The Merry-&-Pippin-Go-Round! Brave the 4-story climb up Isengard for a sunset singalong. Come celebrate your inner child. Just follow that giant sunflower flag you see in the sky, it'll lead you right to us!
landmark: The world's tallest sunflower atop a 4-story tower

name: SkyTing
description: SkyTing carries a crew who have travelled from a parallel dimension to support radical inclusivity, roving risk reduction, ecological grief rituals, and sounds from the global majority underground.
landmark: Big Sign That Says SKYTING

name: Hotel Lobby
description: With a lavish chandelier, bellhop service, concierge desk, a lux hotel bar, and a buzzing karaoke lounge, you'll be treated to 5-star service and a dusty bev in a welcoming and weird Hotel Lobby.
landmark: 2 shipping containers & big 'Hotel Lobby' sign

name: Camp Connection
description: Art support camp and love to help first time artist build there art.
landmark: 8' LED Steel ring & 10' x 10' Camp connection log

name: Poetry in Motion
description: Poetry in Motion is a small family camp of artists and makers. We would love for you to come by and participate in making word art, Poetry. Open all day every day.
landmark: Bus covered in magnets

name: Camp BORING
description: Camp BORING: art support for BORING sign. Promoters of sarcasm and shenanigans. Come by for a sticker and a sunset sign push!
landmark: BORING sign

name: BLD
description: BLD - Crossword puzzles and word games, Swiss Space cow racing, drinks, and psychic and tarot readings.
landmark: 30' crossword puzzle dome & brightly colored flags

name: Zendo Project 9:00
description:
The Zendo Project - Psychedelic Care & Emotional Support

Location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers 

Feeling overwhelmed? Need someone to talk to? The Zendo Project is here for you! We provide a safe, non-judgmental environment for anyone in need of emotional and psychological support. Whether you are having a challenging psychedelic trip, dealing with grief, or just need a place to regroup – our trained volunteers are here to help. We provide culturally attuned support to all persons—regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation. The Zendo has two locations at 3:00 & C and 9:00 & C, which are open 24/7 throughout the event.
landmark: We sit right next to rangers & medical by keyholes

name: MythMaker
description: We are a Tribe, a Family, and a Close Circle of Performing Artists and Skilled Makers. We seek to restore the sacredness of myth through theater, dance, circus arts, puppetry, costumes, and fire performances coupled with deep ritualized tales of days long past yet still relevant in the present. We seek to balance the foolish with the wise, the free-spirited with the disciplined, the ridiculous with the honourable; to face the Shadow and the Light. We welcome all who seek the Truth.
landmark: Big Green Viking Bus, Temple Dome, Mead Hall

name: Ouroboros
description:
Ouroboros is the base of operations and mooring of or 50 person Crew for the SQ.
The Study has a 1500sf Hexagonal main communal reception tent that is open to the public and is Replete with small stage and ample seating for discourse in a Salon like setting following Traditional Oratorial Procedure.
landmark: 3 top large white tent as main structure 60' long.

name: Global Camp
description:
Global Camp was founded in 2018 to fill the vacuum of theme camps for Internationals to land. Over the years we have hosted individuals from over 70 countries, and we celebrate each persons diversity, culture and expression. 
We bring elements of this diverse culture to BRC and provide space for those to learn and connect with burners from far away lands. Come and join us for afternoon cultural themed offerings.
landmark: International flags hanging from the ceiling

name: Jaguar Occult
description: We come together from all around the universe to become Jung'kul. Jung'kul is our interdimensional jaguar deity bringing frequencies from higher dimensions to human beings on Earth C-137.
landmark: A flag with a jaguar on it

name: Swing City
description: Swing City brings the energy and vibe of the Original Muscle Beach in Santa Monica California to Burning Man. We strive to provide a safe welcoming playground that can be enjoyed by all ages. Come to participate or just hang out in our shade and watch the various acrobatics available as seasoned professionals and movement newbies alike explore our space.
landmark: 18' tall scaffolding

name: Zendo Project 3:00
description:
The Zendo Project - Psychedelic Peer Support 

Location: 3 and 9 between C and D, next to Medical and Rangers 

Feeling overwhelmed? Need someone to talk to? The Zendo Project is here for you! We provide a safe, non-judgmental environment for anyone in need of emotional and psychological support. Whether you are having a challenging psychedelic trip, dealing with grief, or just need a place to regroup – our trained volunteers are here to help. We provide culturally attuned support to all persons—regardless of race, gender, or sexual orientation. The Zendo has two locations at 3:00 & C and 9:00 & C, which are open 24/7 throughout the event.
landmark: We sit right next to rangers & medical by keyholes

name: Camp Clusterfuck
landmark: Aerial Rig with UFO on top

name: Uranus
description: Uranus Art Crew, Builders of Playa One and Diamond Rain Art Cars
landmark: The military gear and Playa One Art Car

name: Galactic Snake Farm
description: We are the support camp for the ABDUCTION mutant vehicle!
landmark: Giant Alien Mutant Vehicle

name: Rainbow Geometric
description: Rainbow Geometric is the art support camp for Photon Wizard. in 2024 he will be bringing a giant shell Honoraria project. There will be a geometric archway in the front of camp.
landmark: Geometric arch way

name: Sky Gazing Art Support Camp
description: Art support camp for Sky Gazing.  Visit us!
landmark: colorful canopy of streamers over the camp

name: Orphan Asylum
description:
Orphan Asylum is a hodgepodge crew of misfits who come together through careful planning, organization and a dash of straight anarchy to create a unique social experiment that has not been terrible yet so far.

We rely on the kindness of strangers, and making them not so strange (or stranger, depending) by the end of the burn, as well as providing sanctuary to strangers on playa in need of a desert home. We don't charge dues and are instead entirely donation-based from our past and current orphans.

Folks donate everything from money to org support to moral support to technical/skill support. Before the burn, we take in new camp members on an application-basis.
landmark: Black, red, and orange "Orphan Asylum" sign

name: Black Rock University
description: Black Rock University teaches Playa Survival Skills and Best Practices. The 10 Principles of Burning Man. 10 Principles of Couples Survival and other Playa Centric courses and outreach.
landmark: Black Rock University Flag and USA Flag on a pole

name: Altepetl
description: Altepetl mutant vehicle support camp

name: Black Rock Academy
description:
We are often approached at Camp Black Rock Academy with the question of, "So what do you guys teach?"
Personally, I dont think the important question is, "What do you guys teach?" But rather, I would follow up with, "What are you willing to learn?"
landmark: Black Rock Academy sign on green chalkboard

name: Black Rock Realty
description: We welcome anyone who's ever wanted to own property at Black Rock City! We'll be sharing our knowledge on solar & sustainability and cruising the playa in the 'Beach House' that's available for sale to the highest non monetary bidder.
landmark: sign that says 'Black Rock Realty'

name: No Sleep Hotel
description: The No Sleep Hotel is proud to open its doors to serve the waking dreams of the citizens of Black Rock City. Join us in the evening for shenanigans, whimsy, and the slowest service you'll find on any side of the playa. When the doors to your mind are open, our doors are open as well.
landmark: No Sleep Hotel sign

name: MysTEArious Keyhouse
landmark: Teahouse support signage

name: Illumicamp
description: Illumicamp will primarily be an art support camp for the deep-playa art project Illumicone, but we love to interact with our neighbors and passersby. If you happen upon us, you will find Mini-Cone -- a fully functional, small-scale version of Illumicone that is 4 feet tall and 10 feet in diameter, with 24 strings of LED lights, and including the same interactive flower widgets that can be found at the main Illumicone installation in deep playa. Feel free to hop into our pile of pillows underneath Mini-Cone as others manipulate the widgets to create a dazzling light show. You can also find us by looking for our "tripper stick," a 22-foot tall LED light pole that guides weary travelers through the dark to our sparkly haven.
landmark: 22' tall LED tripper stick and mini cone

name: Disco Porch
description: Welcome to Disco Porch! You can't miss our large multicolor psychedelic illuminated "DISCO PORCH" sign placed on the ground to the left of the camp. The main structure is a canopy decorated with various string lights and several disco balls hanging from the roof. Under the canopy, there is a living room vibe with inflatable couch/chairs and coffee tables. Our bar is bright and covered with a shiny silver cloth. To the left, there is a black trailer. Out front you will see our jumbo disco mailbox labeled "DP MAIL"—don't forget to check your mail! The overall atmosphere is festive, vibrant, and inviting. So come on in, take a seat, relax, and let the disco porchers do the rest!!!
landmark: 2.5x20ft 'DISCO PORCH' sign & jumbo disco mailbox
